about.en:
123 by ELLA is a trendy beauty and lifestyle department store chain store that combines practicality and fashion.

The wide variety of products in the store include: global beauty and personal care, sports goods, electronic and electronic beauty products, casual wear, aromatherapy, bags and holiday gifts, etc. It is cost-effective and can definitely meet the needs of different customers.
about.tc:
123 by ELLA為潮流美妝及生活百貨連鎖店，集實用、潮流於一身。

店內產品種類豐富包括︰環球美妝及個人護理、運動用品、電子及電子美容產品、休閒服飾、香薰、袋類及節日禮品等等。性價比高，絕對能夠滿足不同顧客的需要。

about.en:
2000Fun established in 2004, is a game retailer in Hong Kong. We have 8 retail stores and an online shop till now. We specialized in selling PC games, pre-paid cards and eSports peripherals. 

All products we have are directly provided by authorized distributors to ensure product efficacy and safety. Local & oversea customers can easily experience our service either from online or offline.
about.tc: 「2000FUN」起源於千禧年，至2004年首間「2000Fun網絡遊戲專門店」正式投入服務，專門出售遊戲點數卡、電腦遊戲和遊戲相關的服務及周邊設備，所有產品均為正品正貨，為遊戲玩家提供最全面、最安心的一條龍銷售服務。
about.sc: 「2000FUN」起源于千禧年，至2004年首间「2000Fun网络游戏专门店」正式投入服务，专门出售游戏点数卡、电脑游戏和游戏相关的服务及周边设备，所有产品均为正品正货，为游戏玩家提供最全面、最安心的一条龙销售服务。

about.en: 37 Steakhouse & Bar is an authentic New York style steakhouse, specializing in serving a variety of dry aged Australian Wagyu and Black Angus prime rib steak. We offer a full spectrum of dining options - from brunch, afternoon tea, happy hour to late dinner, serving salads, seafood, prime steak, desserts and wine etc.

about.en: Since the company's first "Junyixinpin" three-dimensional gold foil painting entered the gift industry in 2000, it has been adhering to the spirit of excellent quality and continuous innovation, and has launched more than 2,000 products. With a wide range of topics, and with excellent development capabilities, new products are constantly being introduced. From product design to R&D and production, the strictest quality control is achieved for each product.

about.sc: 2000年由本公司首创之--"骏艺鑫品”立体金箔画进入礼品界以来，一直秉持着质量优异和不断创新的精神，已推出2,000多种产品。题材广泛，且凭着优异的开发能力，不断推出新产品问世。由产品设计到研发、制作皆为每一项产质量量做到最严格的把关。

about.en:
7-Eleven was founded in 1927 in Dallas, Texas, USA. It was engaged in selling ice cubes in the early days. Later, for the convenience of customers, it gradually provided daily commodities such as fresh milk, bread, and eggs. Today, 7-Eleven has developed into a convenience store that provides one-stop convenience services.

The name of the 7-Eleven convenience store originated in 1946 to advertise the brand's operating hours from 7 am to 11 pm. To date, 7-Eleven has introduced a 24-hour business model to provide better services, setting a milestone for the convenience store business model.

Today, 7-Eleven, as a leader in the chain convenience store industry, has a store network covering 21 countries and regions around the world, with more than 67,000 retail locations.
about.tc:
7-Eleven於1927年在美國德克薩斯州達拉斯市創立，早期從事售賣冰塊業務，後來為方便顧客，逐漸提供鮮牛奶、麵包、雞蛋等日用商品。今天，7-Eleven已發展為提供一站式便利服務的便利店。

7-Eleven便利店的名稱源於1946年，藉以標榜品牌由上午7時至晚上11時的營業時間。時至今日，7-Eleven為提供更完善的服務，已引入24小時年中無休的營業模式，為便利店經營模式創下里程碑。

時至今日，7-Eleven作為連鎖便利店行業的領導者，店舖網絡覆蓋全球21個國家及地區，設有超過67,000間零售點。

about.en:
About 7-ELEVEN

7-Eleven was founded in 1927 in Dallas, Texas, USA. It was engaged in selling ice cubes in the early days. Later, for the convenience of customers, it gradually provided daily commodities such as fresh milk, bread, and eggs. Today, 7-Eleven has developed into a convenience store that provides one-stop convenience services.

The name of the 7-Eleven convenience store originated in 1946 to advertise the brand's operating hours from 7 am to 11 pm. To date, 7-Eleven has introduced a 24-hour business model to provide better services, setting a milestone for the convenience store business model.

Today, 7-Eleven, as a leader in the chain convenience store industry, has a store network covering 21 countries and regions around the world, with more than 67,000 retail locations.
about.sc:
关于7-ELEVEN

7-Eleven于1927年在美国德克萨斯州达拉斯市创立，早期从事售卖冰块业务，后来为方便顾客，逐渐提供鲜牛奶、面包、鸡蛋等日用商品。今天，7-Eleven已发展为提供一站式便利服务的便利店。

7-Eleven便利店的名称源于1946年，借以标榜品牌由上午7时至晚上11时的营业时间。时至今日，7-Eleven为提供更完善的服务，已引入24小时年中无休的营业模式，为便利店经营模式创下里程碑。时至今日，7-Eleven作为连锁便利店行业的领导者，店铺网络覆盖全球21个国家及地区，设有超过67,000间零售点。

7-Eleven便利店的名稱源於1946年，藉以標榜品牌由上午7時至晚上11時的營業時間。時至今日，7-Eleven為提供更完善的服務，已引入24小時年中無休的營業模式，為便利店經營模式創下里程碑。時至今日，7-Eleven作為連鎖便利店行業的領導者，店舖網絡覆蓋全球21個國家及地區，設有超過67,000間零售點。

about.en:
In 1948, A-1 Bakery Group was established its first “Health & Fresh” concept store in Osaka, Japan with the mission to produce high quality products and provide the best service.
  
Since 1985, A-1 Bakery has strived to provide “Natural & Healthy” bread, aimed at bringing the new revolutionary baking technique, high fibrous and well nutritious produce to Hong Kong.  

Through 30 years more development, there are over branches in Hong Kong.
about.tc:
A-1 Bakery Group早在1948年於日本大阪開設首間結合健康及新鮮概念的麵包店，一直努力製作高品質食品及提供優質服務。

致力提供「天然健康」的英王麵包，於1985年，將革新的麵包製作技術、高纖及富有豐富營養價值的麵包帶入香港。

經過30多年的發展，時至今日，於香港擁有超過60間分店。

about.en: A.P.C. is a French clothing brand that offers a complete collection of men's and women's clothing and accessories that embodies a simple, casual elegance. A.P.C. is above all a minimalist style. The brand designer assumes this absence of extravagance and this return to the essential: that is what makes the identity of A.P.C. Stylish and casual looks, inspired by everyday life.
about.sc: A.P.C是一个法国服装品牌，提供男女时尚服装和配饰集列，体现出简单而优雅的风格。A.P.C奉行极简主义风格，品牌设计师认为这种简约主义比起奢侈设计更加重要，这就是A.P.C的品牌理念：时尚休闲的外表，灵感来自日常生活。
about.tc: A.P.C是一個法國服裝品牌，提供男女時尚服裝和配飾集列，體現出簡單而優雅的風格。A.P.C奉行極簡主義風格，品牌設計師認為這種簡約主義比起奢侈設計更加重要，這就是A.P.C的品牌理念：時尚休閒的外表，靈感來自日常生活。

about.en:
We are a professional English language school established in 2002 which promotes the blending of “happiness”, “schoolwork” and “parental bonding”. 

Learners are assessed and taught based on ability, and are given appropriate challenges that elicit their full potential. We have more than 100 professional native English teachers, around 100 Education Consultants, and an experienced Course Development Team. 

We are an educational experience for the whole family. We provide numerous parenting seminars and workshops to equip mums and dads with the various skills they desire.
about.tc:
成立於2002年，推動「快樂」、「學業」及「親子」三嬴局面。

根據學生的能力進行評估，按不同的能力給予挑戰，誘發他們的學習潛能。擁有超過100名專業外籍英語老師、接近100 名教育顧問，以及優秀的課程策劃團隊。除了「重視英文」更着重「品格教育」，舉辦家長講座及工作坊幫助家長作好裝備，成為更出色的父母。

about.en: Founded in France in 1853, Aigle has continued to develop its unique design in clothing and foot wear against nature for 160 years whilst combining style and functionality. Aigle boots are handmade in France along with Aigle parkas. Together they are the showcase products, which represent the brand’s precious craftsmanship and quality.
about.tc: 1853年，AIGLE品牌在法國面世，源於大自然，致力研發衣飾及鞋履設計，品牌核心價值在於其豐富的生產經驗、及對產品製造素質的堅持，為推動人類與大自然和諧共融，讓寰宇旅行者帶來功能性及時尚的旅遊裝束，並得到足夠的保護。其著名的招牌天然橡膠靴仍以人手於法國製造，並已成為世界各地的時尚產品。
about.sc: 1853年，AIGLE品牌在法国面世，源于大自然，致力研发衣饰及鞋履设计，品牌核心价值在于其丰富的生产经验、及对产品制造素质的坚持，为推动人类与大自然和谐共融，让寰宇旅行者带来功能性及时尚的旅游装束，并得到足够的保护。其著名的招牌天然橡胶靴仍以人手于法国制造，并已成为世界各地的时尚产品。

about.en:
Founded in 1982, APM, Ariane Prette Monaco, is a contemporary fashion jewelry brand that associates itself with the chicness of Monaco and South of France lifestyle.
 
With over 30 years of experience, APM jewelry is designed in house with high attention to every step of the design process from sketch to finish, each piece is made with expert craftmanship using the finest materials. By manufacturing and producing everything in house, we have strict quality control at every stage of the production process as we are able to overlook and make sure everything is at top quality.
about.tc:
APM Monaco珠寶富有現代風格並帶著優雅的摩納哥氣息，設計靈感源自摩納哥以及南法愜意悠然的樂活態度，是個深受愛戴的時尚珠寶品牌。
 
品牌於1982年由創辦人Ariane Prette 女士建立，憑著她對珠寶創作的滿腔熱忱，使品牌於珠寶界獲得青睞、深受愛戴。承傳30年來精湛的珠寶製作傳統和工藝，於2011年，APM Monaco 專攻以設計為主的純銀珠寶，把創辦人的傳奇發揚光大，並設計創造了多款雋永時尚的作品，令品牌不止家喻戶曉，更是現代、長青、永遠走在潮流前線的珠寶品牌。
about.sc:
APM Monaco珠宝富有现代风格并带着优雅的摩纳哥气息，设计灵感源自摩纳哥以及南法惬意悠然的乐活态度，是个深受爱戴的时尚珠宝品牌。
 
品牌于1982年由创办人Ariane Prette 女士建立，凭着她对珠宝创作的满腔热忱，使品牌于珠宝界获得青睐、深受爱戴。承传30年来精湛的珠宝制作传统和工艺，于2011年，APM Monaco 专攻以设计为主的纯银珠宝，把创办人的传奇发扬光大，并设计创造了多款隽永时尚的作品，令品牌不止家喻户晓，更是现代、长青、永远走在潮流前线的珠宝品牌。

about.en: ASFA Disinfectant & Deodorisation Spray does not contain alcohol, fragrances or any additives. It instantly removes odour and decomposes all the unfavourable smell by reducing the polluted air to carbon dioxide and water through oxidation reaction. The effect is more significant and effective than using air purifiers or aroma diffusers and with no residue or harm left to the environment. ASFA Disinfectant & Deodorisation Spray can be used in offices, restaurants, cars, kitchens, toilets, bedrooms or anywhere you want. It can help improving indoor hygiene and create a safe and clean living environment.
about.tc: ASFA分子消毒噴霧不含酒精、香料及添加劑，從根源除味，不以香薰或化學合成氣味覆蓋異味，瞬間分解煙味、飯菜味、香水味、口臭、體味、下水道返味及霉味等。瞬間分解環境異味及污染氣體的氣體大分子，通過氧化反應還原為二氧化碳和水，效果比使用空氣淨化器或香薰機更加顯著及有效，去除異味之後無任何殘留，對使用者及環境均無危害。ASFA分子消毒噴霧能應用在辦公室、餐廳、車廂、廚房、洗手間和睡房等有異味物件，將大大改善我們的室內衛生狀況，塑造出安全潔淨的生活環境。
about.sc: ASFA分子消毒喷雾不含酒精、香料及添加剂，从根源除味，不以香薰或化学合成气味复盖异味，瞬间分解烟味、饭菜味、香水味、口臭、体味、下水道返味及霉味等。瞬间分解环境异味及汙染气体的气体大分子，通过氧化反应还原为二氧化碳和水，效果比使用空气淨化器或香薰机更加显着及有效，去除异味之后无任何残留，对使用者及环境均无危害。ASFA分子消毒喷雾能应用在办公室、餐厅、车厢、厨房、洗手间和睡房等有异味物件，将大大改善我们的室内卫生状况，塑造出安全洁淨的生活环境。

metaDescription.en: ASFA Disinfectant & Deodorisation Spray does not contain alcohol, fragrances or any additives. It instantly removes odour and decomposes all the unfavourable smell by reducing the polluted air to carbon dioxide and water through oxidation reaction. The effect is more significant and effective than using air purifiers or aroma diffusers and with no residue or harm left to the environment. ASFA Disinfectant & Deodorisation Spray can be used in offices, restaurants, cars, kitchens, toilets, bedrooms or anywhere you want. It can help improving indoor hygiene and create a safe and clean living environment.

about.en: A BATHING APE®‘s creative concepts never ceased to emerge. In the 2012 spring-summer, a brand new young and hip diffusion line AAPE BY *A BATHING APE®. Aape targets the young menswear market. It aims to create a collection of simple, light and fashionable clothes for the new generation of fashionistas aged from 15 – 25 years old. With comfortable cuttings, the clothes are for everyday wear. Aape logo stems from A BATHING APE®’s classic ape Moonface Logo. The simple round face is like a younger version of the original ape logo.
about.tc: A BATHING APE®的創意理念從不間斷，於2012年春夏推出一個全新年輕品牌 AAPE BY *A BATHING APE®。Aape針對年輕男裝市場，為15-25歲的年輕一代設計出一系列簡潔及時尚的服飾。Aape標誌源自A BATHING APE®的猿人頭像，其簡潔的圓形面孔，就像年輕版的猿顏一樣。
about.sc: A BATHING APE®的创意理念从不间断，于2012年春夏推出一个充满活力的全新年轻品牌 AAPE BY *A BATHING APE® 。Aape针对年轻男装市场，为15-25岁的潮流新一代设计出一系列简洁、轻便的时尚服饰。Aape标志源自A BATHING APE®的经典猿人头像MOONFACE LOGO，其简洁的圆形面孔，就像年轻版的猿颜一样，设计鲜明令人印象深刻。

about.en: AbouThai, is a chains of department stores, established in 2015, imports high-quality goods from Thailand. As of March 2021, it has 26 stores. We hold AbouThai Songkran Festival Big Sale every April in Hong Kong.

about.sc: 「AbouThai 阿布泰国生活百货」是香港一家连锁生活百货专门店，成立于2015年，从泰国进口优质商品。截至2021年3月，拥有26间分店，每年4月在港还会举行「阿布泰国泼水节购物日」。

about.en: Aesop offers skin, hair and body care formulations created with meticulous attention to detail, and with efficacy and sensory pleasure in mind. Aesop investigates widely to source plant-based and laboratory-made ingredients, and use only those with a proven record of safety and efficacy. In each of our unique stores, informed consultants are pleased to introduce the Aesop range and to guide your selections.
about.tc: Aesop為你帶來肌膚、秀發及身體護理的精製配方，務求達至顯著功效之餘，同時讓身體感官享受舒緩鎮靜。Aesop致力於在科學驗證功效的基礎上，選用最優質的植物萃取和抗氧化成分。所有配方有效之餘亦絕對安全。店舖的專業顧問都會十分樂意為你介紹Aesop的產品，為你挑選最合適的選擇。
about.sc: Aesop为你带来肌肤、秀发及身体护理的精製配方，务求达至显着功效之馀，同时让身体感官享受舒缓镇静。Aesop致力于在科学验证功效的基础上，选用最优质的植物萃取和抗氧化成分。所有配方有效之馀亦绝对安全。店舖的专业顾问都会十分乐意为你介绍Aesop的产品，为你挑选最合适的选择。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Aesop at Fashion Walk. We are a unique fusion of indoor and outdoor elements at the heart of Causeway Bay, embracing three vibrant streets – Paterson, Food Street and Kingston.
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到Fashion Walk的Aesop。Fashion Walk是匯聚時尚、品味生活及國際美饌的潮流熱點，提供獨特的室內及室外購物環境，涵蓋三大區域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。

about.en: French brand American Vintage’s fashion collections are drawn in minimalistic and authentic lines, giving people a chance to reinvent themselves daily. Cuts inspired by the casual wardrobe and a subtle color palette are the hallmarks of the brand’s recognizable style. The use of natural materials, a quality feel, and a vintage treatment breath life into every item.
about.tc: 法國品牌American Vintage的時裝系列以簡約的剪裁輪廓為主，休閒的風格和的廣泛的色調形成了品牌的標誌。品牌堅持選用高質素天然質料、剪裁舒適及設計細節體現潮流觸角，包括使用特別清洗方法處理、毛邊及仿舊處理方法。
about.sc: 法国品牌American Vintage的时装系列以简约的剪裁轮廓为主，休閒的风格和的广泛的色调形成了品牌的标誌。品牌坚持选用高质素天然质料、剪裁舒适及设计细节体现潮流触角，包括使用特别清洗方法处理、毛边及彷旧处理方法。

about.en: Asam Chicken Rice proudly presents its signature Hainanese Chicken Rice with its own unique taste blending the best flavours of Singaporean and Malaysian cuisines.
about.tc: 亞參雞飯主打揉合馬來西亞、新加坡地道風格的海南雞飯，標榜「尋覓99分海南雞飯」，嚴選三黃雞，肉質嫩滑，肉汁豐腴, 配上以雞湯煨煮油飯，雞滑飯香。
about.sc: 亚参鸡饭主打揉合马来西亚、新加坡地道风格的海南鸡饭，标榜「寻觅99分海南鸡饭」，严选三黄鸡，肉质嫩滑，肉汁丰腴, 配上以鸡汤煨煮油饭，鸡滑饭香。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Asam Chicken Rice at Grand Plaza. Grand Plaza is home to a stellar line-up of international watch and jewelry brands, concept stores as well as fashion, lifestyle and sports labels. The dedicated Dining Floor features over 20 gourmet dining venues where international cuisine is served in stylish surroundings.

about.en: Established in 1991, Bauhaus imported internationally renowned brands of denim and accessories for sale. It quickly became a fashion mecca for the young and trendy shortly after its opening. In 1994, Bauhaus officially launched its first own label – TOUGH Jeansmith. This set Bauhaus firmly as a market leader in the segment of denim retailers. In 2002 and 2005, Bauhaus continued to launch two more of its own labels, Salad and 80/20 respectively. The former focuses on fashionable ladies wear while the latter features the military-inspired casual chic. Both offer a wide range of choices of apparel and accessories for consumers, as well as broadening the style spectrum for Bauhaus.
about.tc: bauhaus於1991年正式成立，首間店鋪位於尖沙咀，專售國際知名的潮流服裝品牌。開業不久，旋即成為年輕族群的朝聖地，其後於1995年在尖沙咀開設首間bauhaus旗艦店，主力售賣多國經典牛仔褲品牌，奠定了bauhaus在牛仔褲市場的領導地位。在2005年5月，bauhaus跨進另一個高峰 - 在港上市。除了引入世界各地備受時裝界註目的設計師品牌外，bauhaus於1994年推出自家品牌TOUGH Jeansmith，並開設連鎖店，產品系列由服裝到提包、背囊以致配飾，一應俱全，憑著其別具創意的設計，迅速成為香港其中一個流行服飾品牌，成功於本地時裝界占一席位。及後，於2002年及2005年分別再推出兩個自家品牌：以售賣時款女裝衣飾為主的Salad及以軍事為設計意念的80/20，讓消費者有更多選擇，也為bauhaus開拓不同風格。
about.sc: bauhaus于1991年正式成立，首间店铺位于尖沙咀，专售国际知名的潮流服装品牌。开业不久，旋即成为年轻族群的朝圣地，其后于1995年在尖沙咀开设首间bauhaus旗舰店，主力售卖多国经典牛仔裤品牌，奠定了bauhaus在牛仔裤市场的领导地位。在2005年5月，bauhaus跨进另一个高峰 - 在港上市。除了引入世界各地备受时装界注目的设计师品牌外，bauhaus于1994年推出自家品牌TOUGH Jeansmith，并开设连锁店，产品系列由服装到提包、背囊以致配饰，一应俱全，凭着其别具创意的设计，迅速成为香港其中一个流行服饰品牌，成功于本地时装界占一席位。及后，于2002年及2005年分别再推出两个自家品牌：以售卖时款女装衣饰为主的Salad及以军事为设计意念的80/20，让消费者有更多选择，也为bauhaus开拓不同风格。

about.en:
B’IN Select – “Design is the most powerful forces in our lives, can be empowering and inspiring” We believe design is not just an expression of beauty, but a way to experience life, and the best way to experience design is through products and making products. We select the best accessories, bags, home décor and lifestyle goodies, from every corner of the world. 

Apart from the rare international brands in our shop, we also set up a platform for quality Hong Kong local designers to showcase their designs. Design deserves a better stage. Little by little, we trust that good design can change our lives, if we just Believe in it.
about.tc: 作為潮流品牌的代理商，我們相信設計，嚴選自己的品牌，將一些用心設計的品牌帶進這個社區，希望大家可以用最簡單的心，欣賞設計師們對設計的執着及信念。
about.sc: 作为潮流品牌的代理商，我们相信设计，严选自己的品牌，将一些用心设计的品牌带进这个小区，希望大家可以用最简单的心，欣赏设计师们对设计的执着及信念。

about.en:
BC House is a local Barbershop, providing customers with high-quality hair style services and tailor-made hair styles that are exclusive to you. 

In addition to hair cutting services, the store will also collect different brands of hair products for customers from all over the world, and provide a one-stop online shopping system to meet the needs of different customers.

about.en:
Bodybuilding Connection Limited (BC) was established in 1999, offering the best in dietary food supplements. From the beginning, our primary focus has been to design products that benefit the day to day requirements of athletes and bodybuilders. Here at BC, we provide more than 1,000 products ranging from fitness gear to everyday nutrition. Our products are imported directly from the USA, Canada and Europe on a regular basis, including multiple brands, and always ensuring the freshest products available. In addition, 

BC develops and produces many products to enhance your life and well-being, as well as offer many convenient options ranging from The Twister, Store & Shake Shaker, Pill Box, Slouch Socks, 4 Layers Container, just to name a few. We are always in the process of creating, improving and staying abreast of the ever-growing world of fitness related products to ensure our customers complete satisfaction. When you visit our shops you will be greeted by one of our knowledgeable representatives that will assist you in finding the right product for your health and fitness goals. So come visit our shops, and see for yourself why so many athletes and bodybuilders rely on BC.
about.tc:
Bodybuilding Connection Limited (BC)成立於1999年，致力於提供最好的營養補充品。品牌創立初始的主要焦點在於設計並提供令運動員和健美運動員受益的必需產品。在BC這裡，我們提供超過1,000種產品，種類含括健身用品至日常營養食品。我們的產品是從美國、加拿大和歐洲直接進口，包括多個品牌，我們始終堅持並保證提供最新鮮的產品。

此外，BC已開發和生產了許多自家產品，用以提升您的生活素質。我們亦提供了許多便利您生活的產品，如自動攪拌器The Twister，設有儲存隔層的貼心沖粉杯Store & Shake Shaker，藥丸盒，襪子，4層粉隔，這只是僅舉幾例。我們總是不斷創造、改善和保持與健身產品行業同步，以確保我們客戶的滿意程度。當您蒞臨我們的商店，您將受到熱烈的歡迎。經驗豐富的銷售代表會幫助您找到以您的健康和健身為目標的合適產品。來參觀我們的店鋪吧，看看為什麼有這麼多的運動員和健美運動員相信和選擇BC。
about.sc:
Bodybuilding Connection Limited (BC)成立于1999年，致力于提供最好的营养补充品。品牌创立初始的主要焦点在于设计并提供令运动员和健美运动员受益的必需产品。在BC这里，我们提供超过1000种产品，种类含括健身用品至日常营养食品。我们的产品是从美国、加拿大和欧洲直接进口，包括多个品牌，我们始终坚持并保证提供最新鲜的产品。

此外，BC已开发和生产了许多自家产品，用以提升您的生活素质。我们亦提供了许多便利您生活的产品，如自动搅拌器The Twister，设有储存隔层的贴心冲粉杯Store & Shake Shaker，药丸盒，袜子，4层粉隔，这只是仅举几例。我们总是不断创造、改善和保持与健身产品行业同步，以确保我们客户的满意程度。当您莅临我们的商店，您将受到热烈的欢迎。经验丰富的销售代表会帮助您找到以您的健康和健身为目标的合适产品。来参观我们的店铺吧，看看为什么有这么多的运动员和健美运动员相信和选择BC。

about.en:
BurgeRoom was founded in 2007. It was awarded Prestigious Restaurant (2016, 2017), Best Western Restaurant, Best Restaurant in Wanchai, Causeway Bay, Tsim Sha Tsui. It has been well-known for making the ordinary extraordinary. 

It gives "burger" a new name by introducing new ideas to the menu, such as the signature Foie Gras Burger, Soft Shell Crab Burger, Portobello Cheese Burger, etc. Its success has been well-recognized.
about.tc:
於2007年開業的BurgeRoom。多年來榮獲Openrice開飯至尊大獎(2016，2017)、最優秀開飯西式餐廳及最優秀灣仔／銅鑼灣區、尖沙咀開飯熱店等多項殊榮。

BurgeRoom對食物品質一直有著一份難得的堅持。本著精益求精及追求創新的理念，將漢堡包文化重新演繹。其鵝肝漢堡、軟殼蟹漢堡、大烤菇漢堡等，更是不平凡的招牌款式。成功地在業界突圍而出。
about.sc:
于2007年开业的BurgeRoom。多年来荣获Openrice开饭至尊大奖(2016，2017)、最优秀开饭西式餐厅及最优秀湾仔／铜锣湾区、尖沙咀开饭热店等多项殊荣。

BurgeRoom对食物品质一直有着一份难得的坚持。本着精益求精及追求创新的理念，将汉堡包文化重新演绎。其鹅肝汉堡、软壳蟹汉堡、大烤菇汉堡等，更是不平凡的招牌款式。成功地在业界突围而出。

about.en: Baba Nyonya also known as Peranakan or Straits Chinese, refers to the descendants of Chinese immigrants from the Ming and Qing dynasties who began to settle in Malacca in the 15th century.
about.tc: 峇峇娘惹(馬來語:Baba Nyonya)又稱為土生華人或海峽華人，是指15世紀之間開始定居馬六甲一帶的中國明代及清代移民後裔。男性稱為峇峇，女性稱為娘惹。
about.sc: 峇峇娘惹(马来语:Baba Nyonya)又称为土生华人或海峡华人，是指15世纪之间开始定居马六甲一带的中国明代及清代移民后裔。男性称为峇峇，女性称为娘惹。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Baba Nyonya Restaurant at Amoy Plaza. Amoy Plaza is an ideal one-stop shopping, dining and entertainment hub with more than 30 food and beverage outlets serving Eastern and Western cuisines.

about.en:
POWERFUL CURRICULUM POWERED BY PROVEN UNIQUE TEACHING METHODOLOGY
​
Together with my team, we help to achieve clear tangible English language improvements for all children. Utilising a structured, intelligently designed and logical programme that is powered with a unique and controlled teaching methodology, we are able to accurately predict children's learning outcomes every 3 months. 
​
TEACHING METHOD BACKED BY RESEARCH
​
Our teaching method is backed by research and has been proven to be the most effective method in teaching English as a secondary language to children.
 
TEACHERS PHONETICALLY TRAINED
​
We don't just hire native English speakers  (NETs) as we know being a native speaker doesn't mean you are a trained educator. We hire exceptional teachers who are passionate about teaching and all of our teachers are professionally phonetically trained in Ruth Miskin's RWI programme or in Jolly Phonics by the Jolly Learning Company.
about.tc:
通過獨特的教學方法，加上最強的課程，展現最佳的學習成果。
​
我和我的團隊，致力為每位小朋友定立明確的學習目標，令他們在英語應用能力上能獲得顯著進步。Babington使用一套結構嚴緊、設計優良、邏輯性極高的課程，加上一套獨特的教學方法，確保我們能夠準確地為每一位小朋友預計每三個月的學習成果及進度，幫助他們循序漸進地提升英語水平。
​
獲得學術研究一致肯定有效的教學方法
​
根據研究顯示，我們的教學方法是最好的，亦是教導小朋友學習以英語作為第二語言的最有效方法。
 
所有導師均經過牛津的專業培訓
​
我們明白一個單單懂得英語的人，並不表示他必定是一位好的導師。因此Babington不只聘請以英語為母語的導師，我們只會聘請一些對教學充滿熱誠的人！而他們會首先接受牛津大學出版社或Jolly Learning Company的專業培訓，確保他們的英語拼音發音準確。
about.sc:
通过独特的教学方法，加上最强的课程，展现最佳的学习成果。
​
我和我的团队，致力为每位小朋友定立明确的学习目标，令他们在英语应用能力上能获得显著进步。Babington使用一套结构严紧、设计优良、逻辑性极高的课程，加上一套独特的教学方法，确保我们能够准确地为每一位小朋友预计每三个月的学习成果及进度，帮助他们循序渐进地提升英语水平。
​
获得学术研究一致肯定有效的教学方法
​
根据研究显示，我们的教学方法是最好的，亦是教导小朋友学习以英语作为第二语言的最有效方法。
 
所有导师均经过牛津的专业培训
​
我们明白一个单单懂得英语的人，并不表示他必定是一位好的导师。因此Babington不只聘请以英语为母语的导师，我们只会聘请一些对教学充满热诚的人！而他们会首先接受牛津大学出版社或Jolly Learning Company的专业培训，确保他们的英语拼音发音准确。

about.en: Korean milk ice cream brand Baekmidang inherited the expertise and experience of manufacturing dairy products from its parent company Namyang Dairy Product Co. Ltd. founded in 1964. The signature product of Baekmidang, the milk ice cream, is made with organic milk. The shape of the ice cream and the cone are both thoughtfully designed, making it an art piece pleasurable to the eyes and taste buds.
about.tc: 來自韓國的百味堂傳承了母公司南陽乳業自1964年成立以來對奶類產品的悠久專業，其皇牌的牛奶雪糕便是以由農場直送的100%有機奶所製成，奶香濃郁、甜味純粹，每一口的雪糕都可讓你感受到農民的誠意和大自然最新鮮的味道。百味堂致力以味覺和視覺均無與倫比的藝術甜點為大眾帶來與別不同的湛新甜點體驗。
about.sc: 来自韩国的百味堂传承了母公司南阳乳业自1964年成立以来对奶类产品的悠久专业，其皇牌的牛奶雪糕便是以由农场直送的100%有机奶所制成，奶香浓郁、甜味纯粹，每一口的雪糕都可让你感受到农民的诚意和大自然最新鲜的味道。百味堂致力以味觉和视觉均无与伦比的艺术甜点为大众带来与别不同的湛新甜点体验。

about.en:
Baleno regards “value-for-money” as its key brand positioning through offering diversified and mass apparel designs for mixing and matching with ease, high product quality at competitive prices, superior customer services as well as fresh and comfortable shopping environment.

Simplicity in design, comfort in fashion, functionality and quality in textile are the key tactics adopted by Baleno to differentiate its products from the casual wear market.

With successful rebranding tactics, accurate marketing strategies, non-stop new product research and development, Baleno becomes one of the most rapidly growing brands in the casual wear market and currently operates over 2,500 stores in various regions, such as Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau, Singapore, Russia, Mongolia, Nepal, Armenia, Mauritius, Cambodia, etc.
about.tc:
Baleno屹立至今以「物超所值」作為品牌定位的核心主幹，提供多樣化及貼合主流的服飾設計、易於配搭的款式、高性價比的產品、優越的顧客服務和清新舒坦的購物環境。秉持以簡約元素、舒適時尚、產品功能及品質持續優化主導拓展策略，讓Baleno產品快速搶佔市場，傲視同儕。 

憑藉清晰而成功的品牌重塑策略、精準的市場策劃、對產品研究及開發堅持不懈的信念，Baleno迅速躍升成為擴展最快的休閒服裝品牌之一，現時店鋪零售網路逾2,500間，遍佈多國地區，包括中國內地、香港、澳門、新加坡、俄羅斯、蒙古、尼泊爾、亞美尼亞、模里西斯等。
about.sc:
Baleno屹立至今以「物超所值」作为品牌定位的核心主干，提供多样化及贴合主流的服饰设计、易于配搭的款式、高性价比的产品、优越的顾客服务和清新舒坦的购物环境。秉持以简约元素、舒适时尚、产品功能及品质持续优化主导拓展策略，让Baleno产品快速抢占市场，傲视同侪。

凭藉清晰而成功的品牌重塑策略、精准的市场策划、对产品研究及开发坚持不懈的信念，Baleno迅速跃升成为扩展最快的休闲服装品牌之一，现时店铺零售网络逾2,500间，遍布多国地区，包括中国内地、香港、澳门、新加坡、俄罗斯、蒙古、尼泊尔、亚美尼亚、毛里求斯等。

about.en: Savour the essence of health & beauty with every steaming pot of soup at Beauty in The Pot. Inspired by the culture of food for health, the menu presents our own creation of nourishing soup bases, which includes the all-time favourite Beauty Collagen Broth and Spicy Nourishing Broth, with an array of premium ingredients and homemade specialties prepared by a team of skilful chefs. A divine experience of culinary finesse awaits diners at Beauty in The Pot.
about.tc: 獨特概念受到健康飲食文化的啟發，以招牌養生美顏湯底及新鮮食材集合四川的麻辣香料、台灣的藥膳湯底及日本涮涮鍋文化，成功打破傳統火鍋界限，將創新食材與傳統飲食文化的精髓融為一體。菜單由廚師團隊精心策劃，提供多種新鮮食材與手製火鍋用料，選擇多樣。美滋鍋的室內裝飾明亮優雅而溫馨舒悅，適合各類休閒和私人聚餐，食客可在一個輕鬆舒適的環境中享用美食。
about.sc: 独特概念受到健康饮食文化的启发，以招牌养生美颜汤底及新鲜食材集合四川的麻辣香料、台湾的药膳汤底及日本涮涮锅文化，成功打破传统火锅界限，将创新食材与传统饮食文化的精髓融为一体。菜单由厨师团队精心策划，提供多种新鲜食材与手制火锅用料，选择多样。美滋锅的室内装饰明亮优雅而温馨舒悦，适合各类休闲和私人聚餐，食客可在一个轻松舒适的环境中享用美食。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to BEAUTYSAUR at Fashion Walk. We are a unique fusion of indoor and outdoor elements at the heart of Causeway Bay, embracing three vibrant streets – Paterson, Food Street and Kingston.
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到Fashion Walk的BEAUTYSAUR。Fashion Walk是匯聚時尚、品味生活及國際美饌的潮流熱點，提供獨特的室內及室外購物環境，涵蓋三大區域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到Fashion Walk的BEAUTYSAUR。Fashion Walk是汇聚时尚、品味生活及国际美馔的潮流热点，提供独特的室内及室外购物环境，涵盖三大区域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。

about.en: Bee Cheng Hiang, is renowned for its barbeque meat snack series. With over 370 outlets in Hong Kong, Mainland China, Taiwan, Singapore, Korea, Japan, Malaysia, Indonesia, Vietnam and The Philippines, this food expert prided itself in providing customers with quality food.
about.tc: 美珍香，專售豬肉乾及同類小食，品牌本著以客為先的原則，在亞洲廣受歡迎，超過370間分店編布香港、中國內地、台灣、新加坡、韓國、日本、馬來西亞、印度尼西亞、越南及菲律賓等地。
about.sc: 美珍香，专售猪肉干及同类小食，品牌本着以客为先的原则，在亚洲广受欢迎，超过370间分店编布香港、中国内地、台湾、新加坡、韩国、日本、马来西亚、印度尼西亚、越南及菲律宾等地。

metaDescription.en: Bee Cheng Hiang, is renowned for its barbeque meat snack series, this food expert prided itself in providing customers with quality food. Ideally located atop the famous attraction in Hong Kong, Victoria Peak, The Peak Galleria is an extensive shopping and dining complex complemented by various exciting activities.
metaDescription.sc: 美珍香，专售猪肉乾及同类小食，品牌本著以客为先的原则，在亚洲广受欢迎，超过370间分店编佈香港、中国内地、臺湾、新加坡、韩国、日本、马来西亚、印尼、越南及菲律宾等地。欢迎来到山顶广场的美珍香。山顶广场位于香港的著名旅游胜地太平山顶，提供丰富的购物及餐饮选择，并引进各行业中具代表性的主题馆，定位成为本地及海外游客的必到景点。
metaDescription.tc: 美珍香，專售豬肉乾及同類小食，品牌本著以客為先的原則，在亞洲廣受歡迎，超過370間分店編佈香港、中國內地、臺灣、新加坡、韓國、日本、馬來西亞、印尼、越及菲律賓等地。歡迎來到山頂廣場的美珍香。山頂廣場位於香港的著名旅游勝地太平山頂，提供豐富的購物及餐飲選擇，並引進各行業中具代表性的主題館，定位成為本地及海外游客的必到景點。

about.en: Beijing Tong Ren Tang has its business on five continents and operates about 140* retail branches in 28* countries and regions overseas. Besides, TRTCM has the research and development production plant at Tai Po Industrial Estate in Hong Kong, its modern facilities complied with the local and international accreditation including GMP and ISO 22000:2005 certification as well as the standard of Department of Health in Hong Kong.
about.tc: 北京同仁堂的業務已經遍佈五大洲，在中國內地以外28*個國家和地區，開辦各種零售終端(藥店、中醫診所和中醫概念的養生中心)約140*家；在香港大埔工業村，設有中成藥及養生保健品的生產研發基地，廠房通過多項本地和國際品質認證(包括GMP和ISO22000:2005 )，並符合香港衛生署認可標準，設備現代化。
about.sc: 北京同仁堂的业务已经遍布五大洲，在中国内地以外28*个国家和地区，开办各种零售终端(药店、中医诊所和中医概念的养生中心)约140*家；在香港大埔工业村，设有中成药及养生保健品的生产研发基地，厂房通过多项本地和国际质量认证(包括GMP和ISO22000:2005 )，并符合香港卫生署认可标准，设备现代化。

about.en: Established In 2013, Best Mart 360˚ has over 110 branches in prestigious shopping areas across Hong Kong. With mission of providing products with “Best Quality” , “Best Prices”, we insist on developing “Global Procurement” network with overseas suppliers, providing an exquisite shopping experience for our customers. We carry various categories, including Chocolate and Confectioneries, Nuts and Dried Fruits, Beverages and Wines as well as Grocery. Frozen and Chilled products are available at selected stores.
about.tc: 優品360˚成立於2013年，至今已在全港各優越的購物地段開設超過110間分店。我們以「優質」、「優價」為宗旨，堅持環球採購的理念，務求為顧客提供更多元化的選擇及更舒適的購物體驗。於店內設有多個產品區域，包括朱古力及糖果，堅果及乾果，飲品及酒類，糧油雜貨等，部分店舖更增設急凍及冷藏食品。
about.sc: 优品360˚成立于2013年，至今已在全港各优越的购物地段开设超过110间分店。我们以「优质」、「优价」为宗旨，坚持环球采购的理念，务求为顾客提供更多元化的选择及更舒适的购物体验。于店内设有多个产品区域，包括朱古力及糖果，坚果及干果，饮品及酒类，粮油杂货等，部分店铺更增设急冻及冷藏食品。

name.tc: Bloom Dance Academy兒童流行舞蹈學院
name.sc: Bloom Dance Academy儿童流行舞蹈学院

about.en:
Bloom Dance Academy is a children's dance academy that offers a variety of professional dance classes for students aged 2 to 16 years old, including kids’ dance course, for example, Jazz Funk and Hip-Hop and etc.

Our Academy puts great emphasis to the development of the student as a whole. We strongly believe that through a wide range of performance opportunities, we can cultivate the positive artistic accomplishments and self-confidence of our students.  

In previous years, we have led our students to participate in different types of dance performances; including TVB shooting program “Cultural Engine 4U”, Central and Western District Countdown Show for the New Year, Standard Chartered Arts In The Park, Volvo Ocean Race and Hong Kong Book Fair etc.
about.tc:
Bloom Dance Academy兒童流行舞蹈學院，提供不同類型的專業舞蹈課程予2至16歲學員，包括流行爵士舞班（Jazz Funk）以及嘻哈舞班（Hip-Hop）。

本院十分重視學員的全人發展，為增加學生的演出經驗，讓他們在舞台上發光發亮，我們會在不同節日安排學員作舞蹈表演。我們深信通過多元化的表演機會，可以培養出學員們正面的藝術修養和勇於表達的自信心。

在過去，本院已經帶領着一眾學員參與了不同類型的舞蹈演出，包括【TVB《文化新領域》錄影活動】、【中西區除夕倒數夜】、【渣打藝趣嘉年華】、【Volvo Ocean Race環球帆船賽暨帆船嘉年華】、【香港書展】表演等等。
about.sc:
Bloom Dance Academy儿童流行舞蹈学院，提供不同类型的专业舞蹈课程予2至16岁学员，包括流行爵士舞班（Jazz Funk）以及嘻哈舞班（Hip-Hop）。

本院十分重视学员的全人发展，为增加学生的演出经验，让他们在舞台上发光发亮，我们会在不同节日安排学员作舞蹈表演。我们深信通过多元化的表演机会，可以培养出学员们正面的艺术修养和勇于表达的自信心。

在过去，本院已经带领着一众学员参与了不同类型的舞蹈演出，包括【TVB《文化新领域》录影活动】、【中西区除夕倒数夜】、【渣打艺趣嘉年华】、【Volvo Ocean Race环球帆船赛暨帆船嘉年华】、【香港书展】表演等等。

about.en: BodiBra deeply believes that outer beauty starts from the inside, we distinguishes itself from all other lingerie, only focus on the color and style. From My Heart Lingerie Store to present, all BodiBra lingerie is handmade.
about.tc: 健康線條，才是美的根源。有別於坊間的內衣，設計著重於胸圍款式，只能做到表面承托，壓扁胸部。由「買錯胸圍帶錯Bra」的心心到現在，取得外觀設計專利的BodiBra美體功能內衣，均由人手剪裁及縫製。
about.sc: 健康线条，才是美的根源。有别于坊间的内衣，设计着重于胸围款式，只能做到表面承托，压扁胸部。由「买错胸围带错Bra」的心心到现在，取得外观设计专利的BodiBra 美体功能内衣，均由人手剪裁及缝制。

about.en:
Brilliant Education Centre was founded in 1996. The majority of teachers are university graduates and postgraduates. There are more than 30 experienced,  local teachers and NET. 

The centre insists on offering small class teaching. Tailor made curriculum is dedicated for catering to the needs of individual student.
about.tc:
翹英教育中心創校於一九九六年。導師大都擁有大學及以上資歷，合共超過三十名富教學經驗的本地及外國導師，致力對家長及學生展現出熱誠和專業。我們堅持以小班教學的授課形式，因材而施教予翹英每一個莘莘學子。

中心提供幼稚園，小學，初中及高中全科專科，STEM，ARTZ，CODING課程等等。

about.en: Bubble Wonderland, a concept pop up at Fashion Walk combining wine shop and wine tasting experience. Enjoy the bubbles and learn more about the popular sparkling wine from around the world, including Champagne, Prosecco, Cap Classique as well as those from Britain, Australia and New Zealand. To echo with an annual French gastronomy festival - "Le French GourMay",  Bubble Wonderland brings an array of beautiful French wines and delicacy to foodies during mid April to early May.
about.tc: Bubble Wonderland 是一個結合美酒及品酒體驗的快閃概念店, 匯集了全球各地的氣泡酒，當中包括：法國香檳、意大利Prosecco，西班牙Cava，南非Cap Classique 以及來自英國、澳洲、紐西蘭的氣泡酒。為響應年度盛大節目「法國五月美食薈」，Bubble Wonderland 於四月中旬至五月上旬特別帶來更多法國美酒佳餚。
about.sc: Bubble Wonderland 是一个结合美酒及品酒体验的快闪概念店, 汇集了全球各地的气泡酒，当中包括：法国香槟、意大利Prosecco，西班牙Cava，南非Cap Classique 以及来自英国、澳洲、纽西兰的气泡酒。为响应年度盛大节目「法国五月美食荟」，Bubble Wonderland 于四月中旬至五月上旬特别带来更多法国美酒佳肴。

about.en: Build-A-Bear Workshop is a one-of-a-kind global brand to let customers to create their stuffed animals with unique experiences. The brand originates in St. Louis, MO, US since 1997 and develops into a global operation that owns 500 stores now. Children and adults have created over 170 million furry friends in the stores altogether. Our vision is to provide every customers an unforgettable “Experience First” interactive experience via Furry Friends.
about.tc: 金泰迪工作室(Build-A-Bear Workshop)是一個顧客自己動手做的玩具的全球性領頭品牌。自1997年美國聖劉易斯創辦品牌以來，成功發展至世界各地擁有700家店的國際品牌，全世界的大小朋友在其店內已創造了共1. 7億個毛絨朋友。 30多種卡通動物形象可選擇及製作、數百種琳瑯滿目的服裝和配件可以選擇，打造專屬的個性化互動毛絨朋友，目標是給全世界每一個顧客都帶來獨一無二的「體驗至上」的地方，夢想和個性化的玩偶在此誕生！
about.sc: 金泰迪工作室(Build-A-Bear Workshop)是一个顾客自己动手做的玩具的全球性领头品牌。自1997年美国圣刘易斯创办品牌以来，成功发展至世界各地拥有700家店的国际品牌，全世界的大小朋友在其店内已创造了共1. 7亿个毛绒朋友。30多种卡通动物形象可选择及制作、数百种琳琅满目的服装和配件可以选择，打造专属的个性化互动毛绒朋友，目标是给全世界每一个顾客都带来独一无二的「体验至上」的地方，梦想和个性化的玩偶在此诞生！

metaDescription.en: Build-A-Bear Workshop is a global brand to let customers to create their stuffed animals with unique experiences. Ideally located atop the famous attraction in Hong Kong, Victoria Peak, The Peak Galleria is an extensive shopping and dining complex complemented by various exciting activities.

about.en:
CAMELA stands for superiority, elegance and glamour. Through her sophisticated pattern design, delicate materials and well-tailored cutting, CAMELA weaves a signature style that transforms the splashes of colour into grace and charisma. With these unique qualities, it is only natural that CAMELA has been much sought after in recent decades. 

CAMELA opened her first store in 1977 and has now grown into an extensive network in major shopping malls in Hong Kong, Macau and China. CAMELA is always passionately committed to innovative knitwear design and first-class sales services to cater for the ever-growing needs of customers across the globe.
about.tc:
CAMELA在1977年開設首間店舖，揉合傳統工藝和嶄新編織科技，將變化萬千的圖案融於設計之中，烘托出女仕們柔美之氣質。CAMELA的優質、高雅、雍容已享譽盛名。其優雅的圖案設計、考究的質料與舒適的剪裁，交織出CAMELA旗幟鮮明的品牌形象，一直深受女士們的推崇。 

CAMELA現於香港、澳門設有多個零售點，遍佈各大購物商場。隨著對顧客及市場需求的日趨瞭解，CAMELA未來將不斷提高產品與服務的質素，務求使顧客能盡享購物樂趣。
about.sc:
CAMELA在1977年开设首间店铺，揉合传统工艺和崭新编织科技，将变化万千的图案融于设计之中，烘托出女仕们柔美之气质。CAMELA的优质、高雅、雍容已享誉盛名。其优雅的图案设计、考究的质料与舒适的剪裁，交织出CAMELA旗帜鲜明的品牌形象，一直深受女士们的推崇。 

CAMELA现于香港、澳门设有多个零售点，遍布各大购物商场。随着对顾客及市场需求的日趋了解，CAMELA未来将不断提高产品与服务的质素，务求使顾客能尽享购物乐趣。

about.en: CANVAS is an Australian skincare brand insists on delivering the benefits of aromatherapy intelligence through high percentage of natural and organic ingredients, to protect and restore your authentic beauty from within. CANVAS lists the composition of all organic and natural ingredients on every product packaging and excludes harmful chemicals in the manufacturing process to demonstrate our commitment to product safety and quality.
about.tc: 澳洲有機香薰美學專家CANVAS嚴選天然有機珍稀草本成分，融匯品牌獨有香薰美學智慧，研發出一系列蘊含90%以上天然有機成分的香薰油及護膚產品(天然清爽透薄防曬乳液SPF30除外)。每件產品標籤都清楚列明其天然有機成分的百分比，令香薰愛好者都能體驗安全、高效而且值得信賴的護膚產品，為身心靈提供至臻呵護。
about.sc: 澳洲有机香薰美学专家CANVAS严选天然有机珍稀草本成分，融汇品牌独有香薰美学智能，研发出一系列蕴含90%以上天然有机成分的香薰油及护肤产品(天然清爽透薄防晒乳液SPF30除外)。每件产品卷标都清楚列明其天然有机成分的百分比，令香薰爱好者都能体验安全、高效而且值得信赖的护肤产品，为身心灵提供至臻呵护。

about.en:
CD Warehouse has been established in Hong Kong for more than 28 years. It currently has 13 branches in Hong Kong, Kowloon and the New Territories. Since the branches are close to the MTR line, customers can purchase their favorite products more conveniently. 

Since then, CD Warehouse has developed into a chain retail store of video and music discs with the most branches in Hong Kong. Its business is mainly engaged in the sale of music and video entertainment products, with a wide variety of products, ranging from local singers to foreign bands, fever music to international pop music, etc. The total stock of CDs is more than 180,000, and all products are classified and clearly displayed in each branch, so that customers can more easily find their favorite music and film products. 

In addition to the original audio-visual CDs, CD Warehouse also provides customers with a wide range of related products, such as audio-visual accessories, electronic products and music magazines... to meet the needs of different types of customers. With the change and development of the times, the emergence of Blu-ray discs "Blu-ray" and high-quality video discs "HDCD", CD Warehouse also introduces these new types of software for customers. There are now more than 500 models available for customers Purchase. In addition, the audiophile DVDs and DVDs, which have always been loved by audiophile music lovers, CD Warehouse also provides subscription services for different customers to meet their needs.
about.tc:
CD Warehouse已在香港成立超過28年。目前，它在香港，九龍和新界設有13個分店。由於分店靠近地鐵站，因此客戶可以更方便地購買自己喜歡的產品。

從那時起，CD Warehouse已發展成為在香港擁有最多分店的視頻和音樂光盤的連鎖零售商店。其業務主要從事音樂和視頻娛樂產品的銷售，產品範圍很廣，從本地歌手到外國樂隊，從發燒音樂到國際流行音樂等。CD的總存量超過18萬張，並且所有產品均經過分類，並在每個分店中清晰展示，從而使客戶可以更輕鬆地找到自己喜歡的音樂和電影產品。

除了原始的視聽CD,DVD外，CD Warehouse還為客戶提供廣泛的相關產品，例如黑膠唱片, 視聽配件，電子產品和音樂雜誌...，以滿足不同類型客戶的需求。CD Warehouse還為客戶提供訂購服務。
about.sc:
CD Warehouse已在香港成立超过28年。目前，它在香港，九龙和新界设有13个分店。由于分店靠近地铁站，因此客户可以更方便地购买自己喜欢的产品。

从那时起，CD Warehouse已发展成为在香港拥有最多分店的视频和音乐光盘的连锁零售商店。其业务主要从事音乐和视频娱乐产品的销售，产品范围很广，从本地歌手到外国乐队，从发烧音乐到国际流行音乐等。 CD的总存量超过18万张，并且所有产品均经过分类，并在每个分店中清晰展示，从而使客户可以更轻松地找到自己喜欢的音乐和电影产品。

除了原始的视听CD,DVD外，CD Warehouse还为客户提供广泛的相关产品，例如黑胶唱片, 视听配件，电子产品和音乐杂志...，以满足不同类型客户的需求。 CD Warehouse还为客户提供订购服务。

metaDescription.en: CD Warehouse is mainly engaged in the sale of music and video entertainment products, with a wide variety of products, ranging from local singers to foreign bands, fever music to international pop music, etc.
metaDescription.tc: CD Warehouse 業務主要經營售賣音樂及影視娛樂產品，由本地歌手至外國樂隊，發燒音樂至國際流行音樂等。CD Warehouse 亦有為不同的客人提供訂購服務，藉以滿足客人的需求。
metaDescription.sc: CD Warehouse 业务主要经营售卖音乐及影视娱乐产品，由本地歌手至外国乐队，发烧音乐至国际流行音乐等。CD Warehouse 亦有为不同的客人提供订购服务，藉以满足客人的需求。

about.en:
Since its founding in 1918 in Japan, CITIZEN WATCH has been a true manufacture d'horlogerie with a comprehensive manufacturing process from creating a watch’s individual components to its final assembly. 

CITIZEN has held the belief of “Better Starts Now” to create technologies and explore the future of watches such as our proprietary light-powered Eco-Drive technology and state-of-the-art satellite-synchronized timekeeping.
about.tc:
CITIZEN自1918年於日本成立，是一家專業的綜合型腕錶廠商，全面囊括從單一元件製造到腕錶組裝的工序。

CITIZEN始終堅持「Better Starts Now」品牌信念去製造腕錶，研發出光動能核心技術及衛星同步對時等先進科技。
about.sc:
CITIZEN自1918年于日本成立，是一家专业的综合型手表厂商，全面囊括从单一元件制造到镶嵌组装的程序。

CITIZEN始终坚持“立即开始更好”品牌信念去制造耳环，研发出光动能核心 技术及卫星同步对时等先进科技。

about.en:
COS is a fashion brand for women and men who want modern, functional, considered design.

Offering reinvented classics and wardrobe essentials, we create pieces that are made to last beyond the season. Traditional methods and new techniques merge to form timeless, understated collections.
about.tc:
COS是一家時裝品牌，為女士和男士帶來現代、實用、精巧的設計。

COS結合傳統工藝與全新技術，打造無懼時間考驗的雋永系列，帶來經典重塑和基礎單品。藝術與設計是COS的核心，是我們歷久彌新的服飾系列和匠心設計的門店空間背後的靈感泉源，融貫一切。
about.sc:
COS是一家时装品牌，为女士和男士带来现代、实用、精巧的设计。

COS结合传统工艺与全新技术，打造无惧时间考验的隽永系列，带来经典重塑和基础单品。艺术与设计是COS的核心，是我们历久弥新的服饰系列和匠心设计的门店空间背后的灵感泉源，融贯一切。

about.en:
A new generation of health stores
China Resources Church is a retail chain store that specializes in providing health products and health services to customers. It is a subsidiary of China Resources Pharmaceutical Commercial Group. It currently has more than 150 branches in Hong Kong and the Mainland. Based on the Chinese theory of conditioning and nourishing and combining modern nutrition standards, China Resources Tang provides customers with ginseng supplements such as bird's nest and cordyceps, health foods, vitamins and minerals and other supplements. It also provides some Chinese and Western patent medicines and personal care products.
about.tc:
新一代健康品類店
華潤堂是專門爲顧客提供健康産品和健康服務的零售連鎖店，是華潤醫藥商業集團附屬公司，現時於香港及內地擁有超過150間分店。華潤堂以中華的調理滋補理論爲宗，結合現代營養標準，爲顧客提供燕窩、冬蟲夏草等參茸補品，健康食品，維他命和礦物質等補充劑，還提供部分中西成藥和個人護理品。

about.en: Cafe Match Box gives off a nostalgic feel with 1970s minibus seating to give a new lease on life to the pop "Bing-Sutt" culture in the midst of the buzz of today's Hong Kong. Among customers' favorite choices, the Chicken Pot Pie, served with green puddle of pea soup is one of the cafe's proud creations.
about.tc:
冰室內以70年代小巴，舊大丸百貨，殖民地辦公廳和學校教室作主題。鋪外則提供雍雅山房雅座，七彩太陽傘，更設有乒乓球台、康樂棋等懷舊玩意，令客人重拾舊有回憶之同時，更產生互動的功效於喜喜冰室內享受美食，一同懷緬昔日銅鑼灣光輝歲月。

喜喜食物出品在乎誠意，以懷舊作籃本，款式應有盡有，用料上乘，傳統中見創意，中西彙聚；自創了雞批浮台，非常特別，簡單實際，亦成為喜喜【鎮店之寶】。
about.sc:
“冰室内以70年代小巴，旧大丸百货，殖民地办公厅和学校教室作主题。铺外则提供雍雅山房雅座，七彩太阳伞，更配备乒乓波台，康乐棋等怀旧玩意，令客人重拾旧有回忆之同时更容易产生互动的功效于喜喜冰室内享受美食，一起怀缅昔日铜锣湾光辉岁月。

喜喜食物出品在乎诚意，以怀旧作篮本，款式应有尽有，用料上乘，传统中见创意，中西汇聚；除非了鸡批浮台，非常特别，简单实际，亦成为喜喜【镇店之宝】。

The comfortable environment, quality service and good value of money provided at our shop will enable you to have “A Hundred Points of Excellent” dining experience.

about.en:
CARBALI, we belong to a youth fashion brand. We believe that everyone is unique, that is why we want to instil our ideas into the younger generation, by allowing each and every one of them to be unique through clothing and fashion. 

By being unique, people will have a sense of unconstrained thinking and not to be tied to any restraints. We grow with our young generation who are exploring their personalities, values, and senses of fashion. With this mentality, it is what makes us CARBALI, in hopes of inspiring everyone to be unique in their own ways.
about.tc:
CARBALI，我們屬於一個青年時尚品牌。我們相信每個人都是獨一無二的，這就是為什麼我們希望通過允許每個人的服裝和時尚不受限制來將我們的思想灌輸給年輕一代的原因。通過獨特，人們將具有不受約束的思維意識，而不受束縛。 

我們與年輕一代一起成長，他們正在探索理論個性，魅力和時尚感。以這種心態，這就是使我們成為CARBALI的原因，希望激發每個人以自己的方式變得獨特。
about.sc:
CARBALI，我们属于一个青年时尚品牌。我们相信每个人都是独一无二的，这就是为什么我们希望通过允许每个人的服装和时尚不受限制来将我们的思想灌输给年轻一代的原因。通过独特，人们将具有不受约束的思维意识，而不受束缚。 

我们与年轻一代一起成长，他们正在探索理论个性，魅力和时尚感。以这种心态，这就是使我们成为CARBALI的原因，希望激发每个人以自己的方式变得独特。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Carbali at Gala Place. Gala Place showcases diversified services and products including chic fashion, outdoor gear, skincare and cosmetics, lifestyle products, audio and digital gadgets, beauticians, telecommunications centers, and a home design house as well as a smorgasbord of new and enticing food and beverage offerings.
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到家乐坊的Carbali。家乐云集一众特色概念店，包括潮流服饰、户外用品、护肤及美妆用品、家居精品、影音及电子产品、美容服务、家居设计及电讯服务等；同时，新增的饮食楼层，也网罗多间主题食肆，打造旺角时尚优閒购物新据点。

about.en: Centaline Property provides real estate agency services in the sectors of residential properties, commercial properties, private lands, and car park spaces, both in new development and second-hand markets. Besides, there are professional and value-added services including surveying, valuation, real estate tender, auction, property mergers and acquisitions, mortgage broking and immigration/ emigration consultancy, etc. in order to provide customers with one-stop agency services.
about.tc: 中原地產代理有限公司提供住宅、工商舖及車位代理服務，覆蓋本地的新盤及二手市場。而項目服務亦包括收購合併及屋地買賣。同時，中原地產亦提供相關的專業及增值服務，包括：測量估價、招標拍賣、資產管理、按揭轉介、移民顧問等，全面為客戶提供一條龍代理服務。

about.en:
Charlotte Tilbury, the makeup artist to the stars, presents the NEW! GIFTING BEAUTY UNIVERSE for the magic holiday season. This winter, embark a Beauty Journey to the British style “WE ARE ALL STARS! Holiday Wonderland!” from November 6 to December 31, 2021.

Come and enjoy an exclusive welcome gift, event games and other promotional offers! Don't miss the chance to reach the stars!

about.en:
Chateraise has 480 branches in Japan and has launched more than 500 kinds of products. The raw materials for desserts are Hokkaido cream, Tokachi red beans, Yamanashi eggs and other Japanese products are provided by our contract farm, and manufactured at our own factory in Japan, to ensure that it brings our customers fresh, safe, natural and delicious desserts.

Our Hong Kong branch has more than one hundred dessert styles, including puffs, cakes, wagashi, yakigashi, ice bars, jelly, etc.
about.tc:
Chateraise於日本設有480間分店及推出超過500種商品，甜點的原材料由北海道忌廉、十勝紅豆、山梨縣雞蛋等日本的契約農場提供，再由日本自家工廠製造，確保帶給客人新鮮、安全、天然而美味的甜點。 

香港分店甜點款式過百款，有泡芙、蛋糕、和果子、燒果子、雪條、果凍等。

about.en:
Our carefully prepared curriculum comprehensively covers exam-taking skills in conversation, listening, reading and writing, so that your children can confidently take the exam and achieve the best results they should achieve. All courses are taught by foreign English teachers to ensure that all courses are taught in English. 

All the teachers in the school have many years of experience in teaching English. They use light-hearted teaching methods, with word cards, listening CDs, games, etc., to help students learn from the shallower to the deeper.
about.tc:

所有註校老師均有多年任教英語經驗，利用輕鬆手法教學，配合字卡、聽力 CD、遊戲等，幫助學生由淺入深的學習。

about.en:
China Construction Bank (Asia) Corporation Limited (“CCB (Asia)”) is the comprehensive and integrated commercial banking platform of China Construction Bank Corporation (“CCB”) in Hong Kong. CCB (Asia) offers a wide array of banking products and services to customers, including consumer banking services, commercial banking services, corporate banking services, private banking services, treasury business and cross-border financial services, etc.

For consumer banking, in addition to providing conventional transactional, foreign exchange and cash services, CCB (Asia) also offers deposits, loans (including personal loans, credit cards loan, residential mortgages and auto-financing), securities agency and investments (mutual fund and bond trading), consolidated banking, insurance (including life insurance, general insurance and insurance broker), MPF referral services, RMB services, credit card, electronic banking services (online and mobile banking), cross border services and safe deposit boxes services.
about.tc:
中國建設銀行(亞洲)股份有限公司(「建行(亞洲)」)為中國建設銀行股份有限公司(「建設銀行」)於香港地區的全功能綜合性商業銀行平台。建行(亞洲)為客戶提供多元化的銀行產品和服務，包括零售銀行服務、商業銀行服務、企業銀行服務、私人銀行服務、金融市場業務和跨境金融服務等。

零售銀行服務方面，建行(亞洲)除了提供傳統櫃檯、外匯及現金交易服務外，亦備有存款、貸款(包括私人貸款、信用卡貸款、住宅按揭貸款和汽車融資)、證券代理及投資(包括基金投資、債券買賣)、綜合理財、保險(包括人壽保險、一般保險、保險經紀)、強積金轉介服務、人民幣產品、信用卡、電子理財(網上銀行及手機銀行)、跨境金融服務及保管箱服務。
about.sc:
中国建设银行(亚洲)股份有限公司(「建行(亚洲)」)为中国建设银行股份有限公司(「建设银行」)于香港地区的全功能综合性商业银行平台。建行(亚洲)为客户提供多元化的银行产品和服务，包括零售银行服务、商业银行服务、企业银行服务、私人银行服务、金融市场业务和跨境金融服务等。

零售银行服务方面，建行(亚洲)除了提供传统柜台、外汇及现金交易服务外，亦备有存款、贷款(包括私人贷款、信用卡贷款、住宅按揭贷款和汽车融资)、证券代理及投资(包括基金投资、债券买卖)、综合理财、保险(包括人寿保险、一般保险、保险经纪)、强积金转介服务、人民币产品、信用卡、电子理财(网上银行及手机银行)、跨境金融服务及保管箱服务。

about.en:
For over 80 years, Chow Sang Sang has captured the hearts of millions with its exquisite jewellery collections. Inspired by its philosophy of “Sustained Vitality, Ever Rejuvenated” and driven by a relentless pursuit of perfection, the brand has become an icon of design, craftsmanship, quality and professional service. 

Today, Chow Sang Sang continues to ignite the imagination by blending timeless traditions, contemporary artistry and innovative technology into every one of its creations.
about.tc:
凝聚80多年的悠久歷史，周生生憑藉精湛的珠寶工藝，聚焦品味人士目光。秉持「周而復始 生生不息」的品牌理念，以及對完美的堅持與追求，周生生品牌已成為優質工藝、卓越品質及專業服務的標誌。

時至今日，周生生每一件華美璀璨的珠寶飾品，都糅合著經典、時尚及創新的元素，時刻散發迷人光芒。
about.sc:
凝聚80多年的悠久历史，周生生凭藉精湛的珠宝工艺，聚焦品味人士目光。秉持「周而复始 生生不息」的品牌理念，以及对完美的坚持与追求，周生生品牌已成为优质工艺、卓越品质及专业服务的标志。

时至今日，周生生每一件华美璀璨的珠宝饰品，都糅合著经典、时尚及创新的元素，时刻散发迷人光芒。

about.en:
Founded in 1929, CHOW TAI FOOK has been widely recognized for its trustworthiness and authenticity, and is renowned for its product design, quality and value. CHOW TAI FOOK JEWELLERY features two store layouts, Mainstream Shops and Experience Shops, to meet different consumer needs. 

CHOW TAI FOOK JEWELLERY offers four core product categories, namely classic, fashion, wedding, and exclusive, catering to customers’ every need. Classic products feature time-tested designs. Fashion accessories are the perfect complements to trendy apparels. Our signature wedding jewellery products celebrate the couple’s matrimony and life together. 

CHOW TAI FOOK JEWELLERY also collaborates with various brands to launch exclusive products, providing customers with innovative and diversified product offerings.
about.tc:
周大福創立於1929年，廣被認同為信譽及正貨象徵，並以產品設計、品質與價值聞名。為迎合消費者不同的需求，周大福珠寶設主流店及體驗店兩大店舖風格。

周大福珠寶針對顧客的不同需求提供四大產品類別，分別為經典、時尚、婚嫁及獨家。經典產品給顧客一種歷久常新的感覺。時尚首飾利用新潮的設計讓珠寶融入日常時裝配搭。婚嫁產品陪伴著新人走進人生的新一頁。

周大福珠寶亦透過與其他品牌合作，推出獨家產品，為顧客帶來創新及多元化的產品選擇。
about.sc:
周大福创立于1929年，广被认同为信誉及正货象征，并以产品设计、品质与价值闻名。为迎合消费者不同的需求，周大福珠宝设主流店及体验店两大店铺风格。

周大福珠宝针对顾客的不同需求提供四大产品类别，分别为经典、时尚、婚嫁及独家。经典产品给顾客一种历久常新的感觉。时尚首饰利用新潮的设计让珠宝融入日常时装配搭。婚嫁产品陪伴着新人走进人生的新一页。

周大福珠宝亦透过与其他品牌合作，推出独家产品，为顾客带来创新及多元化的产品选择。

about.en:
Founded in 1983, Chun Shui Tang envisions the tradition of tea enjoyment back in Tang and Song Dynasty with modern interpretation. By innovatively using cocktail shaker to create the world’s first hand-shaken iced tea and bubble tea, it has become a sensation not only in Taiwan but all around the world. 

Throughout the 35 years, Chun Shui Tang has been taking quality control as its priority. From using premium tea leaves, top class Taiwanese sugar cane to the all natural “pearl”, a.k.a. tapioca balls, without preservative and additive, every glass of tea is made by our well-trained tea-maker, ensuring tea lovers will enjoy the purely tasty yet healthy beverage.
about.tc:
成立於1983年，春水堂傳承了唐宋年代的茶飲文化，創意地透過"雪克器"(Shaker) 調製冷飲茶，創造出世界首杯台式 "泡沫紅茶" 和 "珍珠奶茶"，迅即風行台灣，至今全球大受歡迎。 

35年以來春水堂對做茶的嚴謹態度始終如一，選用上盛的茶葉泡茶，加入台灣頂級蔗糖和純天然樹薯粉做的 "珍珠"，絕不含防腐劑和香精，再由經嚴格訓練的調茶師調茶，與顧客分享美味而純淨的健康茶飲。
about.sc:
成立于1983年，春水堂传承了唐宋年代的茶饮文化，创意地透过“雪克器”（Shaker）调制冷饮茶，创造出世界首杯台式“泡沫红茶”和“珍珠奶茶”，迅即风行台湾，至今全球大受欢迎。

35年以来春水堂对做茶的严谨态度始终如一，替代上盛的茶叶泡茶，加入台湾顶级蔗糖和纯天然树薯粉做的“珍珠”，绝不含防腐剂 和香精，再由经严格训练的调茶师调茶，与顾客分享美味而纯净的健康茶饮。

metaDescription.en: By innovatively using cocktail shaker to create the world’s first hand-shaken iced tea and bubble tea, Chun Shui Tang has become a sensation not only in Taiwan but all around the world.

about.en:
Established in 1985, City Chain is the first watch retail chain in Hong Kong, and a wholly owned subsidiary of Stelux Holdings International Limited. Stelux was founded in 1963 as one of the earliest watch component manufacturers in the Far East and has grown to become an integrated watch group, owning several Swiss watch brands, including Universal Genève, Cyma, Solvil et Titus and Catena. The Group also manufactures Swiss watch movements under the Catena brand. 

In 1972, Stelux was listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange (Stock Code: 00084.HK). Since opening its doors, City Chain has continuously developed its extensive store network, strong watch brand portfolio and industry-leading customer service, all in support of the vision to be the best watch retailer in Asia. The brand not only pioneered a new watch retailing culture in Hong Kong, but also gained a competitive edge by helping watch brand partners build their profile in local markets while enriching consumer choices. 

Over the years, City Chain has expanded its retail footprint beyond Hong Kong to Macau, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Mainland China, with nearly 300 locations across Asia. In recent years, City Chain has focused on the affordable luxury segment to capture the market potential of Asia’s burgeoning middle class. The brand has continued its pursuit of innovative retailing, product diversity and quality, e-commerce development and further strengthening its reach and appeal in the region. It has also partnered with various international brands to offer customers a multifaceted retail experience. Committed to its industry leadership and culture of customer-oriented service, City Chain has consistently invested in staff development. Front-line staff members are empowered with training on the latest products, technologies, and emerging lifestyle trends. It also offers comprehensive after-sale service across its extensive network to customers, from receiving and tracking repairs to obtaining advice on maintenance.

In 2016, City Chain initiated a major revamp across all markets with the launch of new Lifestyle Concept stores. Lifestyle Concept stores are contemporary spaces that showcase City Chain’s diverse products spread across multiple zones, including a special corner for smart watches. The new stores have adopted an open design that features clean lines, earth tones and natural materials, creating a more inviting, spacious and dynamic retail experience. The revamp has injected fresh energy into City Chain’s commitment to partnering with prestigious international brands and seeking out trendsetting products to satisfy market demand and drive industry development.
about.tc:
時間廊於1985年成立，是寶光實業集團（國際）有限公司旗下的手錶零售品牌。寶光創立於1963年，是最早在遠東地區起家的手錶零件製造商之一。隨著業務不斷擴展，寶光發展成為一個綜合手錶集團，旗下擁有多個瑞士著名製錶品牌，包括宇宙（Universal Genève）、司馬（Cyma）、鐵達時（Solvil et Titus）和Catena。

集團亦以Catena品牌之名生產瑞士鐘錶機芯，並於1972年正式在香港聯交所上市（股份代號：00084.HK）。開業至今，時間廊不斷擴展其龐大銷售網絡、強勁品牌組合及領導業界的優質客戶服務，致力發展成為亞洲最佳手錶零售連鎖店。時間廊不僅在香港開創全新的手錶零售文化，亦協助手錶品牌伙伴在各地市場建立品牌形象，並藉此為消費者帶來更多選擇，讓時間廊更具競爭優勢。

多年來，時間廊的零售業務日益壯大，並成功擴展到香港以外的地方，店舖遍佈亞洲多個地區，包括澳門、新加坡、馬來西亞、泰國及中國大陸，分店數量多達300間。近年，亞洲中產階級市場迅速增長，時間廊緊握機遇致力發展輕奢華鐘錶市場。此外，時間廊亦不斷推出創新的零售方式、將產品和質量多元化、發展電子商務，以及在亞洲進一步強化品牌影響力和吸引力。時間廊亦與多個國際品牌合作，為客戶提供多方面的零售體驗。時間廊為堅守手錶零售行業的領導地位，及以客為先的服務文化，一直在員工培訓和發展方面投放大量資源。時間廊為前線服務人員提供有關最新產品、技術和生活潮流等專業培訓。另外，時間廊更透過其龐大銷售網絡向顧客提供全面售後服務，包括由維修到查詢維修狀況等。

時間廊於2016年在所有巿場推出全新時尚概念店，概念店劃分為不同區域展示各式產品，其中包括智能手錶專區。店舖設計注重空間感，以簡潔線條、大自然色系，以及天然材料，營造出舒適、開揚、富活力的購物體驗。新概念為時間廊注入嶄新動力，時間廊將會引入更多世界知名的手錶品牌，網羅潮流產品，以滿足市場需求，並推動行業持續發展。
about.sc:
时间廊于1985年成立，是宝光实业集团（国际）有限公司旗下的手表零售品牌。宝光创立于1963年，是最早在远东地区起家的手表零件制造商之一。随着业务不断扩展，宝光发展成为一个综合手表集团，旗下拥有多个瑞士著名制表品牌，包括宇宙（Universal Genève）、司马（Cyma）、铁达时（Solvil et Titus）和Catena。

集团亦以Catena品牌之名生产瑞士钟表机芯，并于1972年正式在香港联交所上市（股份代号：00084.HK）。开业至今，时间廊不断扩展其庞大销售网络、强劲品牌组合及领导业界的优质客户服务，致力发展成为亚洲最佳手表零售连锁店。时间廊不仅在香港开创全新的手表零售文化，亦协助手表品牌伙伴在各地市场建立品牌形象，并借此为消费者带来更多选择，让时间廊更具竞争优势。

多年来，时间廊的零售业务日益壮大，并成功扩展到香港以外的地方，店铺遍布亚洲多个地区，包括澳门、新加坡、马来西亚、泰国及中国大陆，分店数量多达300间。近年，亚洲中产阶级市场迅速增长，时间廊紧握机遇致力发展轻奢华钟表市场。此外，时间廊亦不断推出创新的零售方式、将产品和质量多元化、发展电子商务，以及在亚洲进一步强化品牌影响力和吸引力。时间廊亦与多个国际品牌合作，为客户提供多方面的零售体验。时间廊为坚守手表零售行业的领导地位，及以客为先的服务文化，一直在员工培训和发展方面投放大量资源。时间廊为前线服务人员提供有关最新产品、技术和生活潮流等专业培训。另外，时间廊更透过其庞大销售网络向顾客提供全面售后服务，包括由维修到查询维修状况等。

时间廊于2016年在所有巿场推出全新时尚概念店，概念店划分为不同区域展示各式产品，其中包括智能手表专区。店铺设计注重空间感，以简洁线条、大自然色系，以及天然材料，营造出舒适、开扬、富活力的购物体验。新概念为时间廊注入崭新动力，时间廊将会引入更多世界知名的手表品牌，网罗潮流产品，以满足市场需求，并推动行业持续发展。

about.en: Born to deliver on-trend, effortlessly cool and affordable fashion, Cotton On provides men and women the styles they want now, at the best price. Offering apparel and accessories, Cotton On is proud to be exporting the laid-back, quintessential modern Australian style to the world. Since opening their first store in 1991 in Australia, The Cotton On Group has seen rapid growth and now has over 1,300 stores, with a commitment to reach more people across the globe.
about.tc: 天生提供時尚，輕鬆時尚和價格適中的時尚，Cotton On以男女裝及最優惠的價格為主, 提供他們現在想要的款式。提供服裝和配飾，Cotton On自豪地將悠閒，經典的現代澳大利亞風格出口到世界各地。自1991年在澳大利亞開設第一家商店以來，Cotton On Group迅速發展，目前擁有1,300多家商店，並致力於覆蓋全球更多的人。
about.sc: 天生提供时尚，轻松时尚和价格适中的时尚，Cotton On以男女装及最优惠的价格为主，提供他们现在想要的款式。提供服装和配饰，Cotton On自豪地将悠闲，经典的现代澳大利亚风格出口到世界各地。自1991年在澳大利亚开设第一家商店以来，Cotton On Group迅速发展，目前拥有1,300多家商店，并致力于覆盖全球更多的人。

about.en: Revolutionizing the industry by combining hotpot and shake tea, CouCou offers customers an authentic yet novel Taiwanese culinary experience with its signature Taiwanese spicy hotpot and Da Hong Pao bubble tea. The theme of this store is inspired from Taiwanese Motorbike, the fascination and spirit of riders are crafty presented in stores. CouCou has become a popular venue for families and friends to gather and have a wonderful time together.
about.tc: 湊湊火鍋‧茶憩突破傳統，融合深具臺灣特色的火鍋和現搖茶，主打臺式麻辣鍋和大紅袍珍珠奶茶，為食客帶來正宗臺式餐飲體驗。此店選用寶島機車情懷作主題，將臺灣騎士精神的魅力和動感在店內不同空間呈現出來。
about.sc: 凑凑火锅‧茶憩突破传统，融合深具台湾特色的火锅和现摇茶，主打台式麻辣锅和大红袍珍珠奶茶，为食客带来正宗台式餐饮体验。此店选用宝岛机车情怀作主题，将台湾骑士精神的魅力和动感在店内不同空间呈现出来

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Coucou at Gala Place. Gala Place showcases diversified services and products including chic fashion, outdoor gear, skincare and cosmetics, lifestyle products, audio and digital gadgets as well as a smorgasbord of new and enticing food and beverage offerings. The ancient explanation of the Chinese character ‘COU’ is people gathering by the waterfront. It implies the great time spending with people of your choice.  Hot-pot meals can enhance relationship and connections as people sit around a pot, talking and eating. The warm atmosphere also helps people relax and feel comfortable.  We further extend the idea into our product offering by bringing hot-pot and bubble tea together for an amazing ‘cou-cou’ experience!
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到家乐坊的凑凑。家乐云集一众特色概念店，包括潮流服饰、户外用品、护肤及美妆用品、家居精品、影音及电子产品和新增的饮食楼层，也网罗多间主题食肆，打造旺角时尚优闲购物新据点。 在凑凑，能品尝正宗臺式火锅吃法：喝汤吃料调酱配饭、无限续加鸭血豆腐、锅底打包外带回家、完美体现臺式精神;新东方设计装潢风格以及亲切自然臺式服务，刷新体验，让情感更热络。  在凑凑，人们相聚举杯，为美好相聚沸腾。
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到家樂坊的湊湊。家樂雲集一眾特色概念店，包括潮流服飾、戶外用品、護膚及美妝用品、家居精品、影音及電子產品和新增的飲食樓層，也網羅多間主題食肆，打造旺角時尚優閒購物新據點。 在湊湊，能品嘗正宗臺式火鍋吃法：喝湯吃料調醬配飯、無限續加鴨血豆腐、鍋底打包外帶回家、完美體現臺式精神;新東方設計裝潢風格以及親切自然臺式服務，刷新體驗，讓情感更熱絡。  在湊湊，人們相聚舉杯，為美好相聚沸騰。

about.en: Founded by Mr. Liang Jianxiang in 2007, Creative Memory Academy is the first educational institution to introduce memory skills into Hong Kong. We take "Creative Memory and Fun Learning" as our purpose. We hope that children will no longer have difficulties in learning words and will love learning from now on.
about.tc: 創憶學坊於2007年由梁簡祥先生成立, 是首間將記憶技巧全面引入香港的教育機構。我們以「創意記憶趣味學習」為宗旨，期望幼兒學習文字不再困難，並且從此愛上學習。跟據年齡和學習目的，以多年豐富教學實踐經驗開辦不同課程，教授如何利用德國思維系統學習語言。
about.sc: 创忆学坊于2007年由梁简祥先生成立, 是首间将记忆技巧全面引入香港的教育机构。我们以「创意记忆趣味学习」为宗旨，期望幼儿学习文字不再困难，并且从此爱上学习。跟据年龄和学习目的，以多年丰富教学实践经验开办不同课程，教授如何利用德国思维系统学习语言。

about.en:
Crystal Link (Sandes Crystal Limited), a gems company established since 2001, having stores throughout Hong Kong with over 25,000 VIP members.

The company offers genuine gems from around the world and produces jewelries in trendy and elegant design. What is more, all jewelries can be tailor-made according to the customer’s needs.

Sandes Crystal Limited values every customer and strives to provide the best quality products at competitive price along with excellent service.

我們重視每一位客戶，致力提供優質的產品，以及完善的服務。

metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到康怡廣場的晶之緣。康怡廣場的生活設施完善，從特色食府、休閑咖啡室，以至電影院和書店，一應俱全，為一家大小帶來多採多姿的生活。

about.en: Cupfy (a play on 'cup-free') is all about being healthy and environmental friendly. The slogan 'Less sugar, more sweetness" means that all of the drinks are low in sugar – with some even suitable for vegans – and uses raw cane sugar as well as sugar-free maltitol as sweeteners.
about.tc: 走杯 Cupfy 來自「cup-free」，主打健康環保概念，提倡「少一分糖, 多一點甜」。除了天然蔗糖，還沿用 「無添加糖-麥芽糖醇 」（Sugar Free – Mal5tol）配方和燕麥奶等材料，適合不同飲食習慣的人士，包括需控制血糖的朋友。
about.sc: 走杯 Cupfy 来自「cup-free」，主打健康环保概念，提倡「少一分糖, 多一点甜」。除了天然蔗糖，还沿用 「无添加糖-麦芽糖醇 」（Sugar Free – Mal5tol）配方和燕麦奶等材料，适合不同饮食习惯的人士，包括需控制血糖的朋友。

about.en: Ever since its conception in 1988, D-mop has been unwaveringly dedicated to exploring unique, cutting-edge designs, advocating creative and quality collections as well as supporting new bright talents, attaining themselves the reputation of possessing the most distinctive visions on the fashion scenes around the world.
about.tc: D-mop始於1988年，一群年青的時裝愛好者成了歐洲街頭時裝文化帶來香港，開設了第一間D-mop，網羅近百個來自英國、法國、意大利、日本及美國等地的潮流時裝品牌，實行把最前線的時裝文化，推廣至各地。
about.sc: D-mop始于1988年，一群年青的时装爱好者成了欧洲街头时装文化带来香港，开设了第一间D-mop，网罗近百个来自英国、法国、意大利、日本及美国等地的潮流时装品牌，实行把最前线的时装文化，推广至各地。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to D-mop at Fashion Walk. We are a unique fusion of indoor and outdoor elements at the heart of Causeway Bay, embracing three vibrant streets – Paterson, Food Street and Kingston.
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到Fashion Walk的D-mop。Fashion Walk是匯聚時尚、品味生活及國際美饌的潮流熱點，提供獨特的室內及室外購物環境，涵蓋三大區域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。

about.en: DANIEL WELLINGTON (DW) is a Swedish brand founded in 2011. Known for its sleek and minimalist design, DW offers timeless accessories, worn on all occasions by men and women all over the world. Since its inception, DANIEL WELLINGTON has sold over 10 million watches, and established itself as one of the fastest growing and most beloved brands in the watch industry. Its social media community has quickly evolved into a global movement, that every day, photo by photo, helps growing, defining and developing the Daniel Wellington brand.
about.tc: DANIEL WELLINGTON源自瑞典，成立於2011年，以時尚簡約的腕錶與配飾聞名，設計簡潔優雅，經典雋永並適合各種場合穿搭，備受各界人士歡迎，讓品牌在業界獨樹一幟。自成立以來，DANIEL WELLINGTON已賣出1,000多萬隻手錶，成為手錶行業中發展最快，最受歡迎的品牌。
about.sc: DANIEL WELLINGTON源自瑞典，成立于2011年，以时尚简约的腕錶与配饰闻名，设计简洁优雅，经典隽永并适合各种场合穿搭，备受各界人士欢迎，让品牌在业界独树一帜。自成立以来，DANIEL WELLINGTON已卖出1,000多万只手錶，成为手錶行业中发展最快，最受欢迎的品牌。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Daniel Wellington at Grand Plaza. Grand Plaza is home to a stellar line-up of international watch and jewelry brands, concept stores as well as fashion, lifestyle and sports labels. The dedicated Dining Floor features over 20 gourmet dining venues where international cuisine is served in stylish surroundings.
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到雅蘭中心的Daniel Wellington。雅蘭中心匯聚國際鐘錶珠寶品牌、概念商店以及多間時尚服飾與運動品牌。雅蘭中心「潮食點」更集20多間中、西、日人氣特色食肆，讓顧客於這鬧市中的時尚熱點，寫意享受各國優質美饌。

about.en:
DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia with a presence in 18 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS is in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's "AA-" and "Aa1" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.
DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of our 29,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.
about.tc:
星展集團是亞洲最大的金融服務集團之一，業務遍及18個市場。總部設於新加坡並於當地上市，星展業務覆蓋亞洲三大增長主軸，即大中華、東南亞和南亞地區。星展資本充裕，所取得的AA-和Aa1級信貸評級位列全球最高級別之一。
星展集團在亞洲提供包括零售銀行、中小企業銀行及大型企業銀行的全面金融服務。生於亞洲、長於亞洲，星展洞悉在亞洲這個充滿活力的市場經營業務的秘訣。星展致力成為亞洲的首選銀行，其市場洞察能力和區域聯繫，有助於推動銀行的發展。星展深信與客戶建立長久的夥伴關係，以及透過推動社會企業發展不斷回饋社會，是亞洲式銀行服務的關鍵所在。星展亦已撥款5千萬新加坡元成立基金會，以進一步履行在新加坡和亞洲區內的企業社會責任。

星展於亞洲擁有廣泛的業務網絡，並著重員工溝通與賦權，提供員工廣闊的發展機會。星展集團來自40多個國籍、合共29, 000名的員工，每一位都充滿熱忱，堅守承諾，具備積極進取的「我做得到」精神。
about.sc:
星展集团是亚洲最大的金融服务集团之一，业务遍及18个市场。总部设于新加坡并于当地上市，星展业务覆盖亚洲三大增长主轴，即大中华、东南亚和南亚地区。星展资本充裕，所取得的AA-和Aa1级信贷评级位列全球最高级别之一。
星展集团在亚洲提供包括零售银行、中小企业银行及大型企业银行的全面金融服务。生于亚洲、长于亚洲，星展洞悉在亚洲这个充满活力的市场经营业务的秘诀。星展致力成为亚洲的首选银行，其市场洞察能力和区域联系，有助于推动银行的发展。星展深信与客户建立长久的伙伴关系，以及透过推动社会企业发展不断回馈社会，是亚洲式银行服务的关键所在。星展亦已拨款5千万新加坡元成立基金会，以进一步履行在新加坡和亚洲区内的企业社会责任。

星展于亚洲拥有广泛的业务网络，并着重员工沟通与赋权，提供员工广阔的发展机会。星展集团来自40多个国籍、合共29, 000名的员工，每一位都充满热忱，坚守承诺，具备积极进取的「我做得到」精神。

about.en: Delicious Kitchen has been serving home-made Shanghainese dishes for over 30 years. Yet this bistro in Cleveland street has a sleek modern look. Its signature Shanghainese Ribs are still as tasty as ever, with more that 200 orders sold every day.
about.tc: 屹立了三十多年的滬菜館美味廚，加寧街的店子裝潢比以往摩登了，但招牌上海排骨依然鬆化如昔，難怪可以日賣逾200客。

Its signature Shanghainese Ribs are still as tasty as ever, with more that 200 orders sold every day. Welcome to Delicious Kitchen at Fashion Walk.  We are a unique fusion of indoor and outdoor elements at the heart of Causeway Bay, embracing three vibrant streets – Paterson, Food Street and Kingston.
metaDescription.sc: 屹立了叁十多年的沪菜馆美味厨，加宁街的店子装潢比以往摩登了，但招牌上海排骨依然松化如昔，难怪可以日卖逾200客。 欢迎来到Fashion Walk的美味厨。Fashion Walk是汇聚时尚、品味生活及国际美馔的潮流热点，提供独特的室内及室外购物环境，涵盖叁大区域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。
metaDescription.tc: 屹立了三十多年的滬菜館美味廚，加寧街的店子裝潢比以往摩登了，但招牌上海排骨依然鬆化如昔，難怪可以日賣逾200客。 歡迎來到Fashion Walk的美味廚。Fashion Walk是匯聚時尚、品味生活及國際美饌的潮流熱點，提供獨特的室內及室外購物環境，涵蓋三大區域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。

about.en:
DOMA is an international lifestyle brand founded in 2003 with retail locations in Hong Kong and an online business with local and international shipments available.  

Combining unique and interesting product concepts with the latest innovations in design technology, DOMA offers a range of eye catching and practical gadgets and gift products, beautifully designed for modern living.
about.tc:
DOMA是一個國際性的生活品牌，提供一系列全新獨特，精心設計的電子精品和禮品。成立於2003年，DOMA現在在香港設有零售店鋪，我們不僅提供本地零售銷售，也盡量將我們產品推介給世界各國的購買者。

DOMA產品揉合了精密科技和時尚設計，提供獨特，有趣的產品的概念。在設計技術，DOMA提供一系列的醒目的實用產品，包括藍牙喇叭和藍牙耳機，多功能移動電源，旅行用品，夏季清涼產品和冬季取暖產品，還有配合時尚家居的生活用品。
about.sc:
DOMA是一个国际性的生活品牌，提供一系列全新独特，精心设计的电子精品和礼品。成立于2003年，DOMA现在在香港設有零售店铺，我们不仅提供本地零售销售，也尽量将我们产品推介给世界各国的购买者。

DOMA产品揉合了精密科技和时尚设计，提供独特、有趣的产品的概念。在设计技术，DOMA提供一系列的醒目的实用产品，包括蓝牙喇叭和蓝牙耳机，多功能移动电源，旅行用品，夏季清凉产品和冬季取暖产品，还有配合时尚家居的生活用品。

about.en: DORMiRE is the specialty store of Ulfenbo products. With the business being built upon the cornerstones of promoting health and value for money, Ulfenbo endeavour to constantly innovate, designing a series of healthy mattresses with varies features, thickness and hardness that cater to the needs and preferences of different customers at affordable prices. Ulfenbo also introduced different models of leather sofa, sofa bed, adjustable bed and pillow in recent years, in the hope to deliver healthy sleep and quality lifestyle to Hong Kong people.
about.tc: 「多眠樂」專營歐化寶旗下產品。歐化寶本著「以健康為本」及「物有所值」的品牌宗旨，多年來致力於創新科研，精心設計了多款各具特色的健康床褥，備有不同功能、厚度及軟硬度，全面配合不同年齡和喜好的顧客，近年更推出多款真皮梳化、沙發床、電動床及枕頭，以大眾化價錢為市民提供健康睡眠及優質生活。
about.sc: 「多眠乐」专营欧化宝旗下产品。欧化宝本着「以健康为本」及「物有所值」的品牌宗旨，多年来致力于创新科研，精心设计了多款各具特色的健康床褥，备有不同功能、厚度及软硬度，全面配合不同年龄和喜好的顾客，近年更推出多款真皮梳化、沙发床、电动床及枕头，以大众化价钱为市民提供健康睡眠及优质生活。

about.en: Dr. Kong was established in 1999. We were the first to promote our innovative “Check & Fit” foot assessment and insole fitting service and provide free profession foot assessment to people of all ages. We provide healthy shoes and foot care products for babies, children, adult and the elderly so that everyone can wear comfortably and healthily. According to our customer's feet condition, we recommend the most suitable and economical foot care products.
about.tc: Dr. Kong健康鞋專門店於1999年成立。我們了解不同年齡層，應有不同的足部護理，首創「Check & Fit驗腳配墊」服務，「Check」意思是提供驗腳服務，足健助理透過最新「3D智能驗腳儀」，多角度掃瞄，準確量度後跟斜度及扁平翻程度，數據更全面和精準。「Fit」意思是根據個人足部情況，建議合適的健康鞋及護足產品。
about.sc: Dr. Kong健康鞋专门店于1999年成立。我们了解不同年龄层，应有不同的足部护理，首创「Check & Fit验脚配垫」服务，「Check」 意思是提供验脚服务，足健助理透过最新「3D智能验脚仪」 ，多角度扫瞄，准确量度后跟斜度及扁平翻程度，数据更全面和精准。 「Fit」意思是根据个人足部情况，建议合适的健康鞋及护足产品。

about.en:
“Dai Sang Groceries” established locally since 2014. We aim to create the delightful shopping experience with the best quality of goods from all around the world and the friendliest services to our favorite customers and neighborhoods. 

Why us? We endeavor to source diversified, chic, new products all over the globe with very competitive pricing. Great deals with best quality is our goal to bring to our customers. Our range varies from wine, Chinese delicacies, confectionaries, chocolate, nuts and fruits, beverages and as well as general groceries. Frozen and chilled products are also newly launched and available at most of our selected stores. 

We sincerely hear what you need. Tell us and we’ll source the goods for you.
about.tc:
主要銷售從世界各地進口之零食、健康食品、飲品而及海味和其他包裝食品。部分商店新增冷凍及急凍食品。價格公道，品質優良。

公司十分注重顧客與店員之間的溝通和關懷，公司非常樂意接受顧客一切提問、建議及訴求。亦希望顧客光臨店舖後，買到的不只是貨品，而是一份溫暖。

大生集團給大家生活所需。

公司十分注重顾客与店员之间的沟通和关怀，公司非常乐意接受顾客一切提问、建议及诉求。亦希望顾客光临店铺后，买到的不只是货品，而是一份温暖。

大生集团给大家生活所需。

about.en:
The Decathlon adventure began in Villeneuve d'Ascq, France, in 1976 with its first store opened in Englos (North France). Currently, Decathlon has more than 1,500 stores across the globe. At Decathlon, 80,000 teammates live their mutual purpose every day: “to make the pleasure and benefits of sports accessible to all”. In every country where Decathlon is present, strong and unique company culture permeates the 4 brand values: “Vitality, Responsibility, Authenticity and Generosity”.

Serving a purpose to improve lives through sport, Decathlon places innovation and technology at the heart of the business: from research to retail, including design, production and logistics. Decathlon Hong Kong, a stage where talents meet Decathlon team channel all their energy into developing technical, good-looking and simple products, always at the most affordable price, finding new ways to connect and delight sport users. Decathlon’s projects cater for all sports enthusiasts, from beginners to experts, aspiring to serve local sport communities.
about.tc:
法國運動用品品牌 DECATHLON 創立於 1976 年，來自法國維倫紐夫·達斯克 (Villeneuve d'Ascq)，品牌目前於全球不同國家/地區開展業務並擁有 1,500 間分店，團隊由 80,000 位運動大使組成。品牌作為理想健康生活態度的夥伴，一直以 「讓運動觸及更多人」為品牌使命，營運理念基於 4 種基本原則: Vitality(活力)、Responsibility(責任)、Authenticity(真摯)、Generosity(慷慨)，協助每個用家開始運動新一頁。

DECATHLON 為運動用家鑽研每種運動，全方位瞭解其需要，以創新科技致力研發不同類型的運動產品 - 為初學者到高階者提供從運動裝備和配件，共涵蓋 50 多種運動。從研究、設計、生產到運輸物流均由 DECATHLON 負責，以創新和技術作為品牌核心的價值，以實惠的價格回饋顧客。

香港DECATHLON團隊由多位對運動充滿熱誠的運動大使組成，是每項運動領域的專家團隊。抱著香港全民運動的夢想，一步一步使運動融入生活，以創新、專業和高性價比的運動用品滿足運動愛好者各種需求，成為港人的運動拍檔。
about.sc:
法国运动用品品牌 DECATHLON 创立于 1976 年，来自法国维伦纽夫·达斯克 (Villeneuve d'Ascq),品牌目前于全球不同国家/地区开展业务并拥有 1,500 间分店，团队由 80,000 位运动大使组成。品牌作为理想健康生活态度的伙伴，一直以 「让运动触及更多人」为品牌使命，营运理念基于 4 种基本原则: Vitality(活力)、Responsibility(责任)、Authenticity(真挚)、Generosity(慷慨)，协助每个用家开始运动新一页。

DECATHLON 为运动用家钻研每种运动，全方位了解其需要，以创新科技致力研发不同类型的运动产品 - 为初学者到高阶者提供从运动装备和配件，共涵盖 50 多种运动。从研究、设计、生产到运输物流均由 DECATHLON 负责，以创新和技术作为品牌核心的价值，以实惠的价格回馈顾客。

香港DECATHLON团队由多位对运动充满热诚的运动大使组成，是每项运动领域的专家团队。抱着香港全民运动的梦想，一步一步使运动融入生活，以创新、专业和高性价比的运动用品满足运动爱好者各种需求，成为港人的运动拍档。

about.en:
Doris Chui School of Ballet (formerly called Ballet Art before 2009) was established in 2005 with the tenet of promoting ballet culture. We are dedicated to providing students a well-established channel to learn this performing art. We wish we can become a companion of students on their journey of growth, from a beginner to a professional ballet teacher. We also hope that we can make contributions on promoting ballet. 

Since we are hoping to train students’ courage, confidence and team spirit through public exams, we send students to take the ballet exams organized by Royal Academy of Dance (RAD) every year. Through the training for the exams, students can also enhance their patience and perseverance.
about.tc:
崔藹璇芭蕾舞學校 (Doris Chui School of Ballet) 創辦於2005年(2009年前身為藝術天地)，以推廣芭蕾舞文化藝術為宗旨，一心致力為學童提供完善的芭蕾舞學習道路。我們的最大心願是能夠陪伴學生一起成長，由學習初期直至成為一位專業的舞蹈教師。通過美妙的舞蹈，為傳揚芭蕾舞盡一分力。 

本校每年更保送學員參加英國皇家舞蹈學院所編定的公開考試，希望透過公開考試，訓練各學員的勇氣、膽量及自信心，並提昇學員的團體合作精神，透過練習過程訓練學員的耐性及毅力。
about.sc:
崔蔼璇芭蕾舞学校 (Doris Chui School of Ballet) 创办於2005年(2009年前身为艺术天地)，以推广芭蕾舞文化艺术为宗旨，一心致力为学童提供完善的芭蕾舞学习道路。我们的最大心愿是能够陪伴学生一起成长，由学习初期直至成为一位专业的舞蹈教师。通过美妙的舞蹈，为传扬芭蕾舞尽一分力。 

本校每年更保送学员参加英国皇家舞蹈学院所编定的公开考试，希望透过公开考试，训练各学员的勇气、胆量及自信心，并提昇学员的团体合作精神，透过练习过程训练学员的耐性及毅力。

about.tc:
創作•點 重視小朋友的自我創意空間及獨立創作能力，因此老師絕對不會幫手代畫，只會從旁給予意見與鼓勵，務求令小朋友親自完成每件作品，從中建立自信心及成就感。我們亦會以輕鬆的手法，有趣的題目引導個人及集體創作，令小朋友在啟發創意之餘，同時培育出良好的人際關係和合作精神。
創作•點 為不同年齡的小朋友提供一個啟發潛能的創意天地。除了基本的平面繪畫之外，還透過不同的塑材 (例如黏土、剪貼等等) 增添學習趣味和挑戰性，讓小朋友發揮無限創造力，創作別出心裁的作品。
about.sc:

about.en: Dot Art value the children's self-creative space and independent creative ability, so the teacher will never help to paint, only give advice and encouragement from the side, in order to make the children complete each work personally, from which they can build self-confidence and sense of accomplishment.

about.en: Duddell’s is a cultural and social destination for people who have an active appreciation for the arts. Its stylishly relaxed interiors provide a colourful backdrop against which creative ideas can be shared and developed. It is a place where people come together to meet, eat, drink, entertain and relax in an environment that connects art and people in a fresh, new way - allowing art masters and novices alike to embrace and develop the new cultural context adopted by the city.
about.sc: 都爹利会馆是为艺术爱好者而设的文化和社交场所，位于中环历史悠久的都爹利街，室内设计由知名设计师Ilse Crawford操刀，摩登而不失休闲感，并常年放设琳琅满目的艺术展品。置身会馆其中，仿佛走进一座博学艺术藏家的大宅，同时可以接受米芝莲星级大厨主理的粤菜佳肴，以及获奖调酒师炮制的鸡尾酒。举办不同的艺术活动，由城中及国际艺术界杰出佼佼者负责策划，并会透过展览，电影放映会及论坛等定期活动，促进本港艺术界与国际艺坛交流。香港及世界各地不同人士的肯定和赞誉，并获得国际媒体如旅行者，《纽约时报》，《金融时报》以及《福布斯》等推荐。
about.tc: 都爹利會館是為藝術愛好者而設的文化及社交場地，位於中環歷史悠久的都爹利街，室內設計由知名設計師Ilse Crawford操刀，摩登而不失休閒感，並常年放設琳瑯滿目的藝術展品。置身會館其中，彷彿走進一座博學藝術藏家的大宅，同時可以享用米芝蓮星級大廚主理的粵菜佳餚，以及獲獎調酒師炮製的雞尾酒。都爹利會館全年舉辦不同的藝術活動，由城中及國際藝術界佼佼者負責策劃，並會透過一系列展覽、電影放映會及論壇等定期活動，促進本港藝術界與國際藝壇交流。開業五年以來，會館獲得香港及世界各地不同人士的肯定和讚譽，並得到國際媒體如Traveller、The New York Times、Financial Times及Forbes等推薦。

about.en: The college pays special attention to leadership training, hoping to cultivate a group of outstanding leaders who are caring, confident and willing to lead the development of Hong Kong in the future. We also have courses for senior executives, lectured by the famous emcee Mr. Deng Zifeng and weight training experts, so that students can master speech and leadership skills. In addition, the college also has other short-term courses, so that people of different ages can live a wonderful and confident life.
about.tc: 本學院尤其著重領袖才能訓練，希望能為社會培養一群充滿愛心，自信，敢於承擔，能在未來帶領香港發展的傑出領袖。我們同時設有高級行政人員課程，由著名司儀鄧梓峰先生及重量培訓專家主講，讓學員能掌握演說及領導技巧。此外，本學院亦有其他短期課程，讓不同年齡人士也能活出精彩自信人生。
about.sc: 本学院尤其着重领袖才能训练，希望能为社会培养一群充满爱心，自信，敢于承担，能在未来带领香港发展的杰出领袖。我们同时设有高级行政人员课程，由著名司仪邓梓峰先生及重量培训专家主讲，让学员能掌握演说及领导技巧。此外，本学院亦有其他短期课程，让不同年龄人士也能活出精彩自信人生。

about.en: The college pays special attention to leadership training, hoping to cultivate a group of outstanding leaders who are caring, confident and willing to lead the development of Hong Kong in the future. We also have courses for senior executives, lectured by the famous emcee Mr. Deng Zifeng and weight training experts, so that students can master speech and leadership skills. In addition, the college also has other short-term courses, so that people of different ages can live a wonderful and confident life.
about.tc: 本學院尤其著重領袖才能訓練，希望能為社會培養一群充滿愛心，自信，敢於承擔，能在未來帶領香港發展的傑出領袖。我們同時設有高級行政人員課程，由著名司儀鄧梓峰先生及重量培訓專家主講，讓學員能掌握演說及領導技巧。此外，本學院亦有其他短期課程，讓不同年齡人士也能活出精彩自信人生。
about.sc: 本学院尤其着重领袖才能训练，希望能为社会培养一群充满爱心，自信，敢于承担，能在未来带领香港发展的杰出领袖。我们同时设有高级行政人员课程，由著名司仪邓梓峰先生及重量培训专家主讲，让学员能掌握演说及领导技巧。此外，本学院亦有其他短期课程，让不同年龄人士也能活出精彩自信人生。

about.en:
The scope of service of Kornhill Head Office includes: Kornhill, Taikoo Shing, Kornhill Garden, The Orchards, Nan Fung Sun Chuen, The Floridian, Westlands Gardens, Westlands Court, Parkvale, Mount Parker Lodge, Kornville, Felicity Garden, Lei King Wan, Les Saisons, all ranges of residentials in Eastern District and all new developments in Hong Kong, Kowloon and the New Territories.

Since January 1999, all of our team members have passed the public exam held by Estate Agents Authority and obtained valid estate agent’s licenses issued by the government. In addition, our team, all having served the industry for more than 10 years, is professional and competent. With our professional knowledge and experience, we can definitely fulfill the highest expectations from all property owners and clients.

由一九九九年一月起，本公司各分行之員工均通過地產監管局舉辦之公開考試，領有由政府發出之代理牌照，再加上各員工在本行業服務超過十年，達到專業水平，憑著我們的專業知識及經驗，定能達到各業主及客戶的最高要求。

about.en:
We are a fashion and lifestyle brand based in Hong Kong.

Ebony & Ivory was established in 2013 in Hong Kong. It is our mission to design clothes that can reflect the beauty of our customers. We now have three retail locations throughout Hong Kong. Our online store is launched to serve more customers within the Asia Pacific region and Mainland China.

Quality is a keystone of our business. We create our designs in-house, with each piece sewn using premium fabrics from Japan or Korea. Our extensive range caters for all occasions. Whether it’s party dresses, office wear or casual wear, we are confident that there is a piece from our range that makes you look great for your event.

Inclusivity is also important to us. Women of all age and sizes should have access to clothes which enable them to dress with style and confidence. That’s why we offer four sizes (from M to XXL). Alteration service is available at our stores to achieve best fit.

As Ebony & Ivory continues to grow, we hold onto our core mission: to design clothes that enhance the inherent beauty and elegance of our customers.

“Clothed with Strength and Dignity” Proverbs 31:25.
about.tc:
我們的品牌

「披上力量和尊嚴」箴言 31:25。

我們的使命是設計能讓顧客的美麗和優雅的女士時裝。我們採用來自日本和韓國的優質面料來設計適合不同場合的服裝。我們的系列提供四種尺寸至最大XXL，我們香港的實體店提供改衣服務，以幫助客戶實現完美的剪裁。自 2013 年我們的第一家店開業以來，我們現在在香港有三家實體店。

我們的網上商店於今年夏天推出，為中國大陸和亞太地區的顧客提供服務。
about.sc:
我们的品牌

“披上力量和尊严”箴言 31:25。

我们的使命是设计能让顾客的美丽和优雅的女士时装。我们采用来自日本和韩国的优质面料来设计适合不同场合的服装。我们的系列提供四种尺寸至最大XXL，我们香港的实体店提供改衣服务，以帮助客户实现完美的剪裁。自 2013 年我们的第一家店开业以来，我们现在在香港有三家实体店。

我们的网上商店于今年夏天推出，为中国大陆和亚太地区的顾客提供服务。

about.en: ECCO is founded in Denmark, one of the world’s leading shoe brands, combining style and comfort. ECCO’s success is built on products with a great fit and top-quality leathers. ECCO owns and manages every aspect of the value chain from tanneries and shoe manufacturing to wholesale and retail activities.
about.tc: ECCO 於丹麥創辦，是全球知名的鞋履品牌，堅持從皮革到成品皆由自己生產、製造。對於每一個製鞋過程和步驟，以及設計、研發、生產的每個細節，ECCO 團隊都以一絲不苟，以北歐風格的設計哲學，致力創造集結時尚、多功能及高品質舒服感於一體的鞋履、手袋、皮革製品及鞋履護理產品。
about.sc: ECCO 于丹麦创办，是全球知名的鞋履品牌，坚持从皮革到成品皆由自己生产、制造。对于每一个制鞋过程和步骤，以及设计、研发、生产的每个细节，ECCO 团队都以一丝不苟，以北欧风格的设计哲学，致力创造集结时尚、多功能及高质量舒服感于一体的鞋履、手袋、皮革制品及鞋履护理产品。

metaDescription.en: ECCO is one of the world’s leading shoe brands, combining style and comfort. ECCO’s success is built on products with a great fit and top-quality leathers. Ideally located atop the famous attraction in Hong Kong, Victoria Peak, The Peak Galleria is an extensive shopping and dining complex complemented by various exciting activities.
metaDescription.tc: ECCO 以北歐風格的設計哲學，致力創造集結時尚、多功能及高品質於一體的鞋履、手袋、皮革製品及鞋履護理產品，對於每一個製鞋過程和步驟都一絲不苟，務求生產世界上最好的鞋子。歡迎來到山頂廣場的ECCO。山頂廣場位於香港的著名旅游勝地太平山頂，提供豐富的購物及餐飲選擇，並引進各行業中具代表性的主題館，定位成為本地及海外游客的必到景點。

about.en:
EMMAS Mattress is a brand developed by A.H. Beard with over a century of experience in producing mattresses in Australia tailored towards the Asian market. Adopting specialised technology from A.H. Beard, EMMAS Mattress’ unique specifications of mattresses caters to the average Asian body shape and it’s demands. According to statistics reported by the World Health Organization (WHO), Australia is one of the countries with longest life expectancy in the world. Besides eating habits and environmental factors, it is believed that good quality sleep and rest is the key to maintain a good healthy body and extend one’s life expectancy. EMMAS Mattress embodies the Australian lifestyle to provide the ultimate sleep experience. 

EMMAS stores are located in different districts across Hong Kong. In order to provide an intimate and professional service, EMMAS is introducing new and exciting high-quality bedding products from all over the world.
about.tc:
EMMAS 澳美斯是擁有百年製造床褥經驗的澳洲 A.H. Beard 於亞洲地區發展的品牌，並採用了澳洲 A.H. Beard 的生產技術，調整了床褥的規格，以配合亞洲人的身型和需求。澳洲擁有世界知名的自然景觀及天然資源，源自澳洲的 EMMAS 澳美斯注入了當地的獨特文化，致力提供優質天然的寢室用品給一眾追求生活質素的人士。

澳美斯於多個地區開設專門店，為客人提供最貼心及專業的服務，未來亦會積極拓展銷售網絡，引入更多來自世界各地的優質品牌，讓客人享受極致舒適睡眠體驗。
about.sc:
EMMAS 澳美斯是拥有百年制造床褥经验的澳洲 A.H. Beard 于亚洲地区发展的品牌，并采用了澳洲 A.H. Beard 的生产技术，调整了床褥的规格，以配合亚洲人的身型和需求。澳洲拥有世界知名的自然景观及天然资源，源自澳洲的 EMMAS 澳美斯注入了当地的独特文化，致力提供优质天然的寝室用品给一众追求生活质素的人士。

澳美斯于多个地区开设专门店，为客人提供最贴心及专业的服务，未来亦会积极拓展销售网络，引入更多来自世界各地的优质品牌，让客人享受极致舒适睡眠体验。

about.en:
Founded in Hong Kong in 2013, Elephant Grounds is a specialty coffee shop and all round brunch destination. The first Elephant Grounds was a small coffee counter with ice cream sandwiches in the back of a lifestyle shop. 

Today Elephant Grounds unique “Coffee n Chill” message has expanded throughout Hong Kong and beyond the city.
about.tc: 自2013年成立以來，咖啡微烘商Elephant Grounds致力帶領精品咖啡融入香港的主流文化，亦以同一心態擴充業務以及發展其他供應品。

about.en:
Estro is renowned Italian Chef Antimo Maria Merone’s first restaurant, launched in partnership with JIA group. 

A proud Naples native, Antimo is among the vanguard of chefs rewriting the rules of Italian cuisine. Dedicated to elevating Neapolitan cuisine through modern cooking techniques, Estro’s refined tasting menus inspirated from Antimo’s homeland, with each dish evoking rich memories of his ancestors, history and childhood. 

Bringing a global perspective to regional cuisine, Estro acknowledges Antimo’s Neapolitan roots while showcasing his innate creativity and progressive style.
about.tc:
Estro 是著名意大利廚師 Antimo Maria Merone 首間與佳民集團共同創辦的餐廳。 

作為一位自豪的拿坡里人，Antimo是倡導改寫意大利美食規限的廚師之一。致力於通過現代的烹飪技術昇華拿坡里美食，Estro精緻的體驗菜單從Antimo 的家鄉中獲取靈感，每道菜式都能喚起他對故人、歷史和童年的豐富回憶。 

Estro 將全球視野帶入地區美食當中，突顯 Antimo 的拿坡里背景，同時展示了他與生俱來的創造力和前衛風格。
about.sc:
Estro 是著名意大利厨师 Antimo Maria Merone 首间与佳民集团共同创办的餐厅。 

作为一位自豪的拿坡里人，Antimo是倡导改写意大利美食规限的厨师之一。致力于通过现代的烹饪技术升华拿坡里美食，Estro精致的体验菜单从Antimo 的家乡中获取灵感，每道菜式都能唤起他对故人、历史和童年的丰富回忆。 

Estro 将全球视野带入地区美食当中，突显 Antimo 的拿坡里背景，同时展示了他与生俱来的创造力和前卫风格。
