about.en:
Luna Cake was founded in 2010, which is the first to introduce the delicious and unique Hokkaido double cheesecake into Hong Kong. All ingredients are carefully selected with no preservatives and additives added with daily fresh and limited production. 

Luna Cake collects high-quality deserts from all over Japan aimed at bringing different tastes to experience happiness and satisfaction.
about.tc:
Luna Cake創立於2010年，是第一品牌把美味獨特的北海道雙層芝士蛋糕引進香港。嚴選最上盛的材料，絕不添加任何增味劑、人造糖或防腐劑，堅持每日新鮮限量製作。

同時亦搜羅日本各地的優質芝士蛋糕和極緻精巧的甜品菓子，讓客人體驗不一樣的味蕾享受、幸福和滿足！
about.sc:
Luna Cake创立于2010年，是第一品牌把美味独特的北海道双层芝士蛋糕引进香港。严选最上盛的材料，绝不添加任何增味剂、人造糖或防腐剂，坚持每日新鲜限量制作。

同时亦搜罗日本各地的优质芝士蛋糕和极致精巧的甜品菓子，让客人体验不一样的味蕾享受、幸福和满足！

about.en: Featuring a light Industrial and minimalist design, MCL Amoy Cinema consists of 3 houses with more than 600 seats. All of them are equipped with 4K laser projector and Dolby 7.1 surround sound stereo while house 1 is also powered with Dolby Atmos, providing audiences with a diversified and high quality audio-visual enjoyment.
about.tc: MCL淘大戲院以輕工業型格風設計，設有3個影廳，合共提供超過600個座位。所有影廳均配備Barco 4K 鐳射投影機及杜比7.1環迴立體聲音響；其中1 院更設有杜比全景聲Dolby Atmos環繞聲系統，極盡視聽之樂。
about.sc: MCL淘大戏院以轻工业型格风设计，设有3个影厅，合共提供超过600个座位。所有影厅均配备Barco 4K 镭射投影机及杜比7.1环回身历声音响；其中1 院更设有杜比全景声Dolby Atmos环绕声系统，极尽视听之乐。

about.en: MCQ is the first of its kind: a label that is also an ever-shifting collective, radically crediting all its voices. Giving collectors ownership and expression of their MCQ items through technology, the MCQ team and collaborators create each icon together as a group. The aim is to give young creatives around the world a platform to create with minimal direction and maximum creative freedom.

about.en: Founded in Nagoya, Japan in 1959 with the ideology of “Seeking True Beauty”, MENARD is currently the global pioneer in formulating premium Reishi into cosmetics. MENARD has endlessly been producing supreme quality products with state of art technology and top grade professionals along it’s over 50 years of developments that established its leadership in the field of cosmetic. Today, MENARD is selling in over 20 countries globally with over 900 beauty and health products.
about.tc: 始創於日本名古屋，由1959年創立至今一直以“Seeking True Beauty”作為企業目標，產品超過900種，至今已遍佈全球20多個國家。品牌不斷以最先進科技研製各種具突破性效能的產品，當中以培植生化靈芝和開發產品專利最為聞名。
about.sc: 始创于日本名古屋，由1959年创立至今一直以"Seeking True Beauty"作为企业目标，产品超过900种，至今已遍布全球20多个国家。品牌不断以最先进科技研制各种具突破性效能的产品，当中以培植生化灵芝和开发产品专利最为闻名。

about.en:
Mi Ming Mart Holdings Limited (“MMM” or the “Group”) is a multi-brand retailer which operate ten retail Stores under the brand of “MI MING MART” (“弥明生活百货”) in Hong Kong. MMM offers a wide range of beauty and health products, which can mainly be categorized into (i) skincare products; (ii) cosmetic products; and (iii) food and health supplements. MMM has been under the leadership of its founder, chairlady, Executive Director and Chief Executive Officer, Ms. Erica Yuen, a prominent social media icon, since its commencement of business in 2009.

MMM’s philosophy is “defining clean beauty” (“择善美丽”). To uphold this philosophy, it strive to meticulously select and offer exquisite and quality products which do not contain any ingredients that, in its view, would affect or impair the health of its customers. MMM target to serve and offer our products to customers who are ingredient conscious and aspire to the betterment of their health.
about.tc:
MI MING MART於2009年由袁彌明（Erica）創立，她於社交媒體以影片形式用心分享美容，護膚心得，她的選擇逐漸得到大眾信任。

MI MING MART其後引入世界各地各類Clean Beauty產品。在MI MING MART 10間專門店內可以找到超過50個品牌，400多款優質產品，由護膚品、化妝品、健康食品以至保健產品及居家用品由內到外，全方位照顧每個人的生活需要。店內每一件貨品都經過MI MING MART團隊精心挑選，由Erica親自挑選及認真試驗，確保安全有效。MI MING MART的挑選過程非常嚴格，必須乎合「擇善美麗」理念，不作動物測試，對身體及環境絕對安全。
about.sc:
MI MING MART于2009年由袁弥明（Erica）创立，她于社交媒体以影片形式用心分享美容，护肤心得，她的选择逐渐得到大众信任。

MI MING MART其后引入世界各地各类Clean Beauty产品。在MI MING MART 10间专门店内可以找到超过50个品牌，400多款优质产品，由护肤品、化妆品、健康食品以至保健产品及居家用品由内到外，全方位照顾每个人的生活需要。店内每一件货品都经过MI MING MART团队精心挑选，由Erica亲自挑选及认真试验，确保安全有效。MI MING MART的挑选过程非常严格，必须乎合「择善美丽」理念，不作动物测试，对身体及环境绝对安全。。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Mi Ming Mart at Grand Plaza. Grand Plaza is home to a stellar line-up of international watch and jewelry brands, concept stores as well as fashion, lifestyle and sports labels. The dedicated Dining Floor features over 20 gourmet dining venues where international cuisine is served in stylish surroundings.

about.en: Founded in 2014, MINT Organic offers natural and fairly traded botanicals from sustainable sources, using the highest quality plant and essential oils. We can find and minimizing the use of preservatives and synthetics. We have skin care, make up and baby products, covering every need of each customer. Our commitment to sourcing products: No Parabens, No Sulphates, No Petrochemicals, No Artificial Colours!
about.tc: MINT Organics成立於2014年，嚴選全球具國際認證的天然有機品牌，為顧客帶來最清新無害的天然有機產品，覆蓋護膚、美妝到孕婦及嬰兒系列，照顧每位客人的需要。我們深信簡單高效的產品才能帶給顧客持久的美麗。所有產品都是團隊們親自測試、精心挑選的愛物，產品均獲天然有機認證，符合嚴格的國際標準。所有產品不含有害化學成分、人造色素、防腐劑及添加劑；所有產品不經動物測試，不含動物成份；盡量減少使用塑料包裝物料。
about.sc: MINT Organics成立于2014年，严选全球具国际认证的天然有机品牌，为顾客带来最清新无害的天然有机产品，覆盖护肤、美妆到孕妇及婴儿系列，照顾每位客人的需要。我们深信简单高效的产品才能带给顾客持久的美丽。所有产品都是团队们亲自测试、精心挑选的爱物，产品均获天然有机认证，符合严格的国际标准。所有产品不含有害化学成分、人造色素、防腐剂及添加剂；所有产品不经动物测试，不含动物成份；尽量减少使用塑胶包装物料。

about.en: MONOPOLY DREAMS ™ is the first MONOPOLY-themed attraction in the world, as well as a brand-new tourist attraction in Hong Kong. It is located at the most popular tourist spot – the Peak, which is the most expensive title deed and the supreme “king of property” in the MONOPOLY Hong Kong Edition. MONOPOLY classical elements like Train Station, Water Supply, Ultimate Banking will be ready to give you the best MONOPOLY experience!
about.tc: 大富翁夢想世界™ 是全球首間大富翁的主題館，座落於「大富翁：香港版」地位超然、地價最高的「地王」— 香港太平山頂，將成為香港及全球嶄新旅遊景點之一。大富翁夢想世界™將把桌上游戲的經典元素立體呈現眼前，充滿驚喜等你發現！人人都可以成為大富翁，歡迎到來一起擁抱夢想！
about.sc: 大富翁梦想世界™ 是全球首间大富翁的主题馆，座落于「大富翁：香港版」地位超然、地价最高的「地王」— 香港太平山顶，将成为香港及全球崭新旅游景点之一。大富翁梦想世界™将把桌上游戏的经典元素立体呈现眼前，充满惊喜等你发现！人人都可以成为大富翁，欢迎到来一起拥抱梦想！

about.en:
In 2016 MOS HK brought over its sister brand “MOS Café” and opened our first shop in Tai Koo. No matter it is for breakfast or lunch, during a shopping break or just a day out with friends, MOS Café wants to create a welcoming space that everyone can relax in and enjoy. 

With shop interior designed to be bright, basing on smoothing greens and wood grain, we hope our shop can cater to the lifestyle of our customers. MOS Café menu is also specially put together driven by the concept of “Freshness” by using lots of fresh vegetables and fruits. The menu is made up of original Café items as well as items carefully curated from MOS Burger Menu.
about.tc:
2016年MOS正式將分支品牌MOS Café帶到香港，並於太古康怡廣場開設首間分店。MOS Cafe旨在為客人提供優雅舒適的空間，客人可悠閑地享用各種輕食、飲品與甜點。

同時，MOS Cafe貫徹了MOS Burger一直秉持的健康飲食概念，每一道MOS CAFE的菜式都以「新鮮」為首要原則，配合不同的新鮮蔬菜製作而成。
about.sc:
2016年MOS正式将分支品牌MOS Café带到香港，并于太古康怡广场开设首间分店。MOS Cafe旨在为客人提供优雅舒适的空间，客人可悠闲地享用各种轻食、饮品与甜点。

同时，MOS Cafe贯彻了MOS Burger一直秉持的健康饮食概念，每一道MOS CAFE的菜式都以「新鲜」为首要原则，配合不同的新鲜蔬菜制作而成。

about.en:
Breaking through from traditional fast food framework, MX embraces its advanced fast food concepts by its brand new service, upgraded food and unique interior design, to build a new trend in the fast food industry. 

The slogan ‘TAKE‧EAT‧EASY’ is summoning the new generation to adopt an innovative fast food concept: creating a carefree environment for the gourmet experience, demonstrating a relaxing lifestyle in our hectic city pulse, and making fast food tasting a new and stylish adventure.
about.tc:
為打破傳統快餐店的框框，升級版速食概念品牌MX透過其嶄新的服務、進化版的食物及獨特的室內設計打造新世代的速食潮流。

MX以「TAKE‧EAT‧EASY」為口號，號召新世代啟動創新速食概念，將享受美食的過程變得更無拘無束，在緊張的生活節奏下表現出一種自在的生活態度，型格演繹速食新體驗。
about.sc:
为打破传统快餐店的框框，升级版速食概念品牌MX透过其崭新的服务、进化版的食物及独特的室内设计打造新世代的速食潮流。

MX以「TAKE·EAT·EASY」为口号，号召新世代启动创新速食概念，将享受美食的过程变得更无拘无束，在紧张的生活节奏下表现出一种自在的生活态度，型格演绎速食新体验。

about.en:
Maison Berger is a unique invention in France. With its catalytic burner and patented technology, the catalytic burner still provides unparalleled aroma quality effects.
With the development of the times, this technology has gradually met with the art world, which has attracted the attention of celebrities in the field of innovation, coupled with the bold interpretation of its artistry by famous designers.
about.tc:
Maison Berger是法國獨特的發明，憑藉其催化燃燒器，並獲得了專利技術，該催化燃燒器至今仍提供無與倫比的薰香品質效果。
隨著時代發展，這項技術逐漸與藝術界會面，引起了創新領域知名人士們的關注，加之著名設計師對其藝術性的大膽詮釋。
about.sc:
Maison Berger是法国独特的发明，凭借其催化燃烧器，并获得了专利技术，该催化燃烧器至今仍提供无与伦比的薰香品质效果。
随着时代发展，这项技术逐渐与艺术界会面，引起了创新领域知名人士们的关注，加之著名设计师对其艺术性的大胆诠释。

about.en:
Human beings are in a civilized world but often suffer from illness. Due to life-threatening and pollution, coupled with excessive cooking, refining, genetic modification and other issues, we suffer from sub-health and chronic diseases.

Convinced that natural, organic and whole foods are rich in nutrients, vitamins, antioxidants and other important elements, it is the best way to strengthen your body and prevent chronic diseases.

We are convinced that “food is good medicine.” In the foundation of food life and health, we adhere to the concept of “Whole Food – Whole Food” to preserve the original ingredients of foods with science and technology and bring the most primitive nutrients to the hands of customers.
about.tc:
人類身處文明世界之中，但經常患病。因生活緊張、污染，再加上過度烹調、煉製、基因改造等等問題食物，使我們飽受亞健康及慢性疾病之苦。

堅信天然, 有機整全的食物富含充足的營養、維生素、抗氧化劑等重要元素，是強化體格，預防慢性疾病的最佳方法。

嗎哪有機站深信「食物就是良藥」。食物生命及健康之本，我們堅持「全價值營養－Whole Food」概念，以科學技術保存食物的原有成分，把食物最原始的營養帶到顧客手中。
about.sc:
人类身处文明世界之中，但经常患病。因生活紧张丶污染，再加上过度烹调丶炼制丶基因改造等等问题食物，使我们饱受亚健康及慢性疾病之苦。

坚信天然, 有机整全的食物富含充足的营养丶维生素丶抗氧化剂等重要元素，是强化体格，预防慢性疾病的最佳方法。

吗哪有机站深信「食物就是良药」。食物生命及健康之本，我们坚持「全价值营养－Whole Food」概念，以科学技术保存食物的原有成分，把食物最原始的营养带到顾客手中。

about.en: Mannings is Hong Kong's largest health and beauty products chain store, with more than 350 outlets throughout the territory, providing a wide range of quality health care, personal care, skin care and baby products to a broad spectrum of consumers. It has also been proactively providing innovative services and leading the industry to serve the needs of health and beauty for the general public. Mannings has been awarded by the Hong Kong Retail Management Association's through their Mystery Shopper Program as the "Best Service Retailer" for six consecutive years. Mannings has also been voted as the "No.1 Customers’ Favorite Brand" in a customer's telephone survey conducted by Ipsos for 14 consecutive years (2004 to 2017).
about.tc: 萬寧是香港最大型的健康美容產品連鎖店，擁有超過350 間分店，遍布香港及澳門，提供多元化及優質的中西式保健、個人護理、護膚及嬰兒產品，其宗旨為用心了解及照顧顧客各種需要，更積極推出創新先河的服務，帶領同業全力照顧社會大眾的健與美需要。萬寧在香港零售管理協會神秘顧客計劃中連續 6 年獲選為「最佳服務零售商」。此外，萬寧更連續 14 年 (2004年至2017年) 於 Ipsos 顧客電話調查報告中獲投選為「No.1 顧客最愛品牌」。

about.en:
Mannings is Hong Kong's largest health and beauty products chain store, with more than 350 outlets throughout the territory, providing a wide range of quality health care, personal care, skin care and baby products to a broad spectrum of consumers. It has also been proactively providing innovative services and leading the industry to serve the needs of health and beauty for the general public. 

Mannings has been awarded by the Hong Kong Retail Management Association's through their Mystery Shopper Program as the "Best Service Retailer" for six consecutive years. Mannings has also been voted as the “No.1 Customers’ Favorite Brand" in a customer's telephone survey conducted by Ipsos for 14 consecutive years (2004 to 2017).

about.en: A casual grill restaurant with cozy and modern design, Marbling offers contemporary dishes crafted by the creative team with high quality food ingredients. Marbling refers to the inter-muscular fat, which adds tasty flavours to the meat. The aim is to provide top quality cuts from around the world at reasonable prices, and offers include Angus beef, Wagyu from different regions, and more.
about.tc: Marbling位處銅鑼灣食街，設計時尚簡樸，提供一個舒適親和的環境讓客人品嚐團隊精心創作的國際美食。Marbling 是指牛肉中美味來源的油脂所形成的雪花條紋，餐廳其中一個重要的概念便是提供環球最美味優質的牛扒供客人享用。
about.sc: Marbling 位处铜锣湾食街，设计时尚简朴，提供一个舒适亲和的环境让客人品尝团队精心创作的国际美食。Marbling 是指牛肉中美味来源的油脂所形成的雪花条纹，餐厅其中一个重要的概念便是提供环球最美味优质的牛扒供客人享用。

about.en:
Master Beef's hot pot is led by Taiwanese chef who specializes in Taiwan's signature soup base and flavored ingredients. Made to perfection in true Taiwan flavor, customers can savour the best of local Taiwan.

Based on Taiwanese traditional recipes, the nine kinds of Master Beef’s signature soup bases are refined in a modern and innovative way. All the special soup bases are made from all-natural ingredients, such that guests can rest assured that they could "try the taste of the soup first, then enjoy the hot pot". With most ingredients and drinks being directly delivered from Taiwan, you can enjoy the most authentic taste of Taiwan.

Master Beef uses high-quality traditional copper pots, which are fast in heat conduction, enhancing flavors of the ingredients to the next level of satisfaction. We have sourced the most signature Taiwanese foods, all the way from Tainan to Taipei. 

Hot pot ingredients, drinks and seasonings imported directly from Taiwan make you feel like being in Taiwan right now!
about.tc:
牛大人火鍋吃到飽由台灣師傅親自主理，主打台灣地道特色湯底及風味食材，務求顧客吃到飽，也吃得好。

九種鎮店火鍋湯頭集傳統古早秘方，融入現代創新料理熬煮而成，所有特色湯底均以全天然食材製作，讓客人能夠放心「先喝湯，後火鍋」，加上各款台灣直送火鍋食材及飲品，讓你感受最真實的在地台灣味道。

全店使用高質傳統銅鍋，導熱快速，受熱均勻，充分發揮食材的精華。我們搜羅全台灣最地道的各款台灣美食，由南到北，都可在牛大人火鍋吃到，台灣在地直送火鍋食材、飲品及調味料讓你吃得更地道，令你仿如置身台灣。
about.sc:
牛大人火锅吃到饱由台湾师傅亲自主理，主打台湾地道特色汤底及风味食材，务求顾客吃到饱，也吃得好。

九种镇店火锅汤头集传统古早秘方，融入现代创新料理熬煮而成，所有特色汤底均以全天然食材制作，让客人能够放心「先喝汤，后火锅」，加上各款台湾直送火锅食材及饮品，让你感受最真实的在地台湾味道。

全店使用高质传统铜锅，导热快速，受热均匀，充分发挥食材的精华。我们搜罗全台湾最地道的各款台湾美食，由南到北，都可在牛大人火锅吃到，台湾在地直送火锅食材、饮品及调味料让你吃得更地道，令你仿如置身台湾。

about.en: The first Italian clothing company, Max Mara was established in 1951, a forerunner of ready-to-wear of the day. Known for precise, clean and decisive lines in its tailoring, Max Mara’s collections offer sophisticated garments with a couture personality. Building its foundations on the highest quality materials, in-depth research into wearability, and creative studies on cuts with attention to the smallest details, Max Mara’s iconic camel coat remains a milestone in contemporary fashion.
about.tc: 創立於1951年的Max Mara為義大利首家時裝品牌，創製成衣系列的先行者。MaxMara的成功之道，在於採用最高級，優質的物料，以創意剪裁及關注微小的細節，鑽研出實用性與時尚相容的衣飾。其經典駝色大衣至今仍是時裝史上的經典。
about.sc: 创立于1951年的Max Mara为意大利首家时装品牌，创制成衣系列的先行者。MaxMara的成功之道，在于采用最高级，优质的物料，以创意剪裁及关注微小的细节，钻研出实用性与时尚相容的衣饰。其经典驼色大衣至今仍是时装史上的经典。

about.en:
Since 1975, McDonald’s has been serving customers in Hong Kong for 45 years. Operating around 245 restaurants in the city with a workforce of more than 15,000, McDonald’s delivers the next generation of customer experience through the Experience of the Future service concept featuring stylish restaurant designs, intuitive facilities, attentive customer service and premium food.

In 2018, McDonald’s took a further step in digitalization with the introduction of McDonald’s App, a powerful all-in-one mobile application that elevates customer convenience to a new level.
about.tc:
香港麥當勞自1975年扎根香港，服務廣大市民45年，在港九新界營運約245間餐廳，聘用超過15,000名僱員。品牌以Experience of the Future服務模式，透過新穎的餐廳設計、貼心便捷的設備、體貼周到的服務和優質美味的食品，為顧客提供新世代餐飲體驗。

2018年，麥當勞向數碼化邁出新一步，推出功能多樣的一站式手機應用程式「麥當勞App」，顧客於彈指之間體驗新餐飲服務。
about.sc:
香港麦当劳自1975年扎根香港，服务广大市民45年，在港九新界营运约245间餐厅，聘用超过15,000名雇员。品牌以Experience of the Future服务模式，透过新颖的餐厅设计、贴心便捷的设备、体贴周到的服务和优质美味的食品，为顾客提供新世代餐饮体验。

2018年，麦当劳向数码化迈出新一步，推出功能多样的一站式手机应用程式「麦当劳App」，顾客于弹指之间体验新餐饮服务。

about.en: Meka, a chain store specializing in personal health & beauty products, taking care all the daily needs for all age groups. Meka offers you a variety of products ranging from skin and hair products to health supplements enhancing health and quality of life. Running over 70 shops in HK, Meka’s membership program offers extra discounts on our products and provides periodic health and beauty information to our Members through newsletters. Free professional hair analysis is also available at our shops to provide professional advices on scalp and hair needs.
about.tc: Meka 【美康】經營個人健康護理產品的零售連鎖店，照顧不同年齡層的日常需要。由頭髮及皮膚的潔護到身體內在的營養補充，提供優質的選擇，令健康及生活質素提升。目前約有70間分店，店舖分佈香港島、九龍及新界。店內設有免費髮質分析服務，幫助客戶挑選出配合其髮膚的洗護髮產品。【美康】設有會員制度，購物滿指定金額即可成為會員，並尊享會員購物優惠及定期收到最新產品和優惠資訊。
about.sc: Meka 【美康】经营个人健康护理产品的零售连锁店，照顾不同年龄层的日常需要。由头发及皮肤的洁护到身体内在的营养补充，提供优质的选择，令健康及生活质素提升。目前约有70间分店，店铺分布香港岛、九龙及新界。店内设有免费发质分析服务，帮助客户挑选出配合其发肤的洗护发产品。 【美康】设有会员制度，购物满指定金额即可成为会员，并尊享会员购物优惠及定期收到最新产品和优惠资讯。

metaDescription.en:
Meka, a chain store specializing in personal health & beauty products, taking care all the daily needs for all age groups.  Meka offers you a variety of products ranging from skin and hair products to health supplements enhancing health and quality of life.  Running over 70 shops in HK, Meka’s membership program offers extra discounts on our products and provides periodic health and beauty information to our Members through newsletters.  Free professional hair analysis is also available at our shops to provide professional advices on scalp and hair needs.

Meka, a chain store specializing in personal Health & Beauty products, taking care of every one of your family.  Enhance the health and quality of life, Meka cares for you, from head to toe, from inside to outside of body.  Running over 70 shops in HK, Meka with members’ system, providing periodic health and beauty newsletter to our Members.  Free professional hair analysis is available at each shop, providing professional advices on scalp and hair needs.

Distributing the well-known medical skin care brand Sebamed, providing solutions for skin problems and are highly recommended by dermatologists.  Certain products are available exclusively at Meka, in a more economical and environmental-friendly packing.  Other well-known hair care, skin care and health supplements brands are also available at Meka to take care of the health of you and your family.

about.en: “Men Wah Bing Teng” brand is originated from a standalone “bing sutt” named Men Wah Bing Teng in Kowloon, Hong Kong with a long history dating back to 1970’s. “Men Wah Bing Teng” serves Hong Kong traditional “bing sutt” fast food snacks. Signature dishes such as Men Wah BBQ Pork with Egg and Rice, Egg in Boiling Water and Sa Cha Beef Noodles, which we believe allows our customers to reminisce on such earlier years of Hong Kong.
about.tc: 「敏華冰廳」品牌起源於香港九龍一間名為文華冰廳的獨立「冰室」，歷史悠久，可追溯至一九七零年代。「敏華冰廳」主要供應香港傳統「冰室」的快餐小食，招牌菜有敏華黯然銷魂飯、滾水雞蛋及沙茶牛肉麵等，為顧客帶來昔日香港風情。
about.sc: 「敏华冰厅」品牌起源于香港九龙一间名为文华冰厅的独立「冰室」，历史悠久，可追溯至一九七零年代。「敏华冰厅」主要供应香港传统「冰室」的快餐小食，招牌菜有敏华黯然销魂饭、滚水鸡蛋及沙茶牛肉面等，为顾客带来昔日香港风情。

about.en:
Minoshe was born in Singapore and has established a strong chain sales network in the Asia-Pacific region since 1999, distributed in Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Vietnam, Thailand, Hong Kong and Taiwan.
The main brands include Pierre Cardin, Sorella, YoungHearts and Minoshe.
The products that Minoshe represents are all limited, and there are new styles every month; the design is fashion-oriented, lively, trendy, and changeable; the products are functional, with concentrated support, seamless, seamless and comfortable, breathable and sweat-absorbing sports, etc. Styles, such as Tube Top, vests, shirt skirts, Corset, casual wear, seasonal products (summer-additional shirt skirts; winter-corsets, sanitary underwear), etc., using high-tech or high-quality materials, such as Lycra, Model, Tencel cotton, natural colored cotton, Doggi, chiffon yarn, etc., to provide super comfortable touch, super stretch elasticity and functionality; the shoulder strap design of many products can be changed and replaced at will.

"Let us pay attention to, carry and realize your dream of inner beauty". We promise to provide creative designs, high-quality products, products with competitive prices, and personalized personal services for women, fully demonstrating the femininity and self-confidence of the new generation of women.
about.tc:
Minoshe誔生於新加坡，於1999年起在亞太區域陸續建立了強而有力的連鎖銷售網路，分佈在新加坡、馬來西亞、印尼、越南、泰國、香港及台灣。
主力品牌包含Pierre Cardin、Sorella、YoungHearts及Minoshe。
Minoshe所代理的產品款款皆限量，每月有新款；設計以時尚為主軸，活潑、新潮、多變；產品具功能性，有集中托高、無縫無痕舒適、透氣吸汗運動等多樣化款式，亦包括如Tube Top、背心、外穿襯衣裙、Corset、休閒服、季節商品（夏季 - 增加襯衣裙; 冬季 - 束身衣, 衛生衣褲）等，採用高科技或高品質的材質，如萊卡、Model、Tencel天絲棉、天然彩棉、Doggi、雪紡紗等，以提供超舒適觸感、超優伸展彈性和機能性；許多產品的肩帶設計可任意變化和更換。

“讓我們關注、承載及實現您內在美的夢想”。我們承諾提供創意的設計、高品質的產品、具競爭性價格的商品，和女性個人化的貼身服務，充分展現新世代女性的柔美和自信。
about.sc:
Minoshe誔生于新加坡，于1999年起在亚太区域陆续建立了强而有力的连锁销售网路，分布在新加坡、马来西亚、印尼、越南、泰国、香港及台湾。
主力品牌包含Pierre Cardin、Sorella、YoungHearts及Minoshe。
Minoshe所代理的产品款款皆限量，每月有新款；设计以时尚为主轴，活泼、新潮、多变；产品具功能性，有集中托高、无缝无痕舒适、透气吸汗运动等多样化款式，亦包括如Tube Top、背心、外穿衬衣裙、Corset、休闲服、季节商品（夏季- 增加衬衣裙; 冬季- 束身衣, 卫生衣裤）等，采用高科技或高品质的材质，如莱卡、Model、Tencel天丝棉、天然彩棉、Doggi、雪纺纱等，以提供超舒适触感、超优伸展弹性和机能性；许多产品的肩带设计可任意变化和更换。

“让我们关注、承载及实现您内在美的梦想”。我们承诺提供创意的设计、高品质的产品、具竞争性价格的商品，和女性个人化的贴身服务，充分展现新世代女性的柔美和自信。

about.en:
Miramar Travel is a large-scale travel agency in Hong Kong. It is a member of Henderson Land Development Group, a Chinese-funded enterprise familiar to Hong Kong people. It is a travel agency with strong strength and excellent reputation and customer confidence. The management has experience in developing travel agencies. Many experienced elites in the travel industry respond to market needs and carefully create tours and self-parade routes to more than 400 destinations in 50 countries.

One-stop professional service
Miramar Tours provides tours around the world, booking air tickets and hotel parade packages, cruise holidays, Galaxy space tours, Guangdong and Macau ferry tickets, and arrange private and independent group services for travellers such as tour groups and self parades. Provide professional and one-stop travel agency services. The travel agency has established good cooperative relations with suppliers, airlines, tourism bureaus, and hotels around the world. The tour packages and self-parades organized by the travel agency can be diversified, high-quality, value-for-money, and competitive The price is launched on the market.

Miramar Travel currently has branches in Hong Kong, Kowloon, the New Territories and Guangzhou. It will also open a branch in Macau to provide customers in China, Hong Kong and Macau with comprehensive and high-quality travel agency services. In recent years, it has been actively developing online group reporting services, allowing customers to order tour groups, air tickets, self-guided parade packages, etc. anytime and anywhere.
about.tc:
美麗華旅遊是香港具規模的大型旅行社，為港人熟悉的華資企業 - 恆基兆業地產集團成員，實力雄厚，擁有卓越的信譽，是顧客信心的旅行社。管理層具有發展旅行社經驗，由眾多經驗豐富的旅遊界精英，因應市場需要，用心打造超過400個目的地、遍及50個國家的旅行團及自遊行等路線。

一站式專業服務
美麗華旅遊提供前往世界各地旅行團、代訂機票及酒店自遊行套票、郵輪假期、銀河太空旅遊、廣東及澳門船票，並安排私人及獨立組團等服務，為旅行團及自遊行等旅客提供專業而一站式的旅行社服務。本旅行社與供應商、航空公司、旅遊局以至世界各地的酒店建立了良好合作關係，所籌辦的旅行團及自遊行等旅遊產品能以多元化、高質素、物超所值，及具競爭力的價格推出市場。

美麗華旅遊現時分社遍布香港、九龍、新界及廣州，更將於澳門開設分社，為中港澳顧客提供貼身周全的優質旅行社服務。近年，更積極發展網上報團服務，讓顧客可隨時隨地訂購旅行團、機票、自遊行套票等。
about.sc:
美丽华旅游是香港具规模的大型旅行社，为港人熟悉的华资企业 - 恒基兆业地产集团成员，实力雄厚，拥有卓越的信誉，是顾客信心的旅行社。管理层具有发展旅行社经验，由众多经验丰富的旅游界精英，因应市场需要，用心打造超过400个目的地、遍及50个国家的旅行团及自游行等路线。

一站式专业服务
美丽华旅游提供前往世界各地旅行团、代订机票及酒店自游行套票、邮轮假期、银河太空旅游、广东及澳门船票，并安排私人及独立组团等服务，为旅行团及自游行等旅客提供专业而一站式的旅行社服务。本旅行社与供应商、航空公司、旅游局以至世界各地的酒店建立了良好合作关系，所筹办的旅行团及自游行等旅游产品能以多元化、高质素、物超所值，及具竞争力的价格推出市场。

美丽华旅游现时分社遍布香港、九龙、新界及广州，更将于澳门开设分社，为中港澳顾客提供贴身周全的优质旅行社服务。近年，更积极发展网上报团服务，让顾客可随时随地订购旅行团、机票、自游行套票等。

about.en:
Momo Casting Talent School was established in 2016, with the goal of enhancing children's self-confidence, training their acting talents, and discovering potential children to become professional child stars.
 
  There are countless examples of changing children who are afraid of ugliness and tolerance to become lively and outgoing child stars. This makes the school believe that as long as parents give children patience and encouragement, plus the children’s daily practice, and the teaching of the college’s professional team, the child will one day be reborn.  .
about.tc:
Momo Casting Talent School 小童星訓練學院於2016年成立，以提升小朋友的自信心為目標，培訓他們的演藝才能，並發掘具潛質的小朋友成為專業的小童星。
​
學院有無數改變怕醜耐弱的小孩成為活潑外向小童星的例子，令本校深信只要家長給予小孩耐性及鼓勵，加上小朋友每天的練習，再配合學院專業團隊的教學，小孩終有一天會脫胎換骨。
about.sc:
Momo Casting Talent School 小童星训练学院于2016年成立，以提升小朋友的自信心为目标，培训他们的演艺才能，并发掘具潜质的小朋友成为专业的小童星。
​
学院有无数改变怕丑耐弱的小孩成为活泼外向小童星的例子，令本校深信只要家长给予小孩耐性及鼓励，加上小朋友每天的练习，再配合学院专业团队的教学，小孩终有一天会脱胎换骨。

about.en: Monkey Tree English Learning Center was established in Hong Kong in 2009. There are currently over 70 different locations spread across Hong Kong, Macau and mainland China. Since its inception, it has grown to become the largest supplementary English provider for children between the ages 3 – 12. Our goal is to infuse a Westernized environment into our classrooms to give children an opportunity to not only learn English the native way, but also to develop intellectually, socially, physically, and emotionally.
about.tc: 我們於2009年在香港成立，現已發展至香港、澳門及內地超70間分校。我們自開校至今，已成為香港最大的英語補習機構，為3-12歲兒童提供課外英語學習課程。我們的目標是將西方文化環境融入我們的教室，讓有機會接觸全英語文化，更可以幫助孩子在智力，社交，大小肌肉和情感等多方面發展。
about.sc: 我们于2009年在香港成立，现已发展至香港、澳门及内地超70间分校。我们自开校至今，已成为香港最大的英语补习机构，为3-12岁儿童提供课外英语学习课程。我们的目标是将西方文化环境融入我们的教室，让有机会接触全英语文化，更可以帮助孩子在智力，社交，大小肌肉和情感等多方面发展。

about.en:
The provenance of our ingredients is of paramount importance to us as we embrace unique flavours discovered globally. We practice ethical sourcing by using organic and sustainable ingredients, wherever possible, while also working closely with farms to ensure the uncompromising quality of the food our culinary team prepares.

Our chefs utilize the latest in modern and innovative cooking techniques from around the world to create our dishes, which are principally Cantonese with some Beijing and Szechuan influences. Our food aims to bring the best out of time-honored recipes passed down from generation to generation; it is this particular level of modernity, combined with a respect for tradition, that makes Mott 32 so spectacularly unique.
about.sc:
我们一向重视食材的来源，一直坚持以最新鲜及时令的食材制作每一道菜式，希望能于菜式中充份展现食物的真味。厨艺团队与不同供应商保持紧密联系，并采用来自本地或海外的食材，以制作各式各样的佳肴。

卅二公馆之烹调哲学源于中国历史悠久之厨艺特色，以至世界各地最优质之饮食风味，并以传统烹调的方式呈现美食最质朴及真实的一面。大厨们巧妙地利用现代手法烹调中菜，创作多款推陈出新的菜式，极具个人风格之余，亦保留传统风味。
about.tc:
我們一向重視食材的來源，一直堅持以最新鮮及時令的食材製作每一道菜式，希望能於菜式中充份展現食物的真味。廚藝團隊與不同供應商保持緊密聯繫，並採用來自本地或海外的食材，以製作各式各樣的佳餚。

卅二公館之烹調哲學源於中國歷史悠久之廚藝特色，以至世界各地最優質之飲食風味，並以傳統烹調的方式呈現美食最質樸及真實的一面。大廚們巧妙地利用現代手法烹調中菜，創作多款推陳出新的菜式，極具個人風格之餘，亦保留傳統風味。

about.en: My Jewelry was founded in 1994, we provide good quality services to our customers with outlets allocated over Hong Kong Island, Kowloon Peninsula, and New Territories. My Jewelry has expanded its business all over Hong Kong. The aims of My Jewelry is to provide better services to customers. My Jewelry’s rapid development, now, we have more than one hundred thousand VIP members.
about.tc:
愛飾珠寶於1994年成立，現時為一間香港本地連鎖珠寶經營品牌。現時，愛飾旗下分店遍及港九、新界各區，為全港顧客提供優質服務。愛飾成立之初就致力為顧客提供更優質服務。由於愛飾連銷事業發展迅速，愛飾貴賓會員人數相應迅速遞增，至現時為止已超過十萬名會員。 

設計心思在顧客心中，愛飾珠寶不但薈萃了精鑄的18K750/14K585/10K416/8K333白金首飾、閃爍耀眼的證書美鑽，更展示了匠心獨運的工藝及設計。
about.sc:
爱饰珠宝于1994年成立，现时为一间香港本地连锁珠宝经营品牌。现时，爱饰旗下分店遍及港九、新界各区，为全港顾客提供优质服务。爱饰成立之初就致力为顾客提供更优质服务。由于爱饰连销事业发展迅速，爱饰贵宾会员人数相应迅速递增，至现时为止已超过十万名会员。 

设计心思在顾客心中，爱饰珠宝不但荟萃了精铸的18K750/14K585/10K416/8K333白金首饰、闪烁耀眼的证书美钻，更展示了匠心独运的工艺及设计。

about.en: NOME is a combination of the two words "NO" & "ME", where "NO" means not following the mainstream, and "ME" means self, conveying the value proposition of saying goodbye to the past and exploring another new lifestyle. We are a design-driven company. Through Nordic independent designers, we create works with design inspiration and practical functions, change the daily life of the public, and find the most suitable manufacturer globally.
about.tc: NOME由「 NO 」&「 ME 」兩個單詞的組合而成,    其中「 NO 」表示不隨主流, 「 ME 」表示自我, 傳遞告別過去, 探索另一種新生活方式    的價值主張。 我們是以設計為價值驅動的公司, 通過北歐    獨立設計師, 創造出具有設計靈感與實用功能的作品, 改變大眾日常生活,    並通過在全球範圍尋找最合適的製造商
about.sc: NOME由「 NO 」&「 ME 」两个单词的组合而成, 其中「 NO 」表示不随主流, 「 ME 」表示自我, 传递告别过去, 探索另一种新生活方式 的价值主张。我们是以设计为价值驱动的公司, 通过北欧 独立设计师, 创造出具有设计灵感与实用功能的作品, 改变大众日常生活, 并通过在全球范围寻找最合适的制造商

metaDescription.en: Welcome to NOME at Grand Plaza. Grand Plaza is home to a stellar line-up of international watch and jewelry brands, concept stores as well as fashion, lifestyle and sports labels. The dedicated Dining Floor features over 20 gourmet dining venues where international cuisine is served in stylish surroundings.
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到雅蘭中心的NOME。雅蘭中心匯聚國際鐘表珠寶品牌、概念商店以及多間時尚服飾與運動品牌。雅蘭中心「潮食點」更集20多間中、西、日人氣特色食肆，讓顧客於這鬧市中的時尚熱點，寫意享受各國優質美饌。
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到雅兰中心的NOME。雅兰中心汇聚国际钟表珠宝品牌、概念商店以及多间时尚服饰与运动品牌。雅兰中心「潮食点」更集20多间中、西、日人气特色食肆，让顾客于这闹市中的时尚热点，写意享受各国优质美馔。

about.en:
Nabe Urawa makes traditional shabu shabu an international experience with top quality ingredients flown in from around the world. Nabe Urawa, focuses on bringing guests an indulgent yet balanced, casual and fun experience. 

The all-you-can-eat experience at Nabe Urawa is all about balance mixed with indulgence at an affordable price. Top quality ingredients are balanced with luxurious imported beef and seafood mixed with the freshly picked, seasonal, locally grown vegetables. Our delectable and nutritious food quickly bring together a group of friends or family who enjoy picking their next bite from an abundant selection of ingredients laid out in the self-service buffet display, the quick table-top cooking and finally the dipping of each bite into delicious sauces, condiments and seasonings. 

Everyone at the table will be able to fully immerse themselves in the experience thanks to the restaurant’s spacious, sophisticated interior elevated with friendly and warm service.
about.tc:
牛気提供世界各地的高品質食材，將傳統涮涮鍋鍋轉變成一種國際化體驗。牛気致力於為顧客提供集休閒、有趣放鬆為一體的美食體驗。

豐盛優質的食物讓你在牛気暢享放縱好滋味。在牛気，我們的客人可以盡情享受於一碟又一碟的優質、脂肪紋理完美的澳洲和日本和牛，來自世界各地的新鮮海鮮，嚴格挑選的豚肉和雞肉，和一盤又一盤廚師親手準備的新鮮蔬菜。涮涮鍋和壽喜燒都是令人愉快的膳食。它們不只是美味和富有營養，在和家人朋友聚會時，享受他們挑選的精緻食材，撒上調料，沾一口美味的醬汁，快速的咬下，每一口都是烹飪的樂趣，每一口都是獨特的口味。

除此之外，餐廳特別設計的裝潢及打造的創意空間感，讓在餐桌上的每個人都能完全沉浸在體驗中，感受禪意。
about.sc:
牛気提供世界各地的高品质食材，将传统涮涮锅锅转变成一种国际化体验。牛気致力于为顾客提供集休闲、有趣放松为一体的美食体验。

丰盛优质的食物让你在牛気畅享放纵好滋味。在牛気，我们的客人可以尽情享受于一碟又一碟的优质、脂肪纹理完美的澳洲和日本和牛，来自世界各地的新鲜海鲜，严格挑选的豚肉和鸡肉，和一盘又一盘厨师亲手准备的新鲜蔬菜。涮涮锅和寿喜烧都是令人愉快的膳食。它们不只是美味和富有营养，在和家人朋友聚会时，享受他们挑选的精致食材，撒上调料，沾一口美味的酱汁，快速的咬下，每一口都是烹饪的乐趣，每一口都是独特的口味。

除此之外，餐厅特别设计的装潢及打造的创意空间感，让在餐桌上的每个人都能完全沉浸在体验中，感受禅意。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Nabe Urawa at Grand Plaza. Grand Plaza is home to a stellar line-up of international watch and jewelry brands, concept stores as well as fashion, lifestyle and sports labels. about.en:
National Geographic is supporting numerous scientific, exploration, and conservation projects to bring the world's beauty and announce the new facts to the world, and believes that storytelling from science and exploration can change the world. 

National Geographic Apparel is inspired by the spirit of adventure, exploration and nature, hoping to promote the daily fashion style and at the same time, the message on protecting the world.

With National Geographic, your purchase has purpose. Every purchase helps support the global nonprofit National Geographic Society in its work to protect and illuminate our world through exploration, research, and education. "To learn more, visit natgeo.com/info".
about.tc:
National Geographic 一直支持科學、動物保護與探索項目，並以擴展人類的地理知識為重要價值，秉持「對世界的好奇與興趣能改變世界」的品牌哲學。

National Geographic Apparel 致力提供從冒險、探索和自然中汲取靈感的產品，希望推廣時尚潮流之外，同時向大眾帶出愛護大自然和環保的訊息。

每次消費都會有助支持國際非牟利機構National Geographic Society，透過探索、研究及教育來保護和詮釋世界的工作。
about.sc:
National Geographic 一直支持科学、动物保护与探索项目，并以扩展人类的地理知识为重要价值，秉持「对世界的好奇与兴趣能改变世界」的品牌哲学。

National Geographic Apparel 致力提供从冒险、探索和自然中汲取灵感的产品，希望推广时尚潮流之外，同时向大众带出爱护大自然和环保的讯息。

每次消费都会有助支持国际非牟利机构National Geographic Society，透过探索、研究及教育来保护和诠释​​世界的工作。

about.en: New Balance’s stores have staff with professional experience to find your perfect fit. Our stores carry everything from footwear in a wide range of sizes and widths, to a versatile offering of apparel and accessories. Whether it's walking, running, or simply looking good, our wide selection can help you reach your goals. Our unique expertise combined with our vast selection of products make the New Balance store your ideal destination for making excellent happen.
about.tc: New Balance能提供極致貼合腳型的鞋款，每間 New Balance 專門店的店員都有豐富經驗，致力助你尋找最合適的鞋款。 我們的專門店提供一系列不同尺碼與闊度的鞋款，更有眾多時尚多功能的服裝與配飾可供選購。 無論你想找步行鞋、跑步鞋或時尚運動鞋，我們的產品系列定能滿足您需求。 憑著獨特的專業知識與眾多產品選擇，New Balance 專門店助您成就卓越。
about.sc: New Balance能提供极致贴合脚型的鞋款，每间 New Balance 专门店的店员都有丰富经验，致力助你寻找最合适的鞋款。 我们的专门店提供一系列不同尺码与阔度的鞋款，更有众多时尚多功能的服装与配饰可供选购。 无论你想找步行鞋、跑步鞋或时尚运动鞋，我们的产品系列定能满足您需求。 凭着独特的专业知识与众多产品选择，New Balance 专门店助您成就卓越。

about.en: NEW ERA - Headwear and apparel brand founded in 1920 in Buffalo, NY. A global brand of sport, culture, style, and self-expression for 100 years. Best known for being the official on-field cap for Major League Baseball, the official sideline cap for the National Football League, and the official on-court cap for the National Basketball Association, New Era® is the brand of choice not only for its headwear collection, but also for its accessories and apparel lines for men, women and youth. The brand is worn as a symbol of self-expression by athletes, artists and some of the most interesting people around the globe.
about.tc: New Era 於1920年在美國紐約州布法羅創立，具有100年歷史的全球帽飾和服裝品牌代表著運動，文化，和忠於自我的風格。New Era不僅是美國職業棒球大聯盟MLB帽的製造經銷商，同時亦是國家橄欖球聯盟和國家籃球協會的官方製造經銷商，New Era產品包括帽子及服裝，經典的棒球帽一直是現青年男女的必備配飾，除此之深受著名運動員，明星和追求生活趣味的人追捧。
about.sc: New Era 於1920年在美国纽约州布法罗创立，具有100年历史的全球帽饰和服装品牌代表著运动，文化，和忠於自我的风格。New Era不仅是美国职业棒球大联盟MLB帽的製造经销商，同时亦是国家橄榄球联盟和国家篮球协会的官方製造经销商，New Era产品包括帽子及服装，经典的棒球帽一直是现青年男女的必备配饰，除此之深受著名运动员，明星和追求生活趣味的人追捧。

農本方®中醫診所揉合傳統的中醫藥理念、專業中醫師精湛之醫術、先進的設備，並配以安全有效、服用方便的即沖濃縮中藥配方顆粒及現代化診所管理系統，為病人提供優質、安全及可靠的中醫門診服務。
about.sc:
全新概念的现代化中医诊所
崭新的中医诊所概念：揉合中医传统与现代科技

农本方®中医诊所揉合传统的中医药理念、专业中医师精湛之医术、先进的设备，并配以安全有效、服用方便的即冲浓缩中药配方颗粒及现代化诊所管理系统，为病人提供优质、安全及可靠的中医门诊服务。

about.en: Headed by Virgil Abloh, OFF-WHITE has been defining the grey area between black and white since 2013. Abloh's pursuit of his own visual vocabulary combines ideologies behind graphic design, art history, semiotics and luxury, actualising today’s youth culture’s concept of embracing the “now”. Collaborating with brands such as Levi's, Moncler, Nike and IKEA, the label successfully cultivated a multidisciplinary outlook on design that resonates widely with the masses.
about.sc: 美国品牌OFF-WHITE c/o VIRGIL ABLOH™于2014 年由 Virgil Abloh 创办，行走于街头文化与人气时尚之间，以当代元素诠释青年文化，精细做工诠释潮流服饰，照片、画作和抢眼的图形印花都是设计师的灵感源泉。白色条纹和箭头图案则令其走红的代表设计。

about.en: Meaning ‘Treasure Trove’ in Japanese, OKURA is a curation store that offers a carefully selected array of quality products which features unique design concepts. With an aspiration to redefine the perception of modern living that is free from the restraints of trends, OKURA believes in products that last a lifetime. The clothing and collectables personally handpicked from all over Japan by our experienced team all represent unique aesthetic values and individualities that encourage lifetime appreciation. Not resigned to being just a concept store, OKURA has also incorporated an exhibition area that occasionally showcases works by local creative units, to create an accessible platform for fascinations and inspirations.
about.tc: OKURA（「御蔵」），意指「寶庫」，而我們的OKURA，則是為生活文化賦予新意義的「寶庫」。我們從CURATION STORE概念出發，本著「愛用」的理念，於日本各地網羅擁有設計理念的生活小品及衣履品牌，蒐集具個性且讓人想要好好保存的貨品，並把日式生活美學融入店舖當中，劃分成服飾、家品、工藝品及文具雜貨等不同部分，特意騰出展覽空間，不定期邀請各地創作單位參展，從生活小品的設計到生活品味的欣賞，藉此體現出OKURA所持的一份態度：執著於生活美學的追求。
about.sc: OKURA（「御蔵」），意指「宝库」，而我们的OKURA，则是为生活文化赋予新意义的「宝库」。我们从CURATION STORE概念出发，本着「爱用」的理念，于日本各地网罗拥有设计理念的生活小品及衣履品牌，搜集具个性且让人想要好好保存的货品，并把日式生活美学融入店铺当中，划分成服饰、家品、工艺品及文具杂货等不同部分，特意腾出展览空间，不定期邀请各地创作单位参展，从生活小品的设计到生活品味的欣赏，借此体现出OKURA所持的一份态度：执着于生活美学的追求。

about.en:
Founded through their shared passion for fashion, Delphine Lefay and Diego Dultzin Lacoste launched OnTheList in 2016 with the aim of offering the best shopping experience for everyone in Hong Kong. In September 2018, OnTheList expanded to the shores of Singapore and subsequently to Taipei in early 2019, followed by Shanghai at the end of 2019.

OnTheList is a pioneering concept of Members-Only Flash Sales, offering members exclusive access to luxury brands at discounted prices, for a limited number of days, both instore and online. Members are invited by an e-mailed barcode to our permanent showrooms or pop up stores for the 3 or 4 days event. They can also access our e-commerce platform 24/7 with the member ID. 

OnTheList offers brands a sustainable option to clear past-season merchandise; turning old inventory into opportunity whilst simultaneously paving an additional channel to a wider consumer market. Working directly with over 500 brands or their official distributors, OnTheList offers its members authentic and quality products with the promise of being the best deal in town. 

Great deals combined with attractive brands allow OnTheList to provide the ultimate omni-channel shopping experience for their members through online and offline, and also our “OnTheList Asia” mobile application.
about.tc:
OnTheList 於2016年由兩位法藉年輕企業家Delphine & Diego創立，是香港首個會員制名牌快閃購物平台。我們深信即使是過季貨品亦有其優勢，故成為品牌及會員的新橋樑，希望透過快閃購物活動減少時裝業對環境的影響，同時推行永續時裝的概念。2018年OnTheList業務拓展至新加坡，2019年相繼在台北及上海舉辦第一場快閃折扣活動，4年間進軍亞太區4大主要城市。

OnTheList每星期與不同品牌合作，舉行三至四天線上線下的快閃活動，以最優惠價格出售各類貨品，包括時裝、鞋履、美容、首飾、美酒、鐘錶、文具、家品電器、旅遊等等。只需透過網上登記，憑電子證即可親臨中環都爹利街6號印刷行地下，或登入網上商店，隨時隨地以最優惠價購物。會員亦可下載 ｢OnTheList Asia｣ 手機應用程式，專享線上線下一站式高質、多元化的快閃購物體驗。
about.sc:
OnTheList 于2016年由两位法借年轻企业家Delphine & Diego创立，是香港首个会员制名牌快闪购物平台。我们深信即使是过季货品亦有其优势，故成为品牌及会员的新桥梁，希望透过快闪购物活动减少时装业对环境的影响，同时推行永续时装的概念。2018年OnTheList业务拓展至新加坡，2019年相继在台北及上海举办第一场快闪折扣活动，4年间进军亚太区4大主要城市。

OnTheList每星期与不同品牌合作，举行三至四天线上线下的快闪活动，以最优惠价格出售各类货品，包括时装、鞋履、美容、首饰、美酒、钟表、文具、家品电器、旅游等等。只需透过网上登记，凭电子证即可亲临中环都爹利街6号印刷行地下，或登入网上商店，随时随地以最优惠价购物。会员亦可下载 ｢OnTheList Asia｣ 手机应用程式，专享线上线下一站式高质、多元化的快闪购物体验。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to OnTheList at Printing House. Located at the heart of Hong Kong’s Central business and shopping district, with five-star hotels, fine dining and the famed entertainment area of Lan Kwai Fong all within easy reach.

about.en: Onituska Tiger found in 1949, it is a lifestyle brand in the fusion of Japanese heritage and modern flair. With designs ranging from updated classic silhouettes to new styles and collaborations with like-minded artists and cultural connoisseurs, the spirit of Japan resonates in each new collection of Onitsuka Tiger shoes, apparel, and accessories.
about.sc: Onituska Tiger创立于1949年，完美融合了日式传统与时尚魅力，成为广受喜爱的休闲品牌；包括革新的经典款式、全新款式及与品牌分享共同美学的艺术家及资深文化人携手创作的联名系列。在Onitsuka Tiger各鞋款、服饰和配件中皆可感受到日本文化的精神。
about.tc: Onituska Tiger創立於1949年，完美融合了日式傳統與時尚魅力，成為廣受喜愛的休閒品牌；包括革新的經典款式、全新款式及與品牌分享共同美學的藝術家及資深文化人攜手創作的聯名系列。在Onitsuka Tiger各鞋款、服飾和配件中皆可感受到日本文化的精神。

about.en: Inspired by laid-back LA skate culture, Moncler art director and Italian photographer Francesco Ragazzi founded the label Palm Angels in 2015. Its signature tracksuits and logo sportswear are reworked to be incorporated into everyday style - Californian skater with a touch of Italian sophistication.
about.sc: 偶然的灵感让意大利著名摄影师Francesco Ragazzi萌生通过创立品牌以表达滑板文化的想法，也就是现在的 Palm Angels。他将定格在镜头下的许多精彩瞬间重新解读，转化为手里的服装作品，并通过大胆的色彩和印花呈现出自由、随意、舒适又充满活力的街头时尚。
about.tc: 偶然的靈感讓義大利著名攝影師Francesco Ragazzi萌生透過創立品牌以表達滑板文化的想法，也就是現在的 Palm Angels。他將定格在鏡頭下的許多精彩瞬間重新解讀，轉化為手裡的服裝作品，並通過大膽的色彩和印花呈現出自由、隨意、舒適又充滿活力的街頭時尚。

about.en: Patrizia Pepe was found in Florence, 1993. The brand proved itself capable of creating iconic garments of indisputable originality, recognisable and appreciated over the years.
about.tc: Patrizia Pepe在1993年誕生於意大利的佛羅倫薩，品牌秉承一貫的優雅和現代，不斷創新，富於變幻，並將這些特質帶入配飾，鞋履，包袋和珠寶產品中。 品牌相當注重產品的質感，從設計到製作的每一個細節都強調美與舒適度必須結合的理念，從而使人們能夠根據個人風格和不同的出席場合搭配出豐富多樣的美好形象。
about.sc: Patrizia Pepe在1993年诞生于意大利的佛罗伦萨，品牌秉承一贯的优雅和现代，不断创新，富于变幻，并将这些特质带入配饰，鞋履，包袋和珠宝产品中。 品牌相当注重产品的质感，从设计到制作的每一个细节都强调美与舒适度必须结合的理念，从而使人们能够根据个人风格和不同的出席场合搭配出丰富多样的美好形象。

about.en: PRIVATE i SALON Group provides a wide range of services including hair, make-up, image consultation and professional hair products (including Milbon & Lebel - Japanese No.1 & No.3 haircare brands). Besides, the interior designs and overall ambience of each salon also matter to us. We are very honoured that PRIVATE i SALON was awarded by the Asia Pacific Interior Design Award for the Best Interior Design.
about.sc: PRIVATE i SALON集团提供多项美容服务，包括发型、化妆、形象咨询和专业美发产品（包括 Milbon 和 Lebel - 日本第一和第三大护发品牌）。此外，店铺的室内设计和整体氛围对我们也很重要，PRIVATE i SALON曾荣获亚太室内设计奖最佳室内设计奖。
about.tc: PRIVATE i SALON集團提供多項美容服務，包括髮型、化妝、形象諮詢和專業美髮產品（包括 Milbon 和 Lebel - 日本第一和第三大護髮品牌）。此外，店舖的室內設計和整體氛圍對我們也很重要，PRIVATE i SALON曾榮獲亞太室內設計獎最佳室內設計獎。

metaDescription.en: The first Concept Store with more than 8,000 sq.ft. that offers beauty treatments for both pets and pet lovers. Services include hair, nail and skin care for the owners, while there’s a groomer, natural mud and Causeway Bay’s only dog swimming pool. Let's visit us to enjoy one-stop beauty service now!
metaDescription.sc: 全港首个提供「人宠共融」休憩和娱乐空间，铜锣湾店占地超过8,000呎，设有室内恒温狗狗游泳池，顾客可带同宠物爱尽享一站式美发、美甲、美容等星级服务，一齐扮靓靓，与爱犬爱猫渡过温馨甜蜜的时光！
metaDescription.tc: 全港首個提供「人寵共融」休憩和娛樂空間，銅鑼灣店佔地超過8,000呎，設有室內恆溫狗狗游泳池，顧客可帶同寵物愛盡享一站式美髮、美甲、美容等星級服務，一齊扮靚靚，與愛犬愛貓渡過溫馨甜蜜的時光！

about.en:
【Gear You Up．Care You More】
Since the founding of PROTREK in 1992, our mission has never changed, “To run a sustainable outdoor business under a win-win situation”. We are constantly improving our business for the benefit of our staff, customers and the community.
about.tc:
【為您裝備．更展關懷】
PROTREK誕生於上世紀九十年代，這些年來，我們的宗旨一直沒有改變 —「在多贏的進程中，經營可持續發展的戶外事業」；在業務、員工、顧客及社會之間平衡發展。
about.sc:
【为您装备．更展关怀】
PROTREK诞生于上世纪九十年代，这些年来，我们的宗旨一直没有改变 —「在多赢的进程中，经营可持续发展的户外事业」；在业务、员工、顾客及社会之间平衡发展。

about.en: A pancake brand founded by the famous sweet shop in Kyoto – Kitano Lab. Our gluten-free pancake is made with Japan’s finest rice flour, the fluffy and pillowy soft texture. Redefine the classic Japanese pancake and delight your taste buds!
about.tc: 由京都享負盛名的甜品名門Kitano Lab創立的pancake品牌，採用日本最高級別米粉製作的Gluten-free Pancake口感鬆軟與日本北海道的100％新鮮忌廉的配搭，重新定義日式Pancake。
about.sc: 由京都享负盛名的甜品名门Kitano Lab创立的pancake品牌，采用日本最高级别米粉制作的Gluten-free Pancake口感松软与日本北海道的100％新鲜忌廉的配搭，重新定义日式Pancake。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Pancake Senmon at Fashion Walk. We are a unique fusion of indoor and outdoor elements at the heart of Causeway Bay, embracing three vibrant streets – Paterson, Food Street and Kingston.
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到Fashion Walk的Pancake Senmon。Fashion Walk是汇聚时尚、品味生活及国际美馔的潮流热点，提供独特的室内及室外购物环境，涵盖叁大区域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到Fashion Walk的Pancake Senmon。Fashion Walk是匯聚時尚、品味生活及國際美饌的潮流熱點，提供獨特的室內及室外購物環境，涵蓋三大區域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。

about.en: Pandora designs, manufactures and markets hand-finished jewellery made from high-quality materials at affordable prices. Pandora jewellery is sold in more than 100 countries through 7,400 points of sale, including more than 2,700 concept stores. Headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark, Pandora employs 28,000 people worldwide and crafts its jewellery at two LEED certified facilities in Thailand using mainly recycled silver and gold. The company plans to be carbon neutral by 2025 and has joined the Science Based Targets initiative to reduce emissions across its full value chain. Pandora is listed on the Nasdaq Copenhagen stock exchange.
about.tc: 丹麥國際珠寶品牌Pandora的珠寶採用優質的材料以手工製作而成，並以可負擔的價格銷售。Pandora珠寶於全球逾100個國家約7,400個零售點銷售，當中包括超過2,700間Pandora品牌概念店。Pandora總部設於丹麥哥本哈根，全球擁有28,000名員工，並在泰國的兩個LEED認證設施中製造珠寶，主要使用循環再造的白銀和黃金。品牌更在哥本哈根的納斯達克證券交易市場上市。
about.sc: 丹麦国际珠宝品牌Pandora的珠宝采用优质的材料以手工制作而成，并以可负担的价格销售。Pandora珠宝于全球逾100个国家约7,400个零售点销售，当中包括超过2,700间Pandora品牌概念店。Pandora总部设于丹麦哥本哈根，全球拥有28,000名员工，并在泰国的两个LEED认证设施中制造珠宝，主要使用循环再造的白银和黄金。品牌更在哥本哈根的纳斯达克证券交易市场上市。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Pandora at Peak Galleria. Ideally located atop the famous attraction in Hong Kong, Victoria Peak, The Peak Galleria is an extensive shopping and dining complex complemented by various exciting activities.
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到山顶广场的Pandora。山顶广场位于香港的著名旅游胜地太平山顶，提供丰富的购物及餐饮选择，并引进各行业中具代表性的主题馆，定位成为本地及海外游客的必到景点。

about.en: Paradise Dynasty serves cuisine with exquisite flavors from the northern and southern regions of China such as dim sum, La Mian and Xiao Long Bao. The legend of Paradise’s World Famous 8 International Flavored Xiao Long Bao is a refreshing take on age-old recipes.
about.tc: 樂天皇朝提供精緻創新的南北點心、拉麵、小籠包及經典中國八大菜系佳餚，深受老饕喜愛。獨創八種口味的八色小籠包讓您有耳目一新的感官與味覺盛宴。
about.sc: 乐天皇朝提供精致创新的南北点心、拉面、小笼包及经典中国八大菜系佳肴，深受老饕喜爱。独创八种口味的八色小笼包让您有耳目一新的感官与味觉盛宴。

about.en:
Parsons Music Corporation, founded in 1986, is one of the leading and most prestigious multinational musical companies in both Mainland China and Hong Kong. We have our own production line for musical instruments, strong retail network and well-found music centers for educating music talents. The Group is now one of the world’s top 3 piano manufacturers, World’s top seven and China’s No.1 musical instrument retailer; it also ranks 11th in Global Music Industry Rankings.

To fully accomplish our mission of “Popularizing music culture and nurturing music talents”, we have been actively holding and sponsoring numerous musical functions. The Corporation sets to vigorously develop the industry of music and arts!
about.tc: 柏斯音樂成立於1986年，是中港最具規模的樂器連鎖專門店，一直致力推廣音樂文化培育音樂人才，將最好品質的音樂產品，最好的教學，以及最好的服務帶給音樂愛好者。
about.sc: 柏斯音乐成立于1986年，是中港最具规模的乐器连锁专门店，一直致力推广音乐文化培育音乐人才，将最好品质的音乐产品，最好的教学，以及最好的服务带给音乐爱好者。

about.en: Physical Fitness and Beauty is the most famous brand in Hong Kong. In 1986 Physical opened its first fitness & yoga centre in Hong Kong, and now the group has the widest centre network in Hong Kong with 91 branches in Hong Kong and China. Keeping faith in “Sincerity, Professionalism, Diligence, Integrity”, Physical endeavours to bring unrivalled fitness, yoga, beauty, slimming experiences to customers.
about.tc: 舒適堡健身及美容集團是香港著名品牌，匯聚男女健身瑜伽及美容纖體服務。集團在1986年於香港開設第一家健身瑜伽中心，迄今已設立91家分店，業務遍佈香港及中國，為全港網絡最大分店最多。舒適堡一直秉承「誠懇、專業、用心、真誠」的理念，致力為大眾締造一個集健身、瑜伽、美容、纖體的嶄新高品味生活體驗。
about.sc: 舒适堡健身及美容集团是香港著名品牌，汇聚男女健身瑜伽及美容纤体服务。集团在1986年于香港开设第一家健身瑜伽中心，迄今已设立91家分店，业务遍布香港及中国，为全港网络最大分店最多。舒适堡一直秉承「诚恳、专业、用心、真诚」的理念，致力为大众缔造一个集健身、瑜伽、美容、纤体的崭新高品味生活体验。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Piotte at Grand Plaza. Grand Plaza is home to a stellar line-up of international watch and jewelry brands, concept stores as well as fashion, lifestyle and sports labels. The dedicated Dining Floor features over 20 gourmet dining venues where international cuisine is served in stylish surroundings.
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到雅蘭中心的Piotte。雅蘭中心匯聚國際鐘表珠寶品牌、概念商店以及多間時尚服飾與運動品牌。雅蘭中心「潮食點」更集20多間中、西、日人氣特色食肆，讓顧客於這鬧市中的時尚熱點，寫意享受各國優質美饌。
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到雅兰中心的Piotte。雅兰中心汇聚国际钟表珠宝品牌、概念商店以及多间时尚服饰与运动品牌。雅兰中心「潮食点」更集20多间中、西、日人气特色食肆，让顾客于这闹市中的时尚热点，写意享受各国优质美馔。

about.en:
Pizza Hut has been serving Hong Kong for over 30 years and its first restaurant was opened in 1981. In 1987, Jardine Matheson & Co. Ltd. took over the Hong Kong Pizza Hut franchise business and since then “Customer Mania” has been adopted as the corporate culture towards serving its customers with total dedication.

Pizza Hut is the largest pizza and pasta chain restaurant in Hong Kong, with over 4,000 employees being deployed to work in over 80 outlets throughout Hong Kong and Macau, including takeaway and delivery services.

To become the leading aspiration casual dining restaurant chain in Hong Kong and Macau with unique European sensation, serving a wide range of relevant and delicious dishes with unsurpassed food quality and offering an environment where our customers can enjoy the European dining experience and a great time with friends and family.

To sustain leading Pizza Delivery Provider in which our delivered quality pizzas and pasta are always hot and delivered on time.
about.tc:
必勝客服務香港逾 30 年，而香港首間必勝客於 1981 年開業。1987 年，香港必勝客的經營權由怡和集團擁有，並一直抱著「為客瘋狂」的企業文化，全心全意為顧客提供優質服務。

必勝客是全港最大的連鎖式薄餅及意粉餐廳，港、澳分店逾 80 間，員工人數超過 4,000 人，除堂食外，當中亦為顧客提供外賣自取及外送速遞服務。

成為港澳休閒連鎖式餐廳的領袖，讓顧客在舒適的環境下，與親朋好友以合理價錢一同分享歐陸風味的優質美食，體驗一段段的美好時光及“Pizza and More”的理念。

保持薄餅外送速遞市場的領尊地位，保證為顧客送上火熱的優質歐陸風味美食。
about.sc:
必胜客服务香港逾 30 年，而香港首间必胜客于 1981 年开业。 1987 年，香港必胜客的经营权由怡和集团拥有，并一直抱着「为客疯狂」的企业文化，全心全意为顾客提供优质服务。

必胜客是全港最大的连锁式薄饼及意粉餐厅，港、澳分店逾 80 间，员工人数超过 4,000 人，除堂食外，当中亦为顾客提供外卖自取及外送速递服务。

成为港澳休闲连锁式餐厅的领袖，让顾客在舒适的环境下，与亲朋好友以合理价钱一同分享欧陆风味的优质美食，体验一段段的美好时光及“Pizza and More”的理念。

保持薄饼外送速递市场的领尊地位，保证为顾客送上火热的优质欧陆风味美食。

about.en:
PizzaExpress is really proud of its pizzas, its love for music and supporting meaningful causes in the community. Since 1965 the restaurants have been serving hand-crafted pizzas made with the freshest ingredients. 

Each pizza is made to order by skilled Pizzaiolos (pizza chefs). Beautiful pizza served in a socially-responsible and creative environment; this truly is ‘Pizza in Style’.
about.tc:
PizzaExpress一直以製作真正的意大利薄餅及對音樂的熱愛為傲，自1965年起已開始為客人送上以新鮮材料即點即制的手工薄餅。每塊意大利薄餅均由專業Pizzaiolo - 薄餅師傅們親手製作。

除此之外，PizzaExpress更堅持關心及服務社群。不斷用心製作完美的薄餅，加上優秀的服務、對社會的關懷及優越的環境，PizzaExpress把這稱為 “Pizza in Style”。
about.sc:
PizzaExpress一直以制作真正的意大利薄饼及对音乐的热爱为傲，自1965年起已开始为客人送上以新鲜材料即点即制的手工薄饼。每块意大利薄饼均由专业Pizzaiolo-薄饼师傅们亲手 制作。

此外，PizzaExpress更坚持关注及服务社群。不断用心制作完美的薄饼，加上优秀的服务，对社会的关怀及优越的环境，PizzaExpress把这称为“ Pizza in Style”。

about.en:
Founded in 2013, Premier Food Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as Premier Food) is a modern dried fish maw and seafood specialty store. With innovative sales and operation model, we had reshaped the new look of Hong Kong's traditional dried seafood industry for many years. We are now having up to 39 branches. Premier Food specializes in high-quality dry seafood goods such as Dried Fish Maw, Cordyceps, Sea Cucumber, Bird's Nest, etc. The parent company specializes in the wholesale of dried fish maw and other foods in Sheung Wan. Its turnover is the top three in Dried Seafood Street. With leading market sense and stable supply, Premier Food could provide high quality global goods.

Based on the brand concept of” Premier. Natural. Healthy”, Premier Food provides all kinds of direct delivery dried fish maws from production, processing and finished products. We sell more than 100 kinds of dried fish maws which is the most comprehensive dried fish maw specialist in Hong Kong.

Our goal is to inject modern elements into the traditional dried seafood industry. Our team is young and energetic. We are customer-oriented, we always provide and satisfy customers with high quality, healthy, safe and value-for-money dried seafood products.
about.tc:
尚品之薈有限公司(下稱尚品)創辦於2013年，是一間現代化花膠海味專門店，以革新的銷售及營運模式，多年來為香港傳統海味行業的形象重塑新面貌，至今已發展擁有多達39間分店。尚品專營花膠、蟲草、海參、燕窩等優質海味乾貨，母公司於上環專營花膠及其他參茸海味批發，其營業額為海味街同行中頭三位，憑著領先的市場觸覺及穩定貨源，能源源不絕為尚品供應高質素的環球食材。

尚品以「崇尚質量‧天然健康」為品牌理念，提供各類產地直送花膠，由生產、加工到成品包裝都有嚴格規定，售賣超過100多種花膠款式，是香港最全面的花膠專門店。

我們目標為傳統海味行業注入現代化元素，我們的團隊年青、有活力，本著以客為本的原則，一直為顧客提供高質量、健康、安全和超值的海味參茸食材，致力將尚品打造成為參茸海味零售界的新星。
about.sc:
尚品之荟有限公司(下称尚品)创办于2013年，是一间现代化花胶海味专门店，以革新的销售及营运模式，多年来为香港传统海味行业的形象重塑新面貌，至今已发展拥有多达39间分店。尚品专营花胶、虫草、海参、燕窝等优质海味干货，母公司于上环专营花胶及其他参茸海味批发，其营业额为海味街同行中头三位，凭着领先的市场触觉及稳定货源，能源源不绝为尚品供应高质素的环球食材。

尚品以「崇尚质量‧天然健康」为品牌理念，提供各类产地直送花胶，由生产、加工到成品包装都有严格规定，售卖超过100多种花胶款式，是香港最全面的花胶专门店。

我们目标为传统海味行业注入现代化元素，我们的团队年青、有活力，本着以客为本的原则，一直为顾客提供高质量、健康、安全和超值的海味参茸食材，致力将尚品打造成为参茸海味零售界的新星。

about.en:
Pro-Balance, a Hong Kong local brand, designed in Hong Kong, and made in Germany.  
The world's first kitchen knife with adjustable weight was designed by Pro-Balance’s founder and chief designer Jimi Kwok.  
Adding adjustable weight to the handle of a knife is unprecedented. It allows the user to locate his/her own point of balance, and therefore, customizing the knife to integrate it with the user’s personal knife habits.

about.en:
Promise (Hong Kong) Co., Ltd is a wholly owned overseas subsidiary of SMBC Consumer Finance (hereinafter “SMBCCF”), one of the leading consumer finance institutions in Japan.

Established as a licensed money lender in Hong Kong in 1992, Promise (Hong Kong) Co., Ltd inherits the experience of SMBCCF in credit management, operation management and marketing management, providing convenient consumer finance, which have always been popular to local customers. We also take great pride in the training and development of our staff, as well as our comprehensive business network. Being one of the few personal loan providers who serve on Sundays, Promise is dedicated to providing flexible financing solutions for local citizens. Customers can now relieve their cash flow needs anytime and anywhere.

Moreover, we add values to our loan service with popular features such as daily interest and revolving loans.
about.tc:
邦民香港是日本消費者金融行業之其中，最具規模之一的SMBC Consumer Finance（下稱SMBCCF）的100%全資子公司。邦民香港傳承了SMBCCF在日本多年在授信管理、債權管理、營運管理和市場管理等各方面財務行業的知識及經驗。邦民日本財務（香港）有限公司自1992年開始營業至今，於香港私人財務公司市場發展多年，為廣大市民提供方便稱心的貸款服務之同時，亦重視員工的培訓，並致力拓展多元化的業務網絡。邦民香港亦是少數於星期日提供貸款服務★的私人財務公司，為香港市民提供靈活的貸款方案，讓客戶可以隨時隨地解決現金周轉需要。

此外，邦民香港提供以日息計算，具循環貸款功能等的貸款服務，其便利之處，為廣大市民歡迎。
about.sc:
邦民香港是日本消费者金融行业之其中，最具规模之一的SMBC Consumer Finance（下称SMBCCF）的100%全资子公司。邦民香港传承了SMBCCF在日本多年在授信管理、债权管理、营运管理和市场管理等各方面财务行业的知识及经验。邦民日本财务（香港）有限公司自1992年开始营业至今，于香港私人财务公司市场发展多年，为广大市民提供方便称心的贷款服务之同时，亦重视员工的培训，并致力拓展多元化的业务网络。邦民香港亦是少数于星期日提供贷款服务★的私人财务公司，为香港市民提供灵活的贷款方案，让客户可以随时随地解决现金周转需要。

此外，邦民香港提供以日息计算，具循环贷款功能等的贷款服务，其便利之处，为广大市民欢迎。

about.en: Q-PETS has always been based on the concept of "There is a restaurant near you'', hoping to turn its stores into convenience stores in the pet world. Although the area of Q-PETS stores is not very large, the sparrows are small and complete. The products and services provided are also very comprehensive. At present, Q-PETS has 39 branches in Hong Kong, with branches in all districts in Hong Kong, so that customers living in different regions can easily and conveniently buy pet supplies. , To take care of the needs of guests and pets.
about.tc: 一直以來，Q-PETS都以「梗有一間喺你附近」爲理念，希望將旗下的店鋪變成寵物界的便利店。雖然Q-PETS店鋪的面積不算很大但麻雀雖小，五臟俱全，提供的產品和服務也非常全面，現時 Q-PETS 於全港有三十九間分店，在全港各區均設分店，讓居住在不同地區的顧客，都能夠輕鬆方便地買到寵物用品，照顧客人和寵物的需要。
about.sc: 一直以来，Q-PETS都以「梗有一间喺你附近」为理念，希望将旗下的店铺变成宠物界的便利店。虽然Q-PETS店铺的面积不算很大但麻雀虽小，五脏俱全，提供的产品和服务也非常全面，现时 Q-PETS 于全港有三十九间分店，在全港各区均设分店，让居住在不同地区的顾客，都能够轻松方便地买到宠物用品，照顾客人和宠物的需要。

about.en:
RENPHO empowers people worldwide to improve all aspects of their life by granting a passport to their own health data. Our mission is to create a growing ecosystem of smart lifestyle products that provide technologically advanced solutions which are essential, accessible and everyday.
Our vision is to enhance people's health, fitness and wellness journey with Smart Healthy Living solutions. Our products are researched and developed closely with users and industry experts so that only the best products and app experiences make it into your home.
about.tc:
RENPHO 是美國智能運動生活產品品牌，於 2015 年在美國加州成立。我們致力研發保持身體活力的消閒按摩和智能運動生活產品，為更多人帶來智能健康生活，秉承 Smart Healthy Living 的態度更貼近大眾的生活。 RENPHO 更於 Amazon 獲智能體脂磅全球銷量第一，超過十萬用戶一致好評！

我們的使命是為大眾提供優質的產品，向全世界的客戶推廣「Smart Healthy Living」。我們對產品的質量感到自豪，這些都是我們的研發團隊精心開發和完善的。我們致力於確保客戶獲得最優質的產品、可負擔的價格以及可靠的服務。我們已經建立了超過 1000 萬名信心滿意客戶，他們購買了我們的產品後，仍然是 RENPHO 的支持者！
about.sc:
RENPHO 是美国智能运动生活产品品牌，于 2015 年在美国加州成立。我们致力研发保持身体活力的消闲按摩和智能运动生活产品，为更多人带来智能健康生活，秉承 Smart Healthy Living 的态度更贴近大众的生活。 RENPHO 更于 Amazon 获智能体脂磅全球销量第一，超过十万用户一致好评！

我们的使命是为大众提供优质的产品，向全世界的客户推广「Smart Healthy Living」。我们对产品的质量感到自豪，这些都是我们的研发团队精心开发和完善的。我们致力于确保客户获得最优质的产品、可负担的价格以及可靠的服务。我们已经建立了超过 1000 万名信心满意客户，他们购买了我们的产品后，仍然是 RENPHO 的支持者！

about.en:
At Rakuraku, we celebrate the goodness of food and we believe in expressing and spreading love, positive vibes, and happiness by way of food. The tale of Rakuraku started at Lee Tung street in Wanchai. A street so well-known back in 1950s for its printing industry especially for wedding invitations, lai see and fai chun. The street itself has witnessed and conveyed an abundance of happiness and blessings in the past and at Rakuraku, our vision is to continue and to bring on the hype to life with a bowl of authentic and heartwarming Japanese ramen. 

We use specialist flour from Japan for our noodles and we select premium sauces and soups. Our slow-braised chashu topping is exceptionally tender and our ‘nitamago’ is made with precision. Throughout the years, our culinary team has also innovated sea bream and lobster soup base well loved by locals. Japanese folklore and love for cats inspired our cats themed graffiti promising only more blessings and good fortunes. 

Powered by our amiable spirit, Rakuraku is always bustling and alive making it a perfect place to share happiness and a cool spot to catch up with friends and family.
about.tc:
我們提供的是食物，傳遞的是快樂與幸福。樂拉麵的故事要由「囍帖街」說起。以印喜帖而聞名的印刷街，見證無數喜悅時刻，我們就是想傳承這種喜悅的幸福感。

樂拉麵致力為顧客營造品嘗地道日本拉麵的幸福感。日本人愛貓文化由來已久，所以我們邀請城中知名壁畫師現場手繪以「貓」和「拉麵」為主題的壁畫，用心為你營造味覺與視覺的享受。

我們對出品的堅持，更感動日本米芝蓮隱世拉麵店主不吝賜教，為我們美味的博多風拉麵更添風采。每日自家熬製新鮮龍蝦湯及豬骨湯底，配以均由日本直送的麵粉和雞蛋，保持最原始的味道。
about.sc:
我们提供的是食物，传递的是快乐与幸福。乐拉面的故事要由「囍帖街」说起。以印喜帖而闻名的印刷街，见证无数喜悦时刻，我们就是想传承这种喜悦的幸福感。

乐拉面致力为顾客营造品尝地道日本拉面的幸福感。日本人爱猫文化由来已久，所以我们邀请城中知名壁画师现场手绘以「猫」和「拉面」为主题的壁画，用心为你营造味觉与视觉的享受。

我们对出品的坚持，更感动日本米芝莲隐世拉面店主不吝赐教，为我们美味的博多风拉面更添风采。每日自家熬制新鲜龙虾汤及猪骨汤底，配以均由日本直送的面粉和鸡蛋，保持最原始的味道。

metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到Fashion Walk的Red Lobster Hong Kong。Fashion Walk是匯聚時尚、品味生活及國際美饌的潮流熱點，提供獨特的室內及室外購物環境，涵蓋三大區域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。

about.en: Ricacorp Properties Limited (Ricacorp Properties Limited) was established in 1981 and is one of the three largest real estate agents in Hong Kong. It provides customers with residential properties, industrial buildings, commercial buildings, shops, parking spaces and other types of property sales and leasing. It also has Investment immigration, valuation measurement, auction, bidding and mortgage referral services, etc. As of the end of 2018, the company has nearly 3,000 employees and more than 220 branches.
about.tc: 利嘉閣地產代理有限公司 (Ricacorp Properties Limited) 成立於1981年，是香港三大地產代理之一，為客戶提供住宅物業、工廈、商廈、店舖、車位等各類型物業買賣及租賃，同時亦設有投資移民、估價測量、拍賣、招標以及按揭轉介服務等。截至2018年底，公司擁有接近3,000名員工，分行數目超過220間。
about.sc: 利嘉阁地产代理有限公司 (Ricacorp Properties Limited) 成立于1981年，是香港三大地产代理之一，为客户提供住宅物业、工厦、商厦、店铺、车位等各类型物业买卖及租赁，同时亦设有投资移民、估价测量、拍卖、招标以及按揭转介服务等。截至2018年底，公司拥有接近3,000名员工，分行数目超过220间。

about.en: Established in 1980s, now headquartered in Hong Kong, we are a group of expertise specialised in design, production and fitting of lingerie and garments with shaping and body maintenance functions. SATAMI is not just a brand that carries products of its own, it also represents a knowledgeable based lingerie experts aiming to give what fits you best, so that when you put on our lingerie, you will be confident and feel beautiful just the way that you are. We want you to be joyful, happy and fulfilled.
about.tc: 成立於 1985 年，總部設在香港，SATAMI 一直專注設計及生產具修飾和改善女性體態的功能性內衣。SATAMI 不單是一個內衣品牌，更盛載著我們的理念：以專業知識及經驗，為每位女性穿上最貼心的內衣，陪伴成就每個階段最自信美麗的妳，因為我們就是深信每位女性都值得漂亮、滿足和喜悅。
about.sc: 成立于 1985 年，总部设在香港，SATAMI 一直专注设计及生产具修饰和改善女性体态的功能性内衣。SATAMI 不单是一个内衣品牌，更盛载着我们的理念：以专业知识及经验，为每位女性穿上最贴心的内衣，陪伴成就每个阶段最自信美丽的妳，因为我们就是深信每位女性都值得漂亮、满足和喜悦。

about.en: SKECHERS is a global footwear and apparel company that was founded in Manhattan Beach, with industry-leading growth and significant opportunity for continued worldwide expansion. The Company designs, develops and markets more than 3,000 lifestyle and athletic footwear styles for men, women and children.
about.tc: SKECHERS於1992誕生於美國加州曼哈頓海灘，作為全球知名的運動休閒品牌，SKECHERS為各個年齡層的男士、女士和兒童設計休閒，時尚及運動產品，從休閒涼鞋，潮流運動鞋到專業跑鞋，品牌以活力、大膽、創新作靈感，每年設計並研發超過3000多種款式的鞋履及豐富的服裝配飾，能夠從頭到腳滿足顧客的需求。
about.sc: SKECHERS于1992诞生于美国加州曼哈顿海滩，作为全球知名的运动休闲品牌，SKECHERS为各个年龄层的男士、女士和儿童设计休闲，时尚及运动产品，从休闲凉鞋，潮流运动鞋到专业跑鞋，品牌以活力、大胆、创新作灵感，每年设计并研发超过3000多种款式的鞋履及丰富的服装配饰，能够从头到脚满足顾客的需求。

about.en: Presented by Wines of South Africa, SPECTACULAR South Africa is the first South African Experience Store in Hong Kong featuring an array of quality wine, food, tea, art & craft. There is also a section dedicated to conservation where South Africa is championing. Wine lovers can join various guided themed tastings or the exclusive Cape Winemaker’s Guild pre-auction tasting featuring premium collectible wines.
about.tc: SPECTACULAR South Africa 是香港首創南非體驗館，由南非葡萄酒協會籌辦，推介不同款式的優質南非佳釀，地道食品，國寶茶及手工藝等。南非倡導環保，體驗館特設一保育資訊區。葡萄酒愛好者更可參加主題美酒導嚐或品嚐Cape Winemakers Guild 拍賣的限量珍藏酒款。
about.sc: SPECTACULAR South Africa 是香港首創南非体验馆，由南非葡萄酒协会筹办，推介不同款式的优质南非佳酿,地道食品，国宝茶及手工艺等。南非倡导环保，体验馆特设一保育资讯区。葡萄酒爱好者更可参加主题美酒导尝或品尝Cape Winemakers Guild 拍卖的限量珍藏酒款。

about.en: Sa Sa International Holdings Limited, a leading beauty product retailing group in Asia, runs one-stop cosmetics specialty stores selling diverse quality products ranging from skincare, fragrance, make-up, hair care, body care products, as well as health and beauty supplements under more than 700 brands. about.en:
Saint Honore Cake Shop has opened their first shop in Hong Kong since 1972, the first shop located at Happy Valley and has being an iconic shop in the community. The business has been expanded to Macau and the Pearl River Delta. Now, Saint Honore Cake Shop has developed over 100 shops, sharing happy moments with Hong Kong people over past decades. Saint Honore Cake Shop is a member of Convenience Retail Asia Limited.

Saint Honore Cake Shop dedicates to provide high-quality and delicious cake, fresh bread and festive products to consumers in Hong Kong and Macau. With the finest ingredients and good quality, Saint Honore Cake Shop has been awarded the ISO 9001 and HACCP food safety accreditation, a recognition from the industry on its consistently stringent quality control and high standard of food hygiene.

Tastiness, freshness and attractive presentation are the key attributes of Saint Honore products. Our dedicated colleagues are committed to provide quality and friendly service to our customers and to delight them with our comprehensive product offerings and innovative promotions.
about.tc:
聖安娜餅屋於1972年在跑馬地開設第一間分店，至今為香港最具規模的連鎖餅店之一，業務亦拓展至澳門及珠江三角洲。發展至今店舖網絡過百間，現為利亞零售成員之一。聖安娜數十年來一路陪伴香港人，竭誠為顧客炮製烘焙食品，讓他們與摯愛分享快樂時刻。

聖安娜為顧客提供高品質又美味的西餅、麵包及節日產品。所推出的產品均選料上乘、出品嚴格，並連續多年榮獲ISO 9001品質管理及HACCP食品衛生安全重點控制系統證書之西餅麵包連鎖店，對各類出品品質控制均有嚴格要求，確保水準穩定、優質衛生。

新鮮以及色、香、味俱全，乃聖安娜全線出品最著重的優質元素。我們充滿熱誠的團隊致力提供優質及友善的服務，透過提供更多元化的產品、不斷改進及推陳出新，為顧客帶來無限歡樂。
about.sc:
圣安娜饼屋于1972年在跑马地开设第一间分店，至今为香港最具规模的连锁饼店之一，业务亦拓展至澳门及珠江三角洲。发展至今店铺网络过百间，现为利亚零售成员之一。圣安娜数十年来一路陪伴香港人，竭诚为顾客炮制烘焙食品，让他们与挚爱分享快乐时刻。

圣安娜为顾客提供高品质又美味的西饼、面包及节日产品。所推出的产品均选料上乘、出品严格，并连续多年荣获ISO 9001品质管理及HACCP食品卫生安全重点控制系统证书之西饼面包连锁店，对各类出品品质控制均有严格要求，确保水准稳定、优质卫生。

新鲜以及色、香、味俱全，乃圣安娜全线出品最着重的优质元素。我们充满热诚的团队致力提供优质及友善的服务，透过提供更多元化的产品、不断改进及推陈出新，为顾客带来无限欢乐。

School of Creativity was set up in 2002, with a mission of providing a variety of fine art courses to different students. Up till now, we have 13 branches  in Kowloon Tong, Lam Tin, Kowloon Bay, Kowloon West, Yau Tong, Whampao, Tsuen Wan etc. 

We not only possess rich teaching experience, but also a very comprehensive course and instructors management system, students all have received professional training by our School.
about.tc: 創意學堂於2002年成立，主要向不同學生提供各種多元化的美術設計課程。本校發展至今己有13所分校分佈在各區包括九龍塘，藍田，九龍灣，西九龍，油塘，黃埔，荃灣等。本校不單擁有豐富的教學經驗，而在課程及導師管理上更設有一套完善的方案，務求為學生提供高素質的教學。

about.en:
Sea Horse from the production, development and retail mattress, pillow, bedding, Sofa and various furniture. Our Headquarter is based in Hong Kong and we have outlets in Hong Kong, China, Macau, Singapore, Canada, the United Kingdom, Australia and Malaysia.

Sea Horse mattress which continues for 32 years in Hong Kong.  Sea Horse has become a guarantee of quality and confidence. The major five-star hotels, public institutions, hospitals, government, university dormitories, nursing homes and so on all uses the Sea Horse mattress, pillow and other products.
about.tc:
『海馬牌』從事生產、批發及零售床褥、枕頭、床上用品、沙發及各款家私。 集團總部設於香港，業務遍佈香港、中國內地、澳門、新加坡、加拿大、英國、澳洲及馬來西亞等地。

「海馬牌」床褥榮獲香港連續32年。海馬牌已成為品質與信心的保證。各大五星級酒店，公共機構、醫院、政府、大學宿舍、護老院等，均採用海馬牌床褥、枕頭和其它產品。
about.sc:
『海马牌』从事生产、批发及零售床褥、枕头、床上用品、沙发及各款家私。 集团总部设于香港，业务遍布香港、中国内地、澳门、新加坡、加拿大、英国、澳洲及马来西亚等地。

「海马牌」床褥荣获香港连续32年。海马牌已成为质量与信心的保证。各大五星级酒店，公共机构、医院、政府、大学宿舍、护老院等，均采用海马牌床褥、枕头和其它产品。

about.en:
A modern Shanghainese restaurant specializing in Xiaolongbao (steamed pork dumplings) and handmade noodles. The name ‘Lao Lao’ describes our dedication to bringing customers quality Shanghai delicacies. 

Shanghai Lao Lao opened with a brand new image to satisfy the taste buds of people looking for gourmet Shanghai cuisine prepared with the freshest of ingredients.
about.tc:
上海姥姥取名「姥姥」，寓意廚師們會如家中「姥姥」一樣，堅持以新鮮材料、「手製·心造」的理念，烹調出各款精選滬菜給大家。我們一直堅守初心，堅持純手工製作，以匠心致初心。

皮薄豐餡的招牌小籠包即叫即做，姥姥手製排骨拉麵更是由大廚親手搓揉捶打製作而成，只為重現姥姥的味道。樣式眾多、鍋氣十足的小菜任君選擇，總有一款是您的心之所向。環境雅緻舒適，開放式廚房設計，讓顧客親睹拉麵的新鮮拉製及巧手點心的製作過程，令這個餐飲體驗更精彩。盡力感受姥姥家為您上滿熱情帶來的窩心服務吧。
about.sc:
上海姥姥取名「姥姥」，寓意厨师们会如家中「姥姥」一样，坚持以新鲜材料、「手製·心造」的理念，烹调出各款精选沪菜给大家。我们一直坚守初心，坚持纯手工製作，以匠心致初心。

皮薄丰馅的招牌小笼包即叫即做，姥姥手製排骨拉麵更是由大厨亲手搓揉捶打製作而成，只为重现姥姥的味道。样式众多、锅气十足的小菜任君选择，总有一款是您的心之所向。环境雅緻舒适，开放式厨房设计，让顾客亲睹拉麵的新鲜拉製及巧手点心的製作过程，令这个餐饮体验更精彩。尽力感受姥姥家为您上满热情带来的窝心服务吧。

about.en:
Shanghai Tang was founded by the late socialite & magnate Sir David Tang in 1994. At launch, Sir David Tang spent HKD 120 million to open the first Shanghai Tang flagship store in Central, Hong Kong and invited renowned international celebrity Gong Li to be its first brand ambassador. Shanghai Tang would soon be recognised by the fashion industry as China's first luxury brand.

Over the years, Shanghai Tang continues moving forward by celebrating and shaping contemporary Chinese culture and art. The brand merges storied traditions with the latest design in its products and culture, seamlessly integrating them into modern society and current times. Through its Imperial Tailoring collection, ready-to-wear, accessories, home decor, and collaborations with artists and designers, Shanghai Tang is committed to presenting the exquisite lifestyle of the East.
about.tc:
上海灘Shanghai Tang由已故名流鄧永鏘爵士Sir David Tang於1994年創立。創立之時，鄧爵士以1.2億港元於香港中環開設品牌第一家旗艦店，並邀請國際巨星鞏俐作為首位品牌代言人，被時尚界認定為中國第一個奢侈品牌。 

上海灘Shanghai Tang在傳承中不斷前進，讚揚和塑造當代中國文化和藝術，完美地將產品和企業文化融入現代社會和生活，以引人注目的中國傳統文化和當代設計，通過高級訂製，成衣時裝，配飾，家居和藝術家，設計師及其他國際品牌聯名系列，致力於打造東方精緻品質生活。
about.sc:
上海滩Shanghai Tang由已故名流邓永锵爵士Sir David Tang于1994年创立。创立之时，邓爵士以1.2亿港元于香港中环开设品牌第一家旗舰店，并邀请国际巨星巩俐作为首位品牌代言人，被时尚界认定为中国第一个奢侈品牌。

上海滩Shanghai Tang在传承中不断前进，赞扬和塑造当代中国文化和艺术，完美地将产品和企业文化融入现代社会和生活，以引人注目的中国传统文化和当代设计，通过高级订制，成衣时装，配饰，家居和艺术家，设计师及其他国际品牌联名系列，致力于打造东方精致品质生活。

about.en: Yu Fung Chinese Medicine Centre was set up by a group of registered professional Chinese Medicine (CM) Practitioners grown up in Hong Kong. Having received both professional Chinese Medicine and fundamental Western Medicine training from universities, our practitioners' qualifications are well recognized by the Chinese Medicine Council of Hong Kong. Meanwhile, having worked in both public and private health care organization, our practitioners are equipped with fruitful experience in treating various types of illness. After all, we all hope to contribute to the community and serve the public with a sense of modesty, care and love.
about.tc: 譽豐中醫診療中心 由一群本港土生土長的註冊中醫師組成。中心醫師均取得大學資格，接受嚴格的大學中西醫學訓練，具備香港中醫藥管理委員會認可的註冊資格。同時，中心醫師先後在公私營醫療機構應診，對各臨床常見病症的處理均有豐富的經驗，掌握最便捷的中醫診療方法。我們皆懷著謙卑和關愛之心，期望以己之所長回饋社會，服務市民。
about.sc: 誉丰中医诊疗中心 由一群本港土生土长的注册中医师组成。中心医师均取得大学资格，接受严格的大学中西医学训练，具备香港中医药管理委员会认可的注册资格。同时，中心医师先后在公私营医疗机构应诊，对各临床常见病症的处理均有丰富的经验，掌握最便捷的中医诊疗方法。我们皆怀着谦卑和关爱之心，期望以己之所长回馈社会，服务市民。

about.en:
Adhering to the core value of “Love Supports Beloved”, SINOMAX has 4 major product lines, from memory foam bedding series, ergonomic designed furniture, massage series and smart living products to meet the different needs of you and your beloved family. Apart from the memory foam product series, SINOMAX also carries out materials procurement, research and development, design, production as well as quality control, accelerating product innovation and ensuring product quality.

Since its establishment in 2001, SINOMAX has continuously explored and adopted the finest technology in our innovative and healthy lifestyle products. With our intelligent and digitized products and services, SINOMAX strives to enhance the quality of home life by providing ergonomic customized products based on severe scientific and professional methodology, promoting smart healthy living for all customers.
about.tc:
SINOMAX以「用愛．支持所愛」為品牌理念，提供4大健康產品線，包括太空棉寢具系列、人體工學桌椅、按摩產品及智能家居產品，全方位照顧你24小時的生活需要。SINOMAX 除銷售太空棉產品外，集團更整合物料採購、研發、設計、生產以至質量控制等範疇，一條龍保證產品的創新性及品質。

自2001年品牌成立起，SINOMAX一直不斷發展，與時並進，產品及服務更邁向數據及智能層面，以更專業及科學的角度為你提供符合人體工學的個人化體驗，全方位提升你的生活質素，享受更健康、舒適及智能的家居產品。
about.sc:
SINOMAX以「用爱．支持所爱」为品牌理念，提供4大健康产品线，包括太空棉寝具系列、人体工学桌椅、按摩产品及智能家居产品，全方位照顾你24小时的生活需要。SINOMAX除销售太空棉产品外，集团更整合物料采购、研发、设计、生产以至质量控制等范畴，一条龙保证产品的创新性及质量。

自2001年品牌成立起，SINOMAX一直不断发展，与时并进，产品及服务更迈向数据及智能层面，以更专业及科学的角度为你提供符合人体工学的个人化体验，全方位提升你的生活质素，享受更健康、舒适及智能的家居产品。

about.en: The history of Standard Chartered in Hong Kong dates back to 1859. It is currently one of the Hong Kong SAR’s three note-issuing banks. Standard Chartered incorporated its Hong Kong business on 1 July 2004, and now operates as a licensed bank in Hong Kong under the name of Standard Chartered Bank (Hong Kong) Limited, a wholly owned subsidiary of Standard Chartered PLC. Standard Chartered is a leading international banking group, with a presence in 60 of the world’s most dynamic markets, and serving clients in a further 85. Our purpose is to drive commerce and prosperity through our unique diversity, and our heritage and values are expressed in our brand promise, Here for good. Standard Chartered PLC is listed on the London and Hong Kong Stock Exchanges.
about.sc: 渣打银行自1859年在香港开展业务，现为香港叁家发钞银行之一。渣打银行於2004年7月1日完成在香港註册的程序，并将银行在香港分行的业务注入於在香港註册的渣打集团全资附属公司 — 渣打银行 (香港) 有限公司旗下。渣打是一个具领导地位的国际银行集团，覆盖全球60个增长迅速的市场，并为85个市场的客户服务。我们的使命是透过我们独特的多元性，推动商业发展和促进繁荣。集团多年来的历史及一直坚守的信念展现於我们的品牌承诺「一心做好，始终如一」。渣打集团在伦敦證交所及香港證交所掛牌上市。渣打集团在伦敦證交所及香港證交所掛牌上市。
about.tc: 渣打銀行自1859年在香港開展業務，現為香港三家發鈔銀行之一。渣打銀行於2004年7月1日完成在香港註冊的程序，並將銀行在香港分行的業務注入於在香港註冊的渣打集團全資附屬公司 — 渣打銀行 (香港) 有限公司旗下。渣打是一個具領導地位的國際銀行集團，覆蓋全球60個增長迅速的市場，並為85個市場的客戶服務。我們的使命是透過我們獨特的多元性，推動商業發展和促進繁榮。集團多年來的歷史及一直堅守的信念展現於我們的品牌承諾「一心做好，始終如一」。渣打集團在倫敦證交所及香港證交所掛牌上市。渣打集團在倫敦證交所及香港證交所掛牌上市。

about.en: Starbucks has rooted in Hong Kong since 2000 and is dedicated to sourcing the world’s finest-quality coffee and providing the perfect Starbucks Experience. We are committed to focusing our efforts on creating a welcoming Third place where customers have come to embrace the store as a community gathering place. With our coffee passion, we start with the soil and end with each cup perfectly made for each customer.
about.sc: 自2000年，香港星巴克一直采用来自世界各地最优质的咖啡，并提供完美的星巴克体验。我们用心设计每间分店，期望营造最舒适的「第三空间」，成为顾客除了家及工作室以外、每日到访的地方。我们对咖啡抱着无比热诚，为顾客带来独特的风味咖啡。

about.en: Stecco Natura is an Italian gelato brand that originated from Sicily in 2012. Our goal is to let you take the best and most authentic Sicilian gelato for a walk, thanks to the ongoing quality control and the use of only the best and most natural ingredients. Our special flavors respect Italian tradition with a touch of "variegated" imagination, thanks to the many different dipping and coating available, which makes the pleasure of a Stecco Natura gelato even more desirable.
about.tc: 源於2012年西西里，Stecco Natura憑著嚴緊的品質控制及對天然食材的執著，將最傳統和優質的西西里冰點帶到世界各地。我們的食品使用天然食材製造，不含麩質，並由冰點大師精心調整而成，從而將最傳統的意大利口味呈現出來。
about.sc: 源于2012年西西里，Stecco Natura凭着严紧的品质控制及对天然食材的执着，将最传统和优质的西西里冰点带到世界各地。我们的食品使用天然食材制造，不含麸质，并由冰点大师精心调整而成，从而将最传统的意大利口味呈现出来。

metaDescription.en: Stecco Natura is an Italian gelato brand that originated from Sicily in 2012. All our gelato and sorbet are gluten free, 100% made and imported from Italy. Welcome to Stecco Natura at Peak Galleria. Ideally located atop the famous attraction in Hong Kong, Victoria Peak, The Peak Galleria is an extensive shopping and dining complex complemented by various exciting activities.
metaDescription.sc: Stecco Natura凭著严紧的品质控制及对天然食材的执著，使用100%纯天然食材製造，不含麸质，而且全部冰点及雪葩都是於意大利製造及入口将最传统和优质的西西里冰点带到世界各地。欢迎来到山顶广场的Stecco Natura。山顶广场位于香港的著名旅游胜地太平山顶，提供丰富的购物及餐饮选择，并引进各行业中具代表性的主题馆，定位成为本地及海外游客的必到景点。
metaDescription.tc: Stecco Natura憑著嚴緊的品質控制及對天然食材的執著，使用100%純天然食材製造，不含麩質，而且全部冰點及雪葩都是於意大利製造及入口將最傳統和優質的西西里冰點帶到世界各地。歡迎來到山頂廣場的Stecco Natura。山頂廣場位於香港的著名旅游勝地太平山頂，提供豐富的購物及餐飲選擇，並引進各行業中具代表性的主題館，定位成為本地及海外游客的必到景點。

about.en:
Founded in Notting Hill, London, in 1998 by Simon and Tamara Hill-Norton, Sweaty Betty’s mission is to empower women to look and feel amazing while living an active life. 

Famous for their bum-sculpting leggings, innovative prints and technical high-performance fabrics, each piece is designed by women for women, and to make you feel powerful and amazing from studio to street.
about.tc:
Sweaty Betty的宗旨是讓女性享受活力十足的生活，同時體現自信本色。品牌以提臀運動緊身褲、創新印花圖案及高性能面料打響名堂。

品牌於1998年由Simon及Tamara Hill-Norton伉儷在倫敦諾丁山創辦，推出糅合塑形科技及時尚美學的運動服飾。全女班設計團隊以倫敦為基地，一直以締造亮麗及高性能多元運動服飾為己任，突顯女性身段，品牌服飾所有性能均通過測試。
about.sc:
Sweaty Betty的宗旨是让女性享受活力十足的生活，同时体现自信本色。品牌以提臀运动紧身裤、创新印花图案及高性能面料打响名堂。

品牌于1998年由Simon及Tamara Hill-Norton伉俪在伦敦诺丁山创办，推出糅合塑形科技及时尚美学的运动服饰。全女班设计团队以伦敦为基地，一直以缔造亮丽及高性能多元运动服饰为己任，突显女性身段，品牌服饰所有性能均通过测试。

about.en: Swiss studio is to motivate children to develop their artistic passion in a learning environment that can inspire all kinds of inspiration.
about.sc: 瑞士画室的核心理念是让儿童在能够激发各样灵感的学习环境中，找到自己心中的艺术热情。瑞士画室以教授西方艺术为主，藉由巧妙编制的学术课程和最具资歷、灵活变通的艺术导师达至教学理念。导师除了具备专业艺术硕士或学士履歷外，部分更已考获教育、辅导或儿童心理学资格，提供最佳师资以引导出小朋友学习艺术的兴趣，开拓出小朋友的艺术领域。
about.tc: 瑞士畫室的核心理念是讓兒童在能夠激發各樣靈感的學習環境中，找到自己心中的藝術熱情。瑞士畫室以教授西方藝術為主，藉由巧妙編制的學術課程和最具資歷、靈活變通的藝術導師達至教學理念。導師除了具備專業藝術碩士或學士履歷外，部分更已考獲教育、輔導或兒童心理學資格，提供最佳師資以引導出小朋友學習藝術的興趣，開拓出小朋友的藝術領域。

about.tc:
茶古道 (ティーロード) 是新派的日式茶飲品牌，有別於眾多的台式飲品店，茶古道理念為引入日系茶飲，帶給香港另類創新的飲茶風味。
品牌挑選優質茶葉，堅持食品質素，嚴選世界各地精選食材，每杯人手沖泡調劑，為客人精心研製多元化飲品。
茶古道店內裝修祟尚自然風格，致力締造舒適及簡單的日本風格，令店內消費的客人在繁忙的日程裏得到瞬間的寧靜及舒緩。
about.sc:
茶古道 (ティーロード) 是新派的日式茶饮品牌，有别于众多的台式饮品店，茶古道理念为引入日系茶饮，带给香港另类创新的饮茶风味。
品牌挑选优质茶叶，坚持食品质素，严选世界各地精选食材，每杯人手冲泡调剂，为客人精心研制多元化饮品。
茶古道店内装修祟尚自然风格，致力缔造舒适及简单的日本风格，令店内消费的客人在繁忙的日程里得到瞬间的宁静及舒缓。

about.en: TMF is a space management expert and custom-made furniture specialty store. With a multi-functional design concept and high-quality imported accessories, it helps you plan your new home furnishing wisely and create your exclusive comfort zone. As a space management expert, we devote ourselves to the design and integrate the "people-oriented" concept into the space design, aiming to provide customers with long-term home furnishing solutions.
about.tc: 家匠(TMF)是空間管理專家兼訂造傢俬專門店，以多功能性的設計概念配合優質進口配件，助你精明地規劃新居傢俬，打造你專屬的安樂窩。作為空間管理專家，我們全心全藝，將「以人為本」理念融入空間設計，旨在為顧客提供長遠的家居方案。
about.sc: 家匠(TMF)是空间管理专家兼订造家俬专门店，以多功能性的设计概念配合优质进口配件，助你精明地规划新居家俬，打造你专属的安乐窝。作为空间管理专家，我们全心全艺，将「以人为本」理念融入空间设计，旨在为顾客提供长远的家居方案。

about.en:
Tse Sui Luen Jewellery (International) Limited (“TSL Jewellery”, incorporated in Bermuda with limited liability) is one of the largest jewellers in Asia, that is principally engaged in jewellery design, manufacturing, trading, retailing, and wholesaling. TSL Group was founded by Mr. Tse Sui Luen, a legend in the Hong Kong jewellery industry, in 1960. 

Tse Sui Luen Jewellery Company Limited was then incorporated in 1971 and TSL Jewellery was listed on The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited in 1987. With the headquarters established in Hong Kong, TSL Jewellery currently operates over 450 jewellery boutiques spanning over 130 cities in Asia besides Hong Kong, including but not limited to Beijing, Shanghai, Chengdu, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Macau and Kuala Lumpur.
about.tc:
Tse Sui Luen Jewellery (International) Limited 謝瑞麟珠寶(國際)有限公司*（「謝瑞麟珠寶」，於百慕達註冊成立之有限公司）為目前亞洲最具規模的珠寶商之一，主要從事珠寶首飾設計、製造、貿易、零售及批發。

謝瑞麟珠寶集團由本港珠寶業界傳奇人物謝瑞麟先生於1960年創立，並於1971年成立謝瑞麟珠寶有限公司，以及在1987年於香港聯合交易所上市，總部設於香港，更在多個其他亞洲主要城市，包括但不限於北京、上海、成都、廣州、深圳、澳門及吉隆坡經營超過450間珠寶分店，網絡覆蓋逾130個亞洲城市。
about.sc:
Tse Sui Luen Jewellery (International) Limited 谢瑞麟珠宝(国际)有限公司*（「谢瑞麟珠宝」，于百慕达注册成立之有限公司）为目前亚洲最具规模的珠宝商之一，主要从事珠宝首饰设计、制造、贸易、零售及批发。

谢瑞麟珠宝集团由本港珠宝业界传奇人物谢瑞麟先生于1960年创立，并于1971年成立谢瑞麟珠宝有限公司，以及在1987年于香港联合交易所上市，总部设于香港，更在多个其他亚洲主要城市，包括但不限于北京、上海、成都、广州、深圳、澳门及吉隆坡经营超过450间珠宝分店，网络覆盖逾130个亚洲城市。

metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到荷李活商業中心的TSL | 謝瑞麟。荷李活商業中心網羅多個著名服飾、腕錶、珠寶品牌，更引入多間眼鏡及美容用品專賣店，令人目不暇給。

about.en: Tai Cheong Bakery was established in 1954. In 2014, to celebrate the 60 years anniversary of Tai Cheong Bakery, the brand is well-received as the Hong Kong's collective memory. Tai Cheong Bakery is a famous and traditional bakery of Hong Kong that is most well-known for its Egg Tarts (蛋撻) and Chinese Donut (沙翁). Among Hong Kong’s cuisine, Egg Tarts represent as the top five of the most popular snacks in Hong Kong. As the innovator of butter-flavoured shortcrust pastry and with the long history of Tai Cheong Bakery, its Egg Tarts are ranked as the number 1 in Hong Kong by many local and global media and tourists.
about.tc: 泰昌餅家於1954年創立，泰昌餅家跨越60載，品牌陪伴香港人成長，其產品更是香港人的集體回憶。泰昌餅家首創的曲奇蛋撻及經典美食沙翁遠近馳名，蛋撻是香港人最愛小吃五強美食，而泰昌餅家的蛋撻更曾獲香港及外國媒體食客貫以「全香港最好食蛋撻」美譽。
about.sc: 泰昌饼家于1954年创立，泰昌饼家跨越60载，品牌陪伴香港人成长，其产品更是香港人的集体回忆。泰昌饼家首创的曲奇蛋挞及经典美食沙翁远近驰名，蛋挞是香港人最爱小吃五强美食，而泰昌饼家的蛋挞更曾获香港及外国媒体食客贯以「全香港最好食蛋挞」美誉。

about.en:
“Tai Hing” is the first brand developed by us, to offer Hong Kong style quick and easy comfort food. Our signature “Tai Hing” dishes included Chilled Milk Tea, 5-Star Roast Pork, Sweet and Sour Pork, Barbecued and Marinated Platter, Tai Hing Supreme Roast Goose, Luncheon Meat and Scrambled Egg Instant Noodles, Rice Noodles with Beef in Swiss Sauce and Spicy Fried Rice Vermicelli.

Our Tai Hing Restaurant are generally equipped with various automated machines to prepare these siu mei daily on-site, while our 5-star roast pork is prepared in our Hong Kong Food Factory three times a day and promptly delivered to our Tai Hing Restaurants based on demand.
about.tc:
「太興」是我們開發的首個品牌，為顧客提供簡單快捷的港式風味招牌菜式。「太興」招牌菜式包括冰鎮奶茶、五星級燒肉、回味菠蘿咕嚕肉、八星報喜、太興滿燻燒鵝、頂級午餐肉滑蛋即食麵、牛柳絲瑞士汁炒濕河及濃香星洲米。

 太興餐廳普遍配備各種自動機器，以便每日現場即製燒味，而五星級燒肉則在香港食品廠房每日烤製三次，並按需要即時送往太興餐廳。
about.sc:
「太兴」是我们开发的首个品牌，为顾客提供简单快捷的港式风味招牌菜式。「太兴」招牌菜式包括冰镇奶茶、五星级烧肉、回味菠萝咕噜肉、八星报喜、太兴满熏烧鹅、顶级午餐肉滑蛋即食面、牛柳丝瑞士汁炒湿河及浓香星洲米。

 太兴餐厅普遍配备各种自动机器，以便每日现场即制烧味，而五星级烧肉则在香港食品厂房每日烤制三次，并按需要即时送往太兴餐厅。

about.en:
In 1989, Mr Chan Wing On and Mr. Yuen Chi Ming among others founded their first restaurant under the “Tai Hing” brand in Sai Wan Ho, Hong Kong. With years of development, the management has integrated traditional and innovative business philosophy, also adopting multi-brand business model when expanding the market, that let Tai Hing gradually expanded from a siu mei style restaurant to the largest multi-brand casual dining restaurant operators in Hong Kong, and established a chain of over 200 restaurants network in Hong Kong, Mainland China, Macau and Taiwan. 

Tai Hing Group has implemented the stringent “5-S” management system, and with our own independent production and logistic center, that sets a highly standardized production process, also required employees to provide close control over product development and production process with highest quality with an aim of creating distinctive and sage dining experience for our customers.

In order to enable customers to enjoy meals under a comfortable and pleasant environment, Tai Hing Group highly valued restaurant’s service quality, that always provide high quality and professional services to satisfy all client's’ needs. At the same time, Tai Hing Group strive to incorporate innovative method to support the industry development, also actively exploring opportunities to adopt automated food processing machines in restaurants, creating a safer and healthier working environment, also increasing operational efficiency and helped to ensure consistency in dish portion and quality.
about.tc:
1989年，陳永安先生及袁志明先生等創辦人在香港西灣河以「太興」品牌開設首間餐廳。憑藉多年來的發展，管理層揉合傳統與創新的經營理念及採用多元品牌業務模式逐步拓展市場，讓太興由一間港式燒味快餐店，逐步拓展為香港最大的自營休閒餐飲集團，並建立了坐擁超過200間餐廳的龐大網絡，分店遍佈香港、中國內地、澳門及台灣。

太興集團引入「五常法」的優質管理模式，配合自置的獨立產製基地及物流中心，訂下高度規範的生產流程，要求旗下員工嚴格監控每項產品的研發與生產過程，為顧客提供最優質安全的餐飲享受。

為求讓顧客能夠於舒適歡愉的環境下享用膳食，太興集團相當重視餐廳的服務質素，務求令顧客感覺賓至如歸。同時，太興集團擅於以創新技術支持業務發展，積極於餐廳層面採用各種自動食品加工機器，藉此為廚房員工營造更安全健康的工作環境，同時提高營運效率和保持菜式品質一致。
about.sc:
1989年，陈永安先生及袁志明先生等创办人在香港西湾河以「太兴」品牌开设首间餐厅。凭借多年来的发展，管理层揉合传统与创新的经营理念及采用多元品牌业务模式逐步拓展市场，让太兴由一间港式烧味快餐店，逐步拓展为香港最大的自营休闲餐饮集团，并建立了坐拥超过190间餐厅的庞大网络，分店遍布香港、中国内地、澳门及台湾。

太兴集团引入「五常法」的优质管理模式，配合自置的独立产制基地及物流中心，订下高度规范的生产流程，要求旗下员工严格监控每项产品的研发与生产过程，为顾客提供最优质安全的餐饮享受。

为求让顾客能够于舒适欢愉的环境下享用膳食，太兴集团相当重视餐厅的服务质素，务求令顾客感觉宾至如归。同时，太兴集团擅于以创新技术支持业务发展，积极于餐厅层面采用各种自动食品加工机器，借此为厨房员工营造更安全健康的工作环境，同时提高营运效率和保持菜式品质一致。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Tai Hing at Grand Plaza. Grand Plaza is home to a stellar line-up of international watch and jewelry brands, concept stores as well as fashion, lifestyle and sports labels. The dedicated Dining Floor features over 20 gourmet dining venues where international cuisine is served in stylish surroundings.

metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到雅蘭中心的太興。雅蘭中心匯聚國際鐘錶珠寶品牌、概念商店以及多間時尚服飾與運動品牌。雅蘭中心「潮食點」更集20多間中、西、日人氣特色食肆，讓顧客於這鬧市中的時尚熱點，寫意享受各國優質美饌。
