about.tc:
台灣 – 擁有著舒適悠閒的空間及總會令人放慢腳步的生活方式。
「臺灣禮籃」希望分享一份好品味的生活態度，傳達一種美好與正能量。我們從台灣開始以至其他地區搜尋文創好物、風味小吃和創意無限的手工製品，把一種單純和樂的氣氛帶入生活中。
about.sc:
台湾 – 拥有着舒适悠闲的空间及总会令人放慢脚步的生活方式。
“台湾礼篮”希望分享一份好品味的生活态度，传达一种美好与正能量。我们从台湾开始以至其他地区搜寻文创好物、风味小吃和创意无限的手工制品，把一种单纯和乐的气氛带入生活中。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Taiwan Gift Basket at Amoy Plaza.  Amoy Plaza is an ideal one-stop shopping, dining and entertainment hub with more than 30 food and beverage outlets serving Eastern and Western cuisines.
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到淘大商場的台灣禮籃。淘大商場提供一站式餐飲、購物及娛樂享受，全面照顧你的消費購物需要，商場內有超過30家本地及國際食府，提供惹人垂涎的亞洲及西式美食。
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到淘大商场的台湾礼篮。淘大商场提供一站式餐饮、购物及娱乐享受，全面照顾你的消费购物需要，商场内有超过30家本地及国际食府，提供惹人垂涎的亚洲及西式美食。

about.en: Taiwan Gift Baskets brings in quality goods and food products from Taiwan, that are carefully selected, many of which made with natural and organic ingredients with no added preservatives or artificial additives.
about.tc: 「臺灣禮籃」分享一份好品味的生活態度，傳達一種美好與正能量。從台灣各處搜尋特色風味小吃、文創好物，把一種單純和樂的台灣風味帶到香港。深受愛戴的 「海邊走走」愛饀蛋捲，全手工製作，絶無人造反式脂肪；「團時」來自澎湖的海產零食，鮮味高營養一次奉上；「王媽媽法式鳳梨酥」 以法式手做酥皮，天然不含人工反式脂肪牛油製作，吃起來不甜不膩。「星球工坊」滋味獨特的爆米花，另人一試難忘！還有更多台灣風味零食伴手禮等待大家您來發掘！
about.sc: 「臺湾礼篮」分享一份好品味的生活态度，传达一种美好与正能量。从台湾各处搜寻特色风味小吃、文创好物，把一种单纯和乐的台湾风味带到香港。深受爱戴的 「海边走走」爱饀蛋捲，全手工制作，絶无人造反式脂肪；「团时」来自澎湖的海产零食，鲜味高营养一次奉上；「王妈妈法式凤梨酥」 以法式手做酥皮，天然不含人工反式脂肪牛油制作，吃起来不甜不腻。「星球工坊」滋味独特的爆米花，另人一试难忘！还有更多台湾风味零食伴手礼等待大家您来发掘！

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Taiwan Gift Baskets at Fashion Walk. We are a unique fusion of indoor and outdoor elements at the heart of Causeway Bay, embracing three vibrant streets – Paterson, Food Street and Kingston.
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到Fashion Walk的臺湾礼篮。Fashion Walk是汇聚时尚、品味生活及国际美馔的潮流热点，提供独特的室内及室外购物环境，涵盖叁大区域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到Fashion Walk的臺灣禮籃。Fashion Walk是匯聚時尚、品味生活及國際美饌的潮流熱點，提供獨特的室內及室外購物環境，涵蓋三大區域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。

about.en: Tao Heung Pier Market is a Chinese restaurant with a brand new image and a new concept landing in the downtown area of Mong Kok, delivering first-hand global seafood directly from the pier market every day. Tao Heung Pier Market aims at creating a place for customers to taste the freshness form the pier market.
about.tc: 稻香集團旗下【稻香漁港市集】以全新形象、全新概念登陸旺角鬧市，每日直送漁市第一手環球海鮮，致力打造繁華鬧市中的漁港市集，希望成為各位客人的「嚐鮮集中地」。
about.sc: 稻香集团旗下「稻香渔港市集」以全新形象、全新概念登陆旺角闹市，每日直送渔市第一手环球海鲜，致力打造繁华闹市中的渔港市集，希望成为各位客人的「尝鲜集中地」。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Tao Heung Pier Market at Grand Plaza. Grand Plaza is home to a stellar line-up of international watch and jewelry brands, concept stores as well as fashion, lifestyle and sports labels. The dedicated Dining Floor features over 20 gourmet dining venues where international cuisine is served in stylish surroundings.
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到雅兰中心的稻香渔港市集。雅兰中心汇聚国际钟錶珠宝品牌、概念商店以及多间时尚服饰与运动品牌。雅兰中心「潮食点」更集20多间中、西、日人气特色食肆，让顾客於这闹市中的时尚热点，写意享受各国优质美馔。
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到雅蘭中心的稻香漁港市集。雅蘭中心匯聚國際鐘錶珠寶品牌、概念商店以及多間時尚服飾與運動品牌。雅蘭中心「潮食點」更集20多間中、西、日人氣特色食肆，讓顧客於這鬧市中的時尚熱點，寫意享受各國優質美饌。

about.en: Tao Heung Tea House is a nostalgia brand of Tao Heung Group. The interior style mixes modern and vintage. Guests can enjoy aromatic tea and tasty Dim-Sum in a nostalgic atmosphere. Dim-Sum, Chinese cuisine and hot pot are provided.
about.tc: 【稻香•茶居】是稻香集團旗下一個主打「懷舊」的品牌。裝修設計懷舊中帶有時尚感，讓客人在帶有懷舊氣氛的環境中，與好友摯親感受水滾茶靚，品嚐一盅兩件。稻香•茶居供應點心、中式小菜飯麵及火鍋。
about.sc: 【稻香•茶居】是稻香集团旗下一个主打「怀旧」的品牌。装修设计怀旧中带有时尚感，让客人在带有怀旧气氛的环境中，与好友挚亲感受水滚茶靓，品尝一盅两件。稻香•茶居供应点心、中式小菜饭面及火锅。

Dim-Sum, Chinese dishes and hot pot are provided. Amoy Plaza is an ideal one-stop shopping, dining and entertainment hub with more than 30 food and beverage outlets serving Eastern and Western cuisines.

about.en:
More than just a supermarket, at TASTE we want to inject fun and excitement into the daily grocery shopping experience of Hong Kong’s sophisticated and cosmopolitan consumers.

Our bright and contemporary stores reflect a commitment to deliver “More Than Food”, with a range that spans fresh and ready-to-eat food, an in-store bakery, imported specialist items, a wine cellar, household goods and gifts, and even fashion and luxury accessories.

As part of TASTE’s new generation of food and lifestyle retailing, we are dedicated to provide world-class service. In addition to home delivery and carry-to-car services, we make sure our staff are always well-trained and knowledgeable.
about.tc:
TASTE誠意為香港的精明消費者，於日常購物體驗中帶來更多樂趣及驚喜。

設計明亮時尚的店舖，體現我們「超越美食新體驗」的宗旨。我們積極搜羅各式各樣的新鮮熟食和進口食品，又設有麵包店、酒窖，並售賣入口特色食品、家居用品、及高級時尚精品等，讓每位顧客目不暇給。

一流的服務是TASTE締造食品及生活新時尚的重要一環。除送貨、攜貨到坐駕等服務之外，我們亦保證每位員工獲得高質素的訓練、熟讀產品知識。
about.sc:
TASTE诚意为香港的精明消费者，于日常购物体验中带来更多乐趣及惊喜。

设计明亮时尚的店舖，体现我们「超越美食新体验」的宗旨。我们积极搜罗各式各样的新鲜熟食和进口食品，又设有面包店、酒窖，并售卖入口特色食品、家居用品、及高级时尚精品等，让每位顾客目不暇给。

一流的服务是TASTE缔造食品及生活新时尚的重要一环。除送货、携货到坐驾等服务之外，我们亦保证每位员工获得高质素的训练、熟读产品知识。

about.en:
A new lifestyle tea brand, TeaMiTea infuses tea culture into our life through a cup of dedicated tea. Handpicked Da Hong Pao, Longjing and other top tea leaves are for tea brewing.

In Taiwan, TeaMiTea means ‘well-brewed tea’. TeaMiTea also expresses the scene of two people sitting opposite to each other while enjoying tea drinks and snacks in a relaxing space.
about.tc:
以知名原葉茶匠心製作的全新業態茶生活品牌。茶米茶意思為茶葉精心沖泡的茶湯，不以替代性原料充數，這就是茶米茶的品牌初心。名字中的兩個「茶」也同時表達了兩個相對而坐的人，中間的米代表著輕食、小食，兩個人在這個空間裡自在休憩及溝通交流。

取材上只選用大紅袍、龍井等知名名貴原葉茶做茶湯，關注如何為客人調製出一杯真正能最大限度保留其原始風味的茶飲。
about.sc:
以知名原叶茶匠心制作的全新业态茶生活品牌。茶米茶意思为茶叶精心冲泡的茶汤，不以替代性原料充数，这就是茶米茶的品牌初心。名字中的两个「茶」也同时表达了两个相对而坐的人，中间的米代表着轻食、小食，两个人在这个空间里自在休憩及沟通交流。

取材上只选用大红袍、龙井等知名名贵原叶茶做茶汤，关注如何为客人调制出一杯真正能最大限度保留其原始风味的茶饮。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to TeaMiTea at Gala Place. Gala Place showcases diversified services and products including chic fashion, outdoor gear, skincare and cosmetics, lifestyle products, audio and digital gadgets as well as a smorgasbord of new and enticing food and beverage offerings. A new lifestyle tea brand, TeaMiTea infuses tea culture into our life through a cup of dedicated tea. Handpicked Da Hong Pao, Longjing and other top tea leaves are for tea brewing.  In Taiwan, TeaMiTea means ‘well-brewed tea’. TeaMiTea also expresses the scene of two people sitting opposite to each other while enjoying tea drinks and snacks in a relaxed space.

about.en:
Since launching as a shirt specialist in Glasgow in 1988, Ted Baker has quickly become one of the UK's leading fashion retailers.

With quality, attention to detail and a quirky sense of humour at its core, we've earned its reputation as 'No Ordinary Designer Label' and now offer a wide range of collections including menswear, womenswear, accessories, fragrances, eyewear and more.

about.en:
A leader in the telecommunications industry for more than 40 years, providing one-stop telecommunications services; Hong Kong’s largest paging business group’s launch network covers Hong Kong, Macao and more than 70 sales points throughout Hong Kong, New Territories, and New Territories.
40 years of telecommunications industry leader, providing one-stop telecommunications services; Hong Kong's largest paging business groups' transmitter network covering Hong Kong, Macao and more than 70 a number of points of sale throughout Hong Kong, Kowloon and the New Territories.

about.en:
The alchemist cafe was born in October 2012. It is located on Poplar Street at the junction of Prince Edward and Sham Shui Po. It is Hong Kong's first travel-themed coffee shop. In addition to providing catering services, the alchemist cafe also regularly organized activities closely related to tourism, art, culture and public welfare at the beginning. These include travel sharing sessions, concerts, cultural and creative competitions, photography exhibitions, second-hand book recycling campaigns and youth social welfare coffee classes, etc., which are well supported by guests.

In the past seven years, the alchemist cafe has actively moved into cultural centers, opening Kwai Fong Kwai Tsing Theatre, Sha Tin Hong Kong Heritage Museum, K11 Art Gallery in Tsim Sha Tsui and Tseung Kwan O Hong Kong Velodrome successively, hoping to continue to be connected with the culture.
about.tc:
牧羊少年咖啡館，於2012年10月誕生，座落於太子與深水埗交界的白楊街，是香港第一間以旅遊為主題的咖啡店。除了提供餐飲服務外，牧羊少年初時還定期舉辦與旅遊、藝術、文化和公益息息相關的活動。當中包括旅遊分享會、音樂會、文創比賽、攝影展、二手書回收運動和青少年社福咖啡班等等，深受客人及各界支持。

七年以來，牧羊少年積極地向文化集中地進駐，先後增開葵芳葵青劇院、沙田香港文化博物館、尖沙咀K11藝術廊和將軍澳香港單車館分店。希望繼續與文化連結，除了餵飽來客的肉體，亦希望能滋養來客的心靈，提倡各種值得香港大眾珍重的價值觀和普世意識。
about.sc:
牧羊少年咖啡馆，于2012年10月诞生，座落于太子与深水埗交界的白杨街，是香港第一间以旅游为主题的咖啡店。除了提供餐饮服务外，牧羊少年初时还定期举办与旅游、艺术、文化和公益息息相关的活动。当中包括旅游分享会、音乐会、文创比赛、摄影展、二手书回收运动和青少年社福咖啡班等等，深受客人及各界支持。

七年以来，牧羊少年积极地向文化集中地进驻，先后增开葵芳葵青剧院、沙田香港文化博物馆、尖沙咀K11艺术廊和将军澳香港单车馆分店。希望继续与文化连结，除了喂饱来客的肉体，亦希望能滋养来客的心灵，提倡各种值得香港大众珍重的价值观和普世意识。

about.en:
Holistic chocolate journey designed for kids, couples and families and tourist groups, consisting of three parts: 
1. Fantastic experience in visual art of chocolate exhibits, good for photo hunting and interactive games for everybody to enjoy. 
2. Tasting of eight different types of top-class chocolate, at once yummy-yummy and healthy.
3. Chocolate workshop: exercise your innovative talent to paint your own chocolate medal. 

Last but not least, we have a souvenirs shop next to it.

about.en:
The Mineral Boutique is a pioneering beauty concept that empowers you to release your inner-beauty.

We founded The Mineral Boutique with the belief that your skin is unique and that no one brand or treatment can be the solution to perfect looking skin. Instead, we believe in a holistic approach to nourishing your skin’s health to its full potential.

Drawing on a philosophy that “No two faces are the same”, we tailor personalized programs that utilize the latest scientific treatments and formulas in skincare to maximize not just your appearance, but overall wellbeing as well.
about.tc:
The Mineral Boutique是一個前所未有的極致高端美容概念，來到這裡能釋放你的內在美和自然健康氣息。

我們相信任何人的皮膚都是獨一無二，沒有單一品牌或護理療程可以成為完美肌膚的解決方案。我們深信透過內外兼顧的全方位方法能激發你的皮膚達致最健康的狀態。

源於「沒有兩張一樣的臉」的理念，我們為每位客人度身訂造合適的個人療程，這些療程利用嶄新的科研技術及產品配方，不僅可以使肌膚回復最佳狀態，還可以由內至外整體提升質素。
about.sc:
The Mineral Boutique是一个前所未有的极致高端美容概念，来到这里能释放你的内在美和自然健康气息。

我们相信任何人的皮肤都是独一无二，没有单一品牌或护理疗程可以成为完美肌肤的解决方案。我们深信透过内外兼顾的全方位方法能激发你的皮肤达致最健康的状态。

源于「没有两张一样的脸」的理念，我们为每位客人度身订造合适的个人疗程，这些疗程利用崭新的科研技术及产品配方，不仅可以使肌肤回复最佳状态，还可以由内至外整体提升质素。

about.en:
The Queen of Siu Mai is more than an eatery, we stand for local food culture conservation.

Although improvement never stops, we reserve traditional taste and professional standards, strike for better products and enhancing ways to tackle customers’ taste buds.
about.tc: 燒賣皇后經營的不只是食店，也是經營著保留本土特色小食的 理念。透過不斷的革新，不單保持傳統的風味，專業的水準，更會不 斷追求創造更優質的出品，並將開創更廣闊的渠道讓食客們獲得舌尖上的滿足。
about.sc: 烧卖皇后经营的不只是食店，也是经营着保留本土特色小食的 理念。透过不断的革新，不单保持传统的风味，专业的水准，更会不 断追求创造更优质的出品，并将开创更广阔的渠道让食客们获得舌尖上 的满足。

about.en: Founded in 1979 by two talented Australian and British entrepreneurs, The Spaghetti House prides itself on offering mouthwatering delicacies to every guest. Driven by our “passione”, we serve quality Italian and European cuisine through building on classics with a splash of our true innovation spirit. Our selection on the best and freshest seasonal ingredients is sure to surprise and delight with your every bite.
about.tc: 意粉屋於1979年由一位澳洲及一位英國人創立。憑藉對烹飪的熱誠，多年來我們給予廚師創作空間，加上堅持採用優質多元化的食材，時刻為大家提供多款驚喜時尚及家傳户曉的優質意大利麵、手工薄餅及創新歐洲美食。
about.sc: 意粉屋于1979年由一位澳洲及一位英国人创立。凭借对烹饪的热诚，多年来我们给予厨师创作空间，加上坚持采用优质多元化的食材，时刻为大家提供多款惊喜时尚及家传户晓的优质意大利面、手工薄饼及创新欧洲美食。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to The Spaghetti House at Grand Plaza. The dedicated Dining Floor features over 20 gourmet dining venues where international cuisine is served in stylish surroundings.

about.en:
3 offer 5G, 4G LTE, 3G and GSM dual-band mobile telecommunications services, thereby enriching our already-diverse mobile data-centric portfolio with an ultra high-speed and low-latency high definition multimedia platform. 

3 Hong Kong's efforts are channeled into constantly enhancing the overall customer experience with innovative mobile data services and applications to meet with ever-changing technology and market trends. Popular services and applications include Over-The-Top (OTT) platforms, direct carrier billing offerings, mobile device security management, eBooks, music downloads, movies-on-demand, mobile social networking applications and FinTech. We also develop business and corporate solutions covering mobile business, information technology, AR/VR, Internet of Things and big data.
about.tc:
3香港提供5G、4G LTE、3G、GSM雙頻及Wi-Fi服務，並以高速及低時延的高清多媒體平台，為客戶提供多姿多彩並以數據為主的多元化流動通訊服務。 

3香港緊貼瞬息萬變的科技及流動通訊潮流，不斷推出創新的流動數據服務及應用程式，提升客戶的流動通訊體驗。備受歡迎的服務包括過頂內容平台、流動電訊商賬單付款服務、流動裝置安全管理服務、電子書、音樂下載、電影點播、流動社交網絡程式及金融科技等。3香港亦同時發展涵蓋流動商務、資訊科技、AR及VR、物聯網及大數據的商業和企業方案。
about.sc:
3香港提供5G、4G LTE、3G、GSM双频及Wi-Fi服务，并以高速及低时延的高清多媒体平台，为客户提供多姿多彩并以数据为主的多元化流动通讯服务。 

3香港紧贴瞬息万变的科技及流动通讯潮流，不断推出创新的流动数据服务及应用程序，提升客户的流动通讯体验。备受欢迎的服务包括过顶内容平台、流动电讯商账单付款服务、流动装置安全管理服务、电子书、音乐下载、电影点播、流动社交网络程序及金融科技等。3香港亦同时发展涵盖流动商务、资讯科技、AR及VR、物联网及大数据的商业和企业方案。

about.en:
Tian Shang Ye Co., Ltd. has been rooted in Hong Kong for more than 20 years. We are a local brand in Hong Kong, providing high-quality household products and kitchenware to Hong Kong public families.
In order to cater to the unique living environment of Hong Kong, Tianshangye's main products are all developed, designed and produced in-house. We have two factories in Dongguan and Zhuhai, and other partner factories all over China. In addition, Tianshangye has introduced a variety of products from Japan, the United States and Europe.
Tian Shangye’s flagship products include Titan Wok, bamboo cutting boards and drying racks. Today, the Titan Wok has developed to the fourteenth generation. With the patented technology of wok surface treatment, we firmly believe that the Titan Wok is unique and irreplaceable in the Hong Kong market. In addition to the Titan Wok, Tian Shangye owns more than 100 product patents.
about.tc:
天上野有限公司植根香港超過20年，我們是香港本地品牌，以提供優質家庭用品及廚具給香港大眾家庭。
為迎合香港獨特的居住環境，天上野主要產品均是自家研發、設計及生產。我們有兩家廠房位於東莞及珠海，另更有其他合作伙伴工廠遍佈中國。此外，天上野更引入多款來自日本、美國及歐州等地的產品。
天上野旗艦產品包括生鐵皇、竹砧板及曬衣架。 時至今日，生鐵皇已經發展至第十四代，憑著鑊表面處理專利技術，我們深信生鐵皇在香港市場是獨有且無可取代。除生鐵皇外，天上野擁有超過100項產品專利。
about.sc:
天上野有限公司植根香港超过20年，我们是香港本地品牌，以提供优质家庭用品及厨具给香港大众家庭。
为迎合香港独特的居住环境，天上野主要产品均是自家研发、设计及生产。我们有两家厂房位于东莞及珠海，另更有其他合作伙伴工厂遍布中国。此外，天上野更引入多款来自日本、美国及欧州等地的产品。
天上野旗舰产品包括生铁皇、竹砧板及晒衣架。 时至今日，生铁皇已经发展至第十四代，凭着镬表面处理专利技术，我们深信生铁皇在香港市场是独有且无可取代。除生铁皇外，天上野拥有超过100项产品专利。

about.tc:
土司工坊是60至70年代新加坡咖啡室的延續，讓您重溫當年新鮮烤製土司、手拉南洋咖啡以及半熟蛋的完美早餐配搭。

在土司工坊，年老的能重拾舊日美好回憶，年青的亦可體驗過去時代的感覺和味道。

以熱情、輕鬆和活力為主，土司工坊將懷舊和創新的南洋食品帶到身邊，揉合到充滿風情的裝飾風格，讓您在富殖民地的氣氛下，能輕鬆舒適地品嚐每一杯南洋咖啡內所蘊含的文化傳統與心思。
about.sc:
土司工坊是60至70年代新加坡咖啡室的延续，让您重温当年新鲜烤制土司，手拉南洋咖啡以及半熟蛋的完美早餐配搭。

在土司工坊，年老的能重拾旧日美好回忆，年青的还能体验过去时代的感觉和味道。

以热情，轻松和充满活力，土司工坊将怀旧和创新的南洋食品带到身边，揉合到充满风情的装饰风格，让您在富殖民地的气氛下，能轻松舒适地品尝每一杯南洋咖啡内所蕴含的文化传统与心思。

metaDescription.en: The toast and Nanyang coffee from BreadTalk Concept Hong Kong Ltd’s Nanyang-style café, Toast Box, has been a favourite spot for HongKongers to enjoy quality coffee and toast ever since the café’s debut in the city in 2008.
metaDescription.sc: 土司工坊是60至70年代新加坡咖啡室的延续，让您重温当年新鲜烤製土司、手拉南洋咖啡以及半熟蛋的完美早餐配搭，让您在富殖民地的气氛下，能轻松舒适地品嚐每一杯南洋咖啡内所蕴含的文化传统与心思。

about.en: Travel Expert was founded in 1986 in Hong Kong. Over 30 years of travel industry experience, it had developed from its humble beginning as a small family business focusing on selling airline tickets and providing hotel reservation services into an individual travel package specialist enterprise. Being one of the most extensive travel agents in Hong Kong, the company embraces over 60 outlets offering diversified travel products at easily accessible locations.

about.tc: 這裡是遊牧雜貨，由遊牧爆谷團隊創建的網上商店，團隊致力為旅者們尋找旅行的質感及味道。每個地方都有它的專屬味道，或是甜美，或是鹹香，每種味道都連繫一段回憶。因為一次的措手不及，把我們困在現實裡，久久未能出走。她說她想吃日本的大拖羅，他說他想念台灣麻辣火鍋的刺激，我們都在不知不覺間用味道懷念遠方，所以才會有遊牧雜貨的誕生。遊牧雜貨不僅僅是一間店舖，我們保存回憶、重現回憶。在這些未能出門的日子裡，就讓遊牧雜貨為你尋來遠方的味道。每星期由我們精心挑選產品，從當地直送空運到港。趁著週末，買一份屬於你們回憶的味道，與你最愛的人來一場味覺之旅。希望遊牧雜貨可以讓你分享美味之外，亦可分享心意。

about.en:
“Trusty Congee King” serves traditional Chinese cuisines including various types of congee, noodles and rice dumpling. 

Since 2011, “Trusty Congee King” has been a “Michelin Recommended Restaurant” for seven consecutive years, in 2018, it also became the first ever congee restaurant to feature on the list of Bib Gourmand restaurants in the Michelin Guide Hong Kong Macau. It has been conferred the Michelin Guide Bib award for four consecutive years. 

Signature dishes of our Trusty Congee King Restaurant include Fish Belly Congee, Rice Dumpling Stuffed with Salted Meat and Shrimp Wonton Soup Noodles.
about.tc: 「靠得住」餐廳主要供應各式粥、麵、糭等傳統中菜，自2011年以來，連續七年獲米芝蓮指南評為「米芝蓮推介食肆」，更於2018、19、20及21年連續四年登上《米芝蓮指南香港澳門》「必比登推介食肆」，是首間獲此殊榮的粥品餐廳。招牌菜式包括香滑魚腩粥、靠得住鹹肉糭及招牌雲吞麵等。
about.sc: 「靠得住」餐厅主要供应各式粥、面、糭等传统中菜，自2011年以来，连续七年获米芝莲指南评为「米芝莲推介食肆」，更于2018、19、20及21年连续四年登上《米芝莲指南香港澳门》「必比登推介食肆」，是首间获此殊荣的粥品餐厅。招牌菜式包括香滑鱼腩粥、靠得住咸肉糭及招牌云吞面等。

about.en: ULA Umbrella evolved from a factory that produces umbrellas. In the past 30 years, we have assisted many Japanese brands in the production. We do not have huge capital and retail network support. With only professional experience and quality requirements, I originally wanted to create a local umbrella brand named ULA, which is taken from the abbreviation of Umbrella, which means shabby and new. We hope to put the best into ULA.
about.tc: ULA Umbrella 是由一間生產雨傘的生產工場演變出來，過往30年協助多間日本品牌生產，我們沒有龐大的資金和零售網絡的支持。只有專業的經驗和對品質的要求，當初希望創立一個本地的雨傘品牌取名 ULA，是取自於 Umbrella 的縮寫，意思是破舊立新，我們希望將最好的都放入ULA 當中。 雨傘本是一種古老的產品，其全人手的制作，做法和器材也未曾改變，而我們希望憑著過往生產技術及經驗， 結合現時最適合制作雨傘的材料和自家研發的設計，將ULA締造成完美的雨傘，不論任何天氣都能成為大家生活中最值得可靠信賴嘅良伴。
about.sc: ULA Umbrella 是由一间生产雨伞的生产工场演变出来，过往30年协助多间日本品牌生产，我们没有庞大的资金和零售网络的支持。只有专业的经验和对品质的要求，当初希望创立一个本地的雨伞品牌取名 ULA，是取自于 Umbrella 的缩写，意思是破旧立新, 我们希望将最好的都放入ULA 当中。雨伞本是一种古老的产品，其全人手的制作，做法和器材也未曾改变，而我们希望凭着过往生产技术及经验， 结合现时最适合制作雨伞的材料和自家研发的设计，将ULA缔造成完美的雨伞，不论任何天气都能成为大家生活中最值得可靠信赖慨良伴。

about.en:
Founded in 1975, Ulferts was the first retail chain store of up-market European furniture in Hong Kong. Ulferts purchasing team pays frequent visit to Europe and attends the worldwide furniture fairs such as “Milan Furniture Fair” and “Cologne International Furniture Fair” every year to bring the most stylish furniture to Hong Kong people.
 
Ulferts carries a lot of international brands with a large variety of products including sofa, dining table, dining chair, coffee table, cabinet, TV stand, easy chair and bed, etc. Most of the products come from Italy, Germany, etc.; the abundant stock availability fulfills customer needs at a timely manner. Ulferts strives to bring the European lifestyle to Hong Kong customers.
about.tc:
歐化傢俬於1975年成立，是香港第一所代理歐洲各國名牌傢俬連鎖店。專業採購團隊定時到歐洲各地搜羅最流行的優質傢俬，每年亦會出席雲集國際知名設計大師及傢俬品牌的大型傢俬展覽，例如「米蘭國際家具展」及「科隆國際家具展」等。

歐化傢俬匯聚多個國際級知名品牌，大部份貨品來自意大利、德國等，貨品種類繁多，包括梳化、餐檯椅、茶几、組合櫃、電視櫃、休閒椅、睡床等，並有大量現貨供應，將歐洲時尚生活品味帶到香港人的家中。
about.sc:
欧化家俬于1975年成立，是香港第一所代理欧洲各国名牌家俬连锁店。专业采购团队定时到欧洲各地搜罗最流行的优质家俬，每年亦会出席云集国际知名设计大师及家俬品牌的大型家俬展览，例如「米兰国际家具展」及「科隆国际家具展」等。

欧化家俬汇聚多个国际级知名品牌，大部份货品来自意大利、德国等，货品种类繁多，包括梳化、餐台椅、茶几、组合柜、电视柜、休闲椅、睡床等，并有大量现货供应，将欧洲时尚生活品味带到香港人的家中。

about.en: Brought to you by Riesling Weeks Hong Kong, an annual German wine celebration campaign, VINOTHEK BERLIN is the first German wine experience pop-up store in Hong Kong with cool Berlin street art decor featuring a wide selection of fine German wine, delicacies, wine cabinets, glasswares and lifestyle products. We invite you to experience wine, art and culture between 18th and 27th June.
about.tc: VINOHTEK BERLIN 是香港首家德國葡萄酒體驗館, 是年度 Riesling Weeks活動之一. 以繽紛色彩的柏林街頭藝術作主題. 由專業侍酒師推介不同款式的德國酒, 並有特色小食, 酒櫃, 酒杯, 限量禮品等出售. 我們誠邀你於6月18日至27日親臨體驗德國美酒, 藝術和文化.

about.en:
Vita Green Group is a company that produces and markets health supplements and medical devices in Asia, Europe and the Americas. Established 23 years ago, founded by two medical doctors. Vita Green is already a household name in Hong Kong and parts of Europe. Vita Green is dedicated to bring health, youth and joy to all. To accomplish this, Vita Green has developed modern nutraceuticals of high quality, safety and reliability that enable modern urban residents to improve their health. Vita Green specializes in extracting health treasures based on the essence of herbs and traditional Chinese medicine, and manufacture them to the highest Western pharmaceutical standards with the help of sophisticated modern technology.

 In addition, Vita Green also offers a series of premium vitamins and western health supplements imported from the U.S., the “Doctor’s Choice” vitamin series. This diversified product mix not only caters to needs of consumers of different genders and ages to create a healthy and perfect life for you and your family, but also helps prevent illnesses, bestowing you the power to grasp in your hands, your health and that of your loved ones.
about.tc:
維特健靈由兩位醫學專家創辦；它的使命是帶給大眾健康，為此，維特健靈為增進現代人的健康創造了品質超卓而又安全的營養補充品。維特健靈最擅長從中國醫藥學五千多年的傳統寶庫，利用最嚴謹的西方醫學標準，配合現代尖端科技，研製出品質優良、安全可靠的現代中藥，讓現代都市人從根本改善健康。維特健靈亦從由美國入口一系列優質維他命及健康補充劑「醫之選維他命系列」提供西方營養補充品給亞洲的顧客。維特健靈以多元化、中西合璧的產品，全面照顧男女老幼的不同需要，為您和您的家人締造健康美滿的生活。

維特健靈（歐洲）從天然草本提錬出有效成份，為一眾解決了許多健康問題。誠然，維特健靈為大眾提供了高品質的健康保障產品，讓大家能掌握自身的健康，得到健康的回報。
about.sc:
维特健灵由两位医学专家创办；它的使命是带给大众健康，为此，维特健灵为增进现代人的健康创造了品质超卓而又安全的营养补充品。维特健灵最擅长从中国医药学五千多年的传统宝库，利用最严谨的西方医学标准，配合现代尖端科技，研制出品质优良、安全可靠的现代中药，让现代都市人从根本改善健康。维特健灵亦从由美国入口一系列优质维他命及健康补充剂「医之选维他命系列」提供西方营养补充品给亚洲的顾客。维特健灵以多元化、中西合璧的产品，全面照顾男女老幼的不同需要，为您和您的家人缔造健康美满的生活。

维特健灵（欧洲）从天然草本提錬出有效成份，为一众解决了许多健康问题。诚然，维特健灵为大众提供了高品质的健康保障产品，让大家能掌握自身的健康，得到健康的回报。

about.en: Vivienne Westwood is recognized as one of the world’s most influential fashion designers, Westwood’s designs are an eclectic mix of individuality, classic elegance and rock music. Each piece displays a unique sense of personality. The brand currently manages 4 fashion collections including women’s collections AK, Mainline, Unisex, Anglomania as well as men’s collection MAN. Furthermore, the brand offers a unique range of accessories including handbags, jewellery, shoes, scarves and ties to complement different stylish outfits of fashion-conscious customers.
about.tc: Vivienne Westwood被視為世界上其中一位最具影響力的時裝設計師，Westwood的設計結合了個性、古典華麗和搖滾音樂元素，每件作品均彰顯了濃烈的個人主義，Vivienne Westwood現時主理共四個服裝系列，包括女裝的AK、Mainline、Unisex、Anglomania，以及男裝的Man系列。此外，品牌亦有一系列設計獨特的配飾，由手袋、首飾、鞋履以至頸巾領帶等，方便顧客配搭任何服，為顧客打造時尚型格的一面。
about.sc: Vivienne Westwood被视为世界上其中一位最具影响力的时装设计师，Westwood的设计结合了个性、古典华丽和摇滚音乐元素，每件作品均彰显了浓烈的个人主义，Vivienne Westwood现时主理共四个服装系列，包括女装的AK、Mainline、Unisex、Anglomania，以及男装的Man系列。此外，品牌亦有一系列设计独特的配饰，由手袋、首饰、鞋履以至颈巾领带等，方便顾客配搭任何服，为顾客打造时尚型格的一面。

about.en: Wan Kee Group was founded in 1969 by the Chan Family when the first sports shop ‘Wan Kee’ was opened in Johnston Road, Wan Chai, specializing in the sale of tennis goods. In the early 80s, when sports shoes became popular in Hong Kong, we have already scoped out the enormous potential in sporting goods industry and hence moved our base into Mong Kok Fa Yuen Street (later commonly known as the “Sneaker Street”) to further the business. Gradually, we have developed to one of the largest retail enterprise in Hong Kong since then.
about.tc: 允記集團於1969年由陳氏家族成立，開創初期在灣仔莊士敦道成立第一間專門售賣網球用品的允記體育公司。直到80年代初，運動鞋的潮流在香港開始興起，集團當時看準了運動用品行業的龐大潛力，遂轉往旺角花園街(俗稱「波鞋街」）作為業務據地，漸漸發展成為香港現今最具規模的運動用品零售企業之— 。

about.en:
Veeko Group (Veeko) was established in 1984 by Mr. Cheng Chung Man, Johnny to design, manufacture and wholesale ladies' apparel under the brandname Veeko.

Three years later in 1987, Mr. Cheng launched a fashion line for working women under the brandname Wanko given the surge in demand for executive ladies' wear.

Sales of Veeko and Wanko in Hong Kong skyrocketed that the Group in 1988 increased production, but lowered costs by shifting its manufacturing operation to the factories located in the mainland China.

Recognizing promising potential in the retail business, Mr. Cheng opened three retail outlets in Hong Kong in 1990.

On 19th April, 1999, Veeko International Holdings Limited was successfully listed on the Main Board of the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong (Stock Code: 1173), which ensured the market status of Veeko Group with great meaning.

With its methodical expansion based on comprehensive analysis and real demand, Veeko Group today 81 Veeko and Wanko stores, most of which are located in Hong Kong and Macau.

The Group has long been seeking other expansion and development opportunities in retail business with high value-adding prospects. In October 2004, the Group has launched its chain cosmetics retail business and established the Colourmix stores. As at today, the Group has a total of 75 Colourmix stores, most of which are located in Hong Kong and Macau.

In August 2015, the Group has established another cosmetics store namely MORIMOR. As at today, 5 MORIMOR stores have been set up in Hong Kong and Macau.
about.tc:
威高集團(威高)由鄭鐘文先生於1984年所創立，初期以Veeko品牌從事設計、生產和批發女士時裝之業務。

其後，市場對職業女性時裝的需求日益增加。鄭先生把握時勢，於1987年以Wanko品牌推出女士行政套裝。

Veeko和Wanko大受消費者歡迎，在香港的銷量直線上升，促使集團在1988年擴充生產，同時將生產工序移師至內地，以求降低成本，增強競爭力。

與此同時，鄭先生發現時裝零售亦具有頗大潛力，遂於1990年在香港開設三家專門店，銷售本身品牌的服裝。

1999年4月19日，威高國際控股有限公司成功於香港聯合交易所主板正式上市(股份編號: 1173)，奠定威高集團在市場的地位，意義十分重大。

威高集團發展循序漸進，根據全面的分析和市場實際需求，逐步擴充業務，時至今日，Veeko及Wanko設有81間專門店，主要位於香港及澳門。

一直以來，集團不斷尋求其他擴展商機，物色其他高增值且有前景的零售業務發展。於2004年10月份，集團正式開展以連鎖店式經營的化妝品零售業務，成立化妝品專門店Colourmix。截至目前為止，Colourmix已設有75間專門店，主要位於香港及澳門。

於二零一五年八月份，集團更開展了另一化妝品專門店MORIMOR，目前在香港及澳門已開設了5間MORIMOR專門店。
about.sc:
威高集团(威高)由郑钟文先生于1984年所创立，初期以Veeko品牌从事设计、生产和批发女士时装之业务。

其后，市场对职业女性时装的需求日益增加。郑先生把握时势，于1987年以Wanko品牌推出女士行政套装。

Veeko和Wanko大受消费者欢迎，在香港的销量直线上升，促使集团在1988年扩充生产，同时将生产工序移师至内地，以求降低成本，增强竞争力。

与此同时，郑先生发现时装零售亦具有颇大潜力，遂于1990年在香港开设三家专门店，销售本身品牌的服装。

1999年4月19日，威高国际控股有限公司成功于香港联合交易所主板正式上市(股份编号: 1173)，奠定威高集团在市场的地位，意义十分重大。

威高集团发展循序渐进，根据全面的分析和市场实际需求，逐步扩充业务，时至今日，Veeko及Wanko设有81间专门店，主要位于香港及澳门。

一直以来，集团不断寻求其他扩展商机，物色其他高增值且有前景的零售业务发展。于2004年10月份，集团正式开展以连锁店式经营的化妆品零售业务，成立化妆品专门店Colourmix。截至目前为止，Colourmix已设有75间专门店，主要位于香港及澳门。

于二零一五年八月份，集团更开展了另一化妆品专门店MORIMOR，目前在香港及澳门已开设了5间MORIMOR专门店。

about.en:
Watsons is Asia’s leading health and beauty retailer, currently operating over 7,800 stores – more than 1,500 of which are pharmacies, in 13 Asian and European markets.
 
Watsons operates around 240 stores in Hong Kong and Macau, of which over 50 have in-store pharmacies. Watsons has a professional team that includes pharmacists, dieticians, Chinese medicine practitioners, wellness coach, health advisor, beauty consultants, fragrance experts, a mother & baby advisor and a nurse. They are devoted to serving customers.
 
Watsons continually sets the highest standards in the health, wellness and beauty market, providing personalised advice and counseling in health, beauty and personal care on top of its market-leading product range, making customers LOOK GOOD, FEEL GREAT every day. Since 2009, Watsons has been the No. 1 Pharmacy/ Drugstore brand in Asia*. In Europe, Watsons is also the leading Health & Beauty retailer in Ukraine.
 
Watsons is the flagship health and beauty brand of A.S. Watson Group. Please visit www.aswatson.com for more in-depth information about A.S. Watson Group and its brands.
about.tc:
屈臣氏是亞洲最大的保健及美容產品零售商，業務遍布13個亞洲及歐洲市場，經營超過7,800家店舖，當中超過1,500家提供專業藥房服務。
 
屈臣氏在港澳擁有近240家分店，其中超過50家設有駐店藥房。店舖的專業團隊由註冊藥劑師、營養師、中醫師、健康指導、健康顧問、美容顧問、香水大使、母嬰健康顧問及護士所組成，為顧客提供無微不至的服務。
 
屈臣氏一直領導著保健及美容產品零售業，為顧客提供個人化的諮詢及建議，配以傲視同儕的多元化產品種類，令顧客每天都能LOOK GOOD，FEEL GREAT。自2009年起，屈臣氏為亞洲第一個人護理店／藥房品牌*，同時在歐洲烏克蘭亦為首屈一指的保健及美容產品零售商。
about.sc:
屈臣氏是亚洲最大的保健及美容产品零售商，业务遍布13个亚洲及欧洲市场，经营超过7,800家店铺，当中超过1,500家提供专业药房服务。
 
屈臣氏在港澳拥有近240家分店，其中超过50家设有驻店药房。店铺的专业团队由注册药剂师、营养师、中医师、健康指导、健康顾问、美容顾问、香水大使、母婴健康顾问及护士所组成，为顾客提供无微不至的服务。
 
屈臣氏一直领导着保健及美容产品零售业，为顾客提供个人化的咨询及建议，配以傲视同侪的多元化产品种类，令顾客每天都能LOOK GOOD，FEEL GREAT。自2009年起，屈臣氏为亚洲第一个人护理店／药房品牌*，同时在欧洲乌克兰亦为首屈一指的保健及美容产品零售商。

about.en:
Wellsoon is a renowned Chinese Medicine Clinic Chain Enterprise in China which is well-known for producing high quality Traditional Chinese Medicine and providing high grade Chinese Medical Services. We adopt a vigorous control process from herb plantation to Traditional Chinese Medicine production. Cold storage is adopted and no sulphur dioxide additives are used for preservation to ensure high quality, safety and effectiveness.

Excellent health care services are provided by our professional Chinese Medicine Practitioner team with good qualifications and experience. Wellsoon also provides a variety of health products for our daily needs.
about.tc:
和順堂是全中國知名中醫診所連鎖企業，精於生產高質量中藥材。由種植源頭開始監控，不使用硫磺防霉防蛀，而採用冷庫作儲存，保證藥材安全及具高療效。由和順堂出產的藥材均在原產地種植，只採摘品種最優良的道地藥材，並取植物最具療效部份入藥，確保醫師們得到最高品質的中藥為病人治療。

和順堂的專業醫師團隊為客人提供高質素的中醫醫療服務。和順堂重視日常的保健養生，各分店提供多款切合日常需要的健康產品供客人選購。
about.sc:
和顺堂是全中国知名中医诊所连锁企业，精于生产高质量中药材。由种植源头开始监控，不使用硫磺防霉防蛀，而采用冷库作储存，保证药材安全及具高疗效。由和顺堂出产的药材均在原产地种植，只采摘品种最优良的地道药材，并取植物最具疗效部份入药，确保医师们得到最高品质的中药为病人治疗。

和顺堂的专业医师团队为客人提供高质素的中医医疗服务。和顺堂重视日常的保健养生，各分店提供多款切合日常需要的健康产品供客人选购。

about.en:
Wing On Travel was established in 1964, Today, Wing On Travel has accumulated nearly 50 years of extensive operational experience. 

Wing On Travel, one of the largest travel companies in Hong Kong, provides quality and versatile travel services worldwide. It offers extensive travel service to Hong Kong customers. The range of service include hotel, air tickets, outbound travel packages, group tours, etc.
about.tc:
永安旅遊於1964年在香港成立，時至今日，已累積57年的豐富營運經驗。永安旅遊於旅遊界佔領導地位，於管理質素、旅行團路線網絡及多元化的業務範疇等都有超卓表現，備受旅客追捧，會員人數超過150萬。分行遍佈香港、九龍、新界及澳門，更擁有經驗豐富且服務專業的團隊，携手將永安旅遊打造成業界翹楚。

永安旅遊每年服務旅客超過100萬，而為迎合港人熱愛旅遊的喜好，更不斷拓展嶄新路線，每年開發超過2,000個旅遊產品，涵蓋400多個目的地，路線遍佈全球50個國家，並提供優惠及多元化的旅遊服務，如郵輪旅遊、遊學團及獨立組團服務，以及擁有特色觀光船，為海外及本地遊客提供多種海上遊覽路線。作為本地主要旅行社品牌，永安旅遊亦與時並進，積極打造一站式網上預訂平台，並於2014年10月推出手機應用程式，提供機票、酒店、自由行套票、旅行團、澳門船票等實時預訂服務。永安旅遊APP推出以來獲獎無數，下載次數更超過240萬，備受各界肯定。
about.sc:
永安旅游于1964年在香港成立，时至今日，已累积57年的丰富营运经验。永安旅游于旅游界占领导地位，于管理质素、旅行团路线网络及多元化的业务范畴等都有超卓表现，备受旅客追捧，会员人数超过150万。分行遍布香港、九龙、新界及澳门，更拥有经验丰富且服务专业的团队，携手将永安旅游打造成业界翘楚。

永安旅游每年服务旅客超过100万，而为迎合港人热爱旅游的喜好，更不断拓展崭新路线，每年开发超过2000个旅游产品，涵盖400多个目的地，路线遍布全球50个国家，并提供优惠及多元化的旅游服务，如邮轮旅游、游学团及独立组团服务，以及拥有特色观光船，为海外及本地游客提供多种海上游览路线。作为本地主要旅行社品牌，永安旅游亦与时并进，积极打造一站式网上预订平台，并于2014年10月推出手机应用程序，提供机票、酒店、自由行套票、旅行团、澳门船票等实时预订服务。永安旅游APP推出以来获奖无数，下载次数更超过240万，备受各界肯定。

about.en: Y-3-The collaborative fashion sportwear collection between Yohji Yamamoto and Adidas. Yohji Yamamoto is the Creative Director of Y-3. He is one of the most influential and innovative Avant Garde Designer of our time. He has great credibility and respect within the world of Fashion and Design. Adidas was and is still interested in his unique direction and wanted explore and experiment with the before and would affect the future of the industry. Yohji Yamamoto’s designs represent craftsmanship, innovation and have a very poetic approach to fashion.
about.tc:
Y-3由運動品牌adidas與擔任創意總監的設計師山本耀司Yohji Yamamoto合作的時尚運動服品牌，山本耀司同時是當代最有影響力和創新的前衛設計師之一。

山本耀司將其個人品牌的精湛的工藝、創新精神，並以極富詩意的方式融入Y-3中，為運動服領域展現一個新的時尚定義。
about.sc:
Y-3由运动品牌adidas与担任创意总监的设计师山本耀司Yohji Yamamoto合作的时尚运动服品牌，山本耀司同时是当代最有影响力和创新的前卫设计师之一。

山本耀司将其个人品牌的精湛的工艺、创新精神，并以极富诗意的方式融入Y-3中，为运动服领域展现一个新的时尚定义。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Y-3 at Fashion Walk.  We are a unique fusion of indoor and outdoor elements at the heart of Causeway Bay, embracing three vibrant streets – Paterson, Food Street and Kingston.
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到Fashion Walk的Y-3。Fashion Walk是匯聚時尚、品味生活及國際美饌的潮流熱點，提供獨特的室內及室外購物環境，涵蓋三大區域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到Fashion Walk的Y-3。Fashion Walk是汇聚时尚、品味生活及国际美馔的潮流热点，提供独特的室内及室外购物环境，涵盖叁大区域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。

about.en:
Originated from Tokyo, Japan, YAKINIKU LIKE is a popular solo yakiniku dining restaurant that strives to deliver “Tasty! Quick! Value!” gourmet experience to the diners. 

With over 50 branches across Japan, Taiwan, Singapore and Indonesia in Asia, YAKINIKU LIKE sets its footprint in Hong Kong in early January 2021, storming the city with its first solo yakiniku dining restaurant from Japan. 

YAKINIKU LIKE is committed to deliver the diversified and one-of-a-kind dining experience to the Yakiniku aficionados with high-quality ingredients, including premium meats and Japanese rice as well as a wide variety of special dipping sauces formulated by using quality ingredients. 

Personal and shared smokeless grillers with advanced technology are also being imported and installed at all branches of YAKINIKU LIKE, where solo and group diners can enjoy a grease-free, authentic Yakiniku experience.
about.tc:
源自日本東京的「燒肉LIKE」主打「美味、快捷、超值」的一人燒肉體驗。

目前於全亞洲擁有超過50間分店，網絡遍佈日本、台灣、新加坡及印尼，並於2021年1月在香港開設首間分店，成為全港首間源自日本的一人燒肉專門店。

「燒肉LIKE」致力嚴選優質食材，包括頂級上乘的肉品及米飯，以及多款以精選食材調配而成的特製醬料。

「燒肉 LIKE」更為不同顧客群設置個人及共享無煙烤爐，進口烤爐採用先進除煙技術，讓顧客無懼油煙，時刻享受正宗的日式「一人前」燒肉體驗。
about.sc:
源自日本东京的「烧肉LIKE」主打「美味、快捷、超值」的一人烧肉体验。

目前于全亚洲拥有超过50间分店，网络遍布日本、台湾、新加坡及印尼，并于2021年1月在香港开设首间分店，成为全港首间源自日本的一人烧肉专门店。

「烧肉LIKE」致力严选优质食材，包括顶级上乘的肉品及米饭，以及多款以精选食材调配而成的特制酱料。

「烧肉LIKE」更为不同顾客群设置个人及共享无烟烤炉，进口烤炉采用先进除烟技术，让顾客无惧油烟，时刻享受正宗的日式「一人前」烧肉体验。

about.tc: 元朗合興製造的花生糖，鬆軟芬香，遠近馳名。隨著時代的轉變，我們由鐵鑊改成不銹鋼的銅鑊，花生糖很注重外觀，銅鑊乾淨又衛生，才可做出美味可口的花生糖，加上老伙記齊心，憑他們精堪熟練的技術，生產一系列的懷舊美食，做出香港人喜愛的花生糖。

about.en:
In 1959, in the attic of his family home in La Gacilly in Brittany, Mr. Yves Rocher created Botanical Beauty, an innovative beauty concept that draws its ingredients from nature and combines them with the best of science. More than just a source of inspiration, nature is at the core of our business.

At La Gacilly, we grow and harvest plants with passion. Faithful to our convictions and methods, everything is carried out in our laboratories and our industrial plants. For 60 years, we have explored the Botanical world and drawn from its richness to provide solutions for women's every beauty concern.
about.tc:
1959年，Yves Rocher 先生在布列塔尼 Brittany 地區中La Gacilly小鎮的家裏展開了植物美肌的事業。 一種創新的美容概念，結合了大自然的天然成分與科學的精細研究。 從此，大自然不僅成爲我們靈感的來源，更是我們業務的核心。 

在我們La Gacilly的有機農場裏、實驗室和工廠裏，我們始終忠於我們愛護地球的信念，以最天然方法進行有機種植、萃取精華及產品生產。 60年來，我們一直在探索植物世界，並從其豐富的魅力中汲取靈感，為女性的所有美容問題提供解決方案。
about.sc:
1959年，Yves Rocher 先生在布列塔尼 Brittany 地区中La Gacilly小镇的家里展开了植物美肌的事业。一种创新的美容概念，结合了大自然的天然成分与科学的精细研究。从此，大自然不仅成为我们灵感的来源，更是我们业务的核心。

在我们La Gacilly的有机农场里、实验室和工厂里，我们始终忠于我们爱护地球的信念，以最天然方法进行有机种植、萃取精华及产品生产。 60年来，我们一直在探索植物世界，并从其丰富的魅力中汲取灵感，为女性的所有美容问题提供解决方案。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Yves Rocher at Amoy Plaza. Amoy Plaza is an ideal one-stop shopping, dining and entertainment hub with more than 30 food and beverage outlets serving Eastern and Western cuisines.
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到淘大商場的 Yves Rocher。淘大商場提供一站式餐飲、購物及娛樂享受，全面照顧你的消費購物需要，商場內有超過30家本地及國際食府，提供惹人垂涎的亞洲及西式美食。
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到淘大商场的 Yves Rocher。淘大商场提供一站式餐饮、购物及娱乐享受，全面照顾你的消费购物需要，商场内有超过30家本地及国际食府，提供惹人垂涎的亚洲及西式美食。

Grand Plaza is home to a stellar line-up of international watch and jewelry brands, concept stores as well as fashion, lifestyle and sports labels. The dedicated Dining Floor features over 20 gourmet dining venues where international cuisine is served in stylish surroundings.
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到雅蘭中心的 Yves Rocher。雅蘭中心匯聚國際鐘表珠寶品牌、概念商店以及多間時尚服飾與運動品牌。雅蘭中心「潮食點」更集20多間中、西、日人氣特色食肆，讓顧客於這鬧市中的時尚熱點，寫意享受各國優質美饌。
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到雅兰中心的 Yves Rocher。雅兰中心汇聚国际钟表珠宝品牌、概念商店以及多间时尚服饰与运动品牌。雅兰中心「潮食点」更集20多间中、西、日人气特色食肆，让顾客于这闹市中的时尚热点，写意享受各国优质美馔。

about.en:
Over 120 various water-mouthing dishes including the rarest saga Wagyu beef from outside of Japan (value at HK$20,000) to enhance your taste buds. 

Freshest chicken, pork, seafood, and crisp vegetables perfectly matching with dozens of Japanese and Korean fusion sauces that one could hardly bear to put it down. No matter grilling or cooking is all under your favourite way to make you as the “Grill Master”. Taste every sauce on the menu? Eager to refill more? Absolutely! Please scan the QR code on your receipt and our servers will make your dreams come true.

Executive Chef of Guu Yakiniku, Yip Kam Lung has tried numerous experimental favoured dishes aimed at crafting a delicious sparkle presenting the international diversified flavours, and bring you an  adventurous journey with the crispy, fresh, juicy with multiple levels of seasoning Korean fried chicken or flavourful Bibimbap.
about.tc:
餐牌上有超過120多種菜色可供嚐試，包括很少在日本境外見到的佐賀和牛（價值港幣$20,000）。

新鮮的雞肉、豬肉、彈牙的海鮮以及爽脆的蔬菜一應俱全，配合十數種日式和韓式完美融合的調味沾醬，令人愛不釋手。可以完全依照自己喜歡的方式烹煮，成為主掌燒肉的主人。是否想嚐試餐牌上的所有沾醬？ 想再多加一點沾醬？沒問題！只要掃瞄收據上的二維碼，我們的招待馬上讓您美夢成真。

佐賀燒肉谷的大廚葉錦龍嚐試了各種實驗性風味料理，渴望展現不同國家多元化料理所碰撞出來的美味火花。試想像酥脆、鮮嫩多汁且層次感豐富的韓國炸雞或美味的石鍋拌飯，讓您享用既充滿冒險而又風味十足的一餐！
about.sc:
餐牌上有超过120多种菜色可供尝试，包括很少在日本境外见到的佐贺和牛（价值港币$20,000）。

新鲜的鸡肉、猪肉、弹牙的海鲜以及爽脆的蔬菜一应俱全，配合十数种日式和韩式完美融合的调味沾酱，令人爱不释手。可以完全依照自己喜欢的方式烹煮，成为主掌烧肉的主人。是否想尝试餐牌上的所有沾酱？ 想再多加一点沾酱？没问题！只要扫瞄收据上的二维码，我们的招待马上让您美梦成真。

佐贺烧肉谷的大厨叶锦龙尝试了各种实验性风味料理，渴望展现不同国家多元化料理所碰撞出来的美味火花。试想像酥脆、鲜嫩多汁且层次感丰富的韩国炸鸡或美味的石锅拌饭，让您享用既充满冒险而又风味十足的一餐！

about.en:
Since 1948, Yamazaki Baking Co. Ltd. began as a provider of baked goods to all in Japan. Nowadays, Yamazaki is the most popular bakery brand in the country and loved by everyone. In 1981, Yamazaki started to bring her successful business concept to other regions around the world and first stepped upon Hong Kong as the first bakery shop. We are now operating a large production plant and many outlets.

Every of us insist on 60-year baking traditions by using 100% Japanese flour with favor elements of our customers; we bring tasty, healthiness and freshness to Hong Kong people. The company’s rigorous quality controls, latest technologies and team spirit are all designed to provide customers with a wide range of tasty bread.
about.tc:
山崎面飽於1948年在日本成立，一直以來以提供質優味美的麵包而廣受大眾歡迎，至今依然日本人氣麵包品牌。自1981年，山崎面飽將一套嶄新營理理念帶到世界各地，香港成為首個踏足的地方，現時山崎已擁有一座龐大的中央廠房及多間分店。

香港山崎面飽秉承60年來的製作原則，每位員工對生產要求極度嚴謹，我們堅持採用日本高級麵粉，注入香港人喜愛的元素，將美味、健康和新鮮帶給顧客。我們嚴格的質量控制、現代化的生產技術和團隊精神等成就了山崎產品另一獨特之處。
about.sc:
山崎面饱于1948年在日本成立，一直以来以提供质优味美的面包而广受大众欢迎，至今依然日本人气面包品牌。自1981年，山崎面饱将一组崭新營理理念带到世界各地，香港成为首个踏足的地方，现时山崎已拥有一座巨大的中央厂房及多间分店。

香港山崎面饱秉承60年的制作原则，每位员工对生产要求极度严谨，我们坚持采用日本高级面粉，注入香港人喜爱的元素，将美味，健康和新鲜带给顾客。我们严格的质量控制，现代化的生产技术和团队精神等成就了山崎产品另一独特之处。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to Yamazaki Bakery at Kornhill Plaza. From exquisite gourmet food and relaxing cafes to cinemas and bookstores, Kornhill Plaza caters to the desires of every family looking for a kaleidoscopic lifestyle and sheer enjoyment.

name.en: Yip's Children's Choral and Performing Arts Centre
name.tc: 葉氏兒童音樂實踐中心
name.sc: 叶氏儿童音乐实践中心

about.en:
The Yip's Children's Choral and Performing Arts Centre (YCCPAC) was founded in 1983 by Dr. Yip Wai Hong and his colleagues. We offer a variety of performing arts programs to promote formal education in music and arts for children aged eighteen months to seventeen years. 

The four main areas of studies – Pre-School Music Course, Choir, Musical Theater and Instrumental Playing meet the needs of children with different interests and abilities. The departments both focus on their own areas of training, and work interdepartmentally to provide performance opportunities.
about.tc:
葉氏兒童音樂實踐中心於1983年由葉惠康博士創立並出任音樂總監。中心的宗旨為推廣正統的兒童音樂藝術教育，為一歲半的幼兒至十七歲的少年兒童，提供全面而多元化的音樂及藝術訓練課程。

課程主要分四個部門，適合不同年齡、興趣或能力的小朋友參加，包括幼兒部、合唱部、音樂劇部及器樂部。各部門除分別專門訓練及演出外，還會聯合演出和活動。葉氏兒童音樂實踐中心創辦人兼音樂總監--葉惠康博士，自六十年代投身音樂教育工作，累積多年經驗後，發展了「葉氏兒童音樂教育系統」，廣被推祟。
about.sc:
叶氏儿童音乐实践中心于1983年由叶惠康博士创立并出任音乐总监。中心的宗旨为推广正统的儿童音乐艺术教育，为一岁半的幼儿至十七岁的少年儿童，提供全面而多元化的音乐及艺术训练课程。

课程主要分四个部门，适合不同年龄、兴趣或能力的小朋友参加，包括幼儿部、合唱部、音乐剧部及器乐部。各部门除分别专门训练及演出外，还会联合演出和活动。叶氏儿童音乐实践中心创办人兼音乐总监--叶惠康博士，自六十年代投身音乐教育工作，累积多年经验后，发展了「叶氏儿童音乐教育系统」，广被推祟。

about.tc: 「夢想，是人生最重要的事！」Y與兩位K師父---Yolanda Bakery 蘭特餅店創辦人，在香港接受20多年嚴格的西餅烘焙訓練，為了追尋更深造藝，多年來更多次遠赴歐洲學習傳統的曲奇製作，並創出多款獨一無二的新口味，贏得了廣大消費者的青睞，在這邊他希望能與大家分享他的烘焙夢。
about.sc: 「梦想，是人生最重要的事！」Y与两位K师父---Yolanda Bakery 兰特饼店创办人，在香港接受20多年严格的西饼烘焙训练，为了追寻更深造艺，多年来更多次远赴欧洲学习传统的曲奇制作，并创出多款独一无二的新口味，赢得了广大消费者的青睐，在这边他希望能与大家分享他的烘焙梦。

metaDescription.sc: 香港众多的曲奇店中，又有多少款式味道能够代表香港独家味呢？兰特饼店全心追求创新、健康食品味道，严选新西兰顶级牛油、有机蛋、日本面粉，使用独特的配方，加上师父全人手、用心的制作技术，调制出兰特YY小兔子曲奇独有的30几种口感丰富。
metaDescription.tc: 香港眾多的曲奇店中，又有多少款式味道能夠代表香港獨家味呢？蘭特餅店全心追求創新、健康食品味道，嚴選紐西蘭頂級牛油、有機蛋、日本麵粉，使用獨特的配方，加上師父全人手、用心的製作技術，調製出蘭特YY小兔子曲奇獨有的30幾種口感豐富。

about.en: Yoshinoya serves Japanese Beef Bowl for over a century, delivers our passion and expertise of Beef Bowl across Japan and finally to the world. Apart from Our renowned Beef Bowl, Shabu Shabu and other limited time offer items are so welcomed by customers.
about.tc: 超過百年歷史的日本牛肉丼飯專門店–吉野家，百多年來一直秉承著創新求進和用心服務的理念成為廣為人知及備受追捧的跨國飲食企業。除了其招牌的和風牛肉丼飯外，日式火鍋、麵食、特色早餐和多樣的期間限定食品都深受客人歡迎。
about.sc: 超过百年历史的日本牛肉丼饭专门店–吉野家，百多年来一直秉承着创新求进和用心服务的理念成为广为人知及备受追捧的跨国饮食企业。除了其招牌的和风牛肉丼饭外，日式火锅、面食、特色早餐和多样的期间限定食品都深受客人欢迎。

about.en: Yu Fung Chinese Medicine Centre was set up by a group of registered professional Chinese Medicine (CM) Practitioners grown up in Hong Kong. Having received both professional Chinese Medicine and fundamental Western Medicine training from universities, our practitioners' qualifications are well recognized by the Chinese Medicine Council of Hong Kong. Meanwhile, having worked in both public and private health care organization, our practitioners are equipped with fruitful experience in treating various types of illness. After all, we all hope to contribute to the community and serve the public with a sense of modesty, care and love.
about.tc: 譽豐中醫診療中心 由一群本港土生土長的註冊中醫師組成。中心醫師均取得大學資格，接受嚴格的大學中西醫學訓練，具備香港中醫藥管理委員會認可的註冊資格。同時，中心醫師先後在公私營醫療機構應診，對各臨床常見病症的處理均有豐富的經驗，掌握最便捷的中醫診療方法。我們皆懷著謙卑和關愛之心，期望以己之所長回饋社會，服務市民。
about.sc: 誉丰中医诊疗中心 由一群本港土生土长的注册中医师组成。中心医师均取得大学资格，接受严格的大学中西医学训练，具备香港中医药管理委员会认可的注册资格。同时，中心医师先后在公私营医疗机构应诊，对各临床常见病症的处理均有丰富的经验，掌握最便捷的中医诊疗方法。我们皆怀着谦卑和关爱之心，期望以己之所长回馈社会，服务市民。

about.en: Founded in 1997 by Thierry Gillier, Zadig & Voltaire is enjoying undeniable success in the high end ready-to-wear sector. The brand embodies new luxury by giving fashion basics a playful and resolutely rock’n’roll twist: an affordable, stylish and laid-back luxury.
about.tc: 以高級羊絨針織（cashmere）衣飾聞名的ZADIG & VOLTAIRE由Thierry Gillier於1997年創立。Thierry Gillier的法國品牌ZADIG & VOLTAIRE就是希望成為時裝界的一口新鮮空氣或是一個夢工場，製造一種讓人負擔得起的奢華，讓每一個人都能享受在時裝世界中。
about.sc: 以高级羊绒针织（cashmere）衣饰闻名的ZADIG & VOLTAIRE由Thierry Gillier于1997年创立。Thierry Gillier的法国品牌ZADIG & VOLTAIRE就是希望成为时装界的一口新鲜空气或是一个梦工场，制造一种让人负担得起的奢华，让每一个人都能享受在时装世界中。

about.en:
“Zero To One” describes the process of creating something radically new and taking it to the first step or intensive growth. It is easier to do things from “1 to n” than “Zero To One”.

Zero To One believes tea is healthy, delicious and fun. It is also the second most popular drink on the planet, second only to water. Tea, very simple, because it brings people together all over the world and makes us happy.
about.tc: Zero To One茶創樂,名字見證著我們由零到一努力建立品牌的過程,亦代表不怕艱辛努力追夢的精神。茶很簡單,可以帶動及連結朋友,帶來歡笑聲。我們希望我們的健康、美味、有趣的茶產品可以創造出趣味及快樂。
about.sc: Zero To One茶创乐,名字见证着我们由零到一努力建立品牌的过程,亦代表不怕艰辛努力追梦的精神。茶很简单,可以带动及连结朋友,带来欢笑声。我们希望我們的健康、美味、有趣的茶产品可以创造出趣味及快乐。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to ZeroToOne at Peak Galleria. Ideally located atop the famous attraction in Hong Kong, Victoria Peak, The Peak Galleria is an  extensive shopping and dining complex complemented by various exciting activities.

about.en: A global designer of athletic footwear, apparel and accessories, adidas creates products that break records, set trends and make history – every day, all over the world. Their three subbrands - Sport Performance, Originals and NEO – complement each other in a unique way to help athlete perform better, play better, feel better.

作為一個設計、開發及營銷運動鞋、服裝及配飾的全球性企業，adidas每天都在突破自我、帶領潮流並且創造歷史。

旗下三大品牌：Sport Performance，Originals及NEO各有特色，務求令每一位運動員能在最佳狀態下發揮得更好，表現更佳。

about.en: Inspired by the rich sporting heritage of adidas, adidas Originals continues to evolve the brand's legacy through its commitment to product innovation and its ability to filter the creativity and courage found on courts an sporting arenas through the lens of contemporary youth culture. Marked by the iconic Trefoil logo, adidas Originals also continues to lead the way as the pioneering sportswear brand for the street.
about.tc: adidas Originals是對adidas經典產品的傳承。系列以大量20世紀40年代到80年代的運動元素作為設計靈感，具有強烈的經典味道。同時，adidas Originals更推崇原創精神，是一個面向所有人，鼓勵原創、渴望為原創喝彩的街頭時尚品牌。

about.en: International brand, agnès b. is renowned for her timeless garments and offers some irresistible favourite pieces throughout the changing year. She has designed clothing for men, women and children that reflect the spirit of the age by creating a wardrobe that can easily adapt to every personality and can be worn for a very long time.
about.tc: 國際品牌agnès b.憑著雋永時尚的設計風格而聞名，並隨時代變遷帶來多款令人難以抗拒的經典設計。她的時裝系列包括男娤、女裝及童娤系列，透過能輕易迎合每種個性和永恆長青的服裝設計。
about.sc: 国际品牌agnès b.凭着隽永时尚的设计风格而闻名，并随时代变迁带来多款令人难以抗拒的经典设计。她的时装系列包括男娤、女装及童娤系列，透过能轻易迎合每种个性和永恆长青的服装设计。

metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到Fashion Walk的agnès b. RUE DU JOUR。Fashion Walk是匯聚時尚、品味生活及國際美饌的潮流熱點，提供獨特的室內及室外購物環境，涵蓋三大區域，包括Paterson、Food Street（食街）及Kingston。

about.en: at.home provides full range of furniture and accessories infused with Scandinavian style, where colours, materials and design aesthetics are put together in perfect harmony. It is time to create a cozy living space in style!
about.tc: at.home主打優質輕巧傢俬及潮流家品，其北歐風格切合年輕家庭品味，為時尚家居立下嶄新指標。at.home產品多元化，設計創新，物料及色彩配搭完美和諧，為您打造充滿個性的安樂窩。
about.sc: at.home主打优质轻巧家俬及潮流家品，其北欧风格切合年轻家庭品味，为时尚家居立下崭新指标。at.home产品多元化，设计创新，物料及色彩配搭完美和谐，为您打造充满个性的安乐窝。

about.en: Nordic style furniture is gaining momentum in the home furnishing scene among the young generation with its timeless contemporary design and natural touch. at.home aims to provide high quality Nordic style furniture and home accessories infused with colorful and simplicity design. The products sizes are smartly crafted to suit the relatively small living spaces in Hong Kong. at.home will enable you to build a dream home in a unique and chic style!
about.tc: 自然又富有現代感的北歐風格傢俱近年大行其道，切合年青家庭品味。at.home致力提供高質素且別具北歐風格的傢俬家品，尺寸貼合香港家庭需要，以纖巧時尚為主導，豐富色彩穿梭於簡約設計中，為潮流家居立下嶄新指標！
about.sc: 自然又富有现代感的北欧风格家具近年大行其道，切合年青家庭品味。at.home致力提供高质素且别具北欧风格的家俬家品，尺寸贴合香港家庭需要，以纤巧时尚为主导，丰富色彩穿梭于简约设计中，为潮流家居立下崭新指标！

about.en: Founded in 1995, b+ab is the first in-house brand of I.T group, the renowned fashion group in Hong Kong. With the vision to incubate the in-house brand that shares the same level of popularity with other imported brands, the name ‘b+ab’, alike an algebraic expression, features a yet-to-complete identity, to signify the interweave of creative elements which are boundary-free and waiting to be decoded and re-coded.
about.tc: b+ab由著名時裝集團I.T於1995年創立，希望能為本地顧客帶來一個媲美其他進口牌子的本地品牌。作為I.T首個自創品牌，「b+ab」以這個沒有等號、刻意留白的代數式為名，有待尋求的答案、身份、價值，預示品牌希望以不同創意元素交織出不設限制、留待被解讀及重新解讀的設計美學。
about.sc: b+ab由知名时装集团I.T于1995年创立，希望能为本地顾客带来可以媲美进口品牌服饰的服装品牌。作为I.T集团首个自营品牌，「 b+ab 」以这个没有等号，可以留白的代数式命名，有待寻求的答案、身份、价值，都代表了品牌希望以不同创意元素交织出不设限制、留待被重新解读及定义的设计美学。

about.en:
be, which means beauty expert (beauty expert), is a collection of top beauty experts and professional beauty formulas from all over the world. It is the most high-quality and efficient, and "beauty expert" is also named. 

be beauty shop gathers international beauticians, dermatologists, chemical research specialists, etc. With decades of experience in beauty and skin care, they continue to develop personalized skin care products, explore skin care products most suitable for Southeast Asian skin types, and continue to reform and innovate concepts. Laid an extraordinary palace status.

From basic skin care to cosmetics, slimming products, body products and even men's skin care products, all are based on meeting the needs of the human body, realizing the perfect combination of nature and technology. With its superior quality, the number of customers and the level of customers are also growing and expanding. In addition to the Hong Kong business, be continues to actively expand overseas markets and become an international multinational enterprise group.
about.tc:
be，意即 beauty expert(美容專家)，集各地頂尖美容專家及專業美容配方研發而來，屬優質及高效之最，「美容專家」亦因此而命名。be beauty shop集合國際級美容師、皮膚學專家、化學研究專員等憑藉數十年美容護膚經驗，不斷研製出針對個人化護膚產品，探索出最適合東南亞膚質之護膚產品，不斷改革創新理念，奠定了非凡殿堂級地位。

從肌膚基本護理開始至化妝品、瘦身產品、身體用品以至男士護膚品，均以切合人體需要為基準，實現了自然與科技的完美結合。憑著其優越的品質，顧客人數及層面亦不斷增長及擴大。除香港業務外，be更不斷積極拓展海外市場，成為一個國際性的跨國企業集團。
about.sc:
be，意即 beauty expert(美容专家)，集各地顶尖美容专家及专业美容配方研发而来，属优质及高效之最，「美容专家」亦因此而命名。be beauty shop集合国际级美容师、皮肤学专家、化学研究专员等凭借数十年美容护肤经验，不断研制出针对个人化护肤产品，探索出最适合东南亚肤质之护肤产品，不断改革创新理念，奠定了非凡殿堂级地位。

从肌肤基本护理开始至化妆品、瘦身产品、身体用品以至男士护肤品，均以切合人体需要为基准，实现了自然与科技的完美结合。凭着其优越的品质，顾客人数及层面亦不断增长及扩大。除香港业务外，be更不断积极拓展海外市场，成为一个国际性的跨国企业集团。

about.en:
Our first designer clothing store opened in 2000.
  
initial is proud of its ethos that continuously creates the unusual experience. Our sharp sense for time and our flexibility to create enables us to truly build a unique and open platform for the next generation. From marginality to popularity, initial boasts a balanced, global perspective. Breaking through the boundary of culture, we seek to discover the new needs and fuel our unique take on fashion.
  
initial, keeping an eye and an ear, on the world. We come to the soul from our roots. Usual life is filled with unusual people. We exist - for being remarkable.
about.tc:
設計師潮流品牌initial創立於2000 年。
  
 「非尋常」是我們的聲明。在不設限的創造維度中，initial跨越觀念、文化的界限，打造有趣而鮮活的企劃。在邊緣和流行之間，敏銳察覺時代的脈動，保持變通的感受力，為啟發新世代年輕人而鑄的獨特平台。
  
 不陷入無味的生活，不墜入無聊的狀態，保持敏銳的前瞻性、大膽的實驗性，即是始於生活原本，亦時刻創造「非尋常體驗」。
about.sc:
设计师潮流品牌initial创立于2000 年。
  
 「非寻常」是我们的声明。在不设限的创造维度中，initial跨越观念、文化的界限，打造有趣而鲜活的企划。在边缘和流行之间，敏锐察觉时代的脉动，保持变通的感受力，为启发新世代年轻人而铸的独特平台。
  
 不陷入无味的生活，不坠入无聊的状态，保持敏锐的前瞻性、大胆的实验性，即是始于生活原本，亦时刻创造「非寻常体验」。

about.en: Founded by frenchman Arnault Castel in 2006, kapok began as a lifestyle shop located on a quiet backstreet of Tin Hau. With a well-trained eye for exploring newness, a passion for discovery and above all, a taste for the unpretentious, kapok is now widely recognised as the alternative wunderkind in the Asia retail scene. We bring you tasteful selection from around the world, including fashion, beauty, homeware and accessories.
about.tc: kapok由法國人Arnault Castel於2006年成立，一直細心搜羅全球各地創新並富質感的永恆設計，期望將「future classics」帶來亞洲。以獨到的品味及專業視野發掘新品牌，十多年來由一間生活潮品店發展成為行內指標性的時尚選物品牌。

about.en:
Founded in 2001 in Hong Kong, maple endeavors to select the on-trend fashion items from Japan and Korea with reasonable price, stylish cut and high quality.
With the experienced buyer and design team, maple making progress consistently with customer in the changing trend of fashion.
“Keep it simple. Make it special” is the belief of maple. To search the variety and possibility in simple style and keep intimate with everyday life.
about.tc:
maple創立於2001年，一直致力搜羅日韓最新產品，務求帶來價格合理、剪裁時尚、高質量的時裝產品及配件。
憑藉採購及設計團隊的豐富經驗及敏銳觸覺，多年來帶領大眾和品牌在時裝洪流中不斷蛻變、進步。
“Keep it simple. Make it special”乃maple的座右銘。簡單之中蘊藏獨特的變化，獨特得來又能貼近生活。
about.sc:
maple创立于2001年，一直致力搜罗日韩最新产品，务求带来价格合理、剪裁时尚、高质量的时装产品及配件。
凭借采购及设计团队的丰富经验及敏锐触觉，多年来带领大众和品牌在时装洪流中不断蜕变、进步。
“Keep it simple. Make it special”乃maple的座右铭。简单之中蕴藏独特的变化，独特得来又能贴近生活。

about.en:
per FACE provides beauty treatment with 12 years of experience in the market and it has always been committed to providing the most efficient, safest, and most comprehensive treatment to customers with its cutting-edge medical beauty technology and professional team.
per FACE is qualified with ISO9001 certification, and uses top quality products and equipment, which guarantee results and safety.
about.tc: per FACE一直以來以頂尖嶄新醫美科技，配合資深的醫學美容團隊，致力提供最高效、最安全、最全面的療程。per FACE榮獲ISO9001品質保證，堅持使用原廠正貨，明碼實價，所有治療師均完成專業訓練及考取國際證書，為客人提供專業貼心而且切合其所需的美容療程。
about.sc: per FACE一直以来以顶尖崭新医美科技，配合资深的医学美容团队，致力提供最高效、最安全、最全面的疗程。per FACE荣获ISO9001质量保证，坚持使用原厂正货，明码实价，所有治疗师均完成专业训练及考取国际证书，为客人提供专业贴心而且切合其所需的美容疗程。

metaDescription.en: Welcome to 景品捕屋 at Amoy Plaza. Amoy Plaza is an ideal one-stop shopping, dining and entertainment hub with more than 30 food and beverage outlets serving Eastern and Western cuisines.
metaDescription.sc: 欢迎来到淘大商场的景品捕屋。淘大商场提供一站式餐饮、购物及娱乐享受，全面照顾你的消费购物需要，商场内有超过30家本地及国际食府，提供惹人垂涎的亚洲及西式美食。
metaDescription.tc: 歡迎來到淘大商場的景品捕屋。淘大商場提供一站式餐飲、購物及娛樂享受，全面照顧你的消費購物需要，商場內有超過30家本地及國際食府，提供惹人垂涎的亞洲及西式美食。
